9107
9115void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff)
9116{
9117 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
9118 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9119 {
9120 mRange.lower += diff;
9121 mRange.upper += diff;
9122 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9123 {
9124 mRange.lower *= diff;
9125 mRange.upper *= diff;
9126 }
9127 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
9128 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
9129}
9130
9140void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor)
9141{
9142 scaleRange(factor, range().center());
9143}
9144
9154void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
9155{
9156 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
9157 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9158 {
9159 QCPRange newRange;
9160 newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
9161 newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
9162 if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
9163 mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
9164 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9165 {
9166 if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
9167 {
9168 QCPRange newRange;
9169 newRange.lower = qPow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
9170 newRange.upper = qPow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
9171 if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
9172 mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
9173 } else
9174 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
9175 }
9176 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
9177 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
9178}
9179
9193void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio)
9194{
9195 int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
9196
9197 if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
9198 otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->width();
9199 else
9200 otherPixelSize = otherAxis->axisRect()->height();
9201
9202 if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
9203 ownPixelSize = axisRect()->width();
9204 else
9205 ownPixelSize = axisRect()->height();
9206
9207 double newRangeSize = ratio*otherAxis->range().size()*ownPixelSize/double(otherPixelSize);
9208 setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
9209}
9210
9217void QCPAxis::rescale(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
9218{
9219 QCPRange newRange;
9220 bool haveRange = false;
9221 foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, plottables())
9222 {
9223 if (!plottable->realVisibility() && onlyVisiblePlottables)
9224 continue;
9225 QCPRange plottableRange;
9226 bool currentFoundRange;
9227 QCP::SignDomain signDomain = QCP::sdBoth;
9228 if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
9229 signDomain = (mRange.upper < 0 ? QCP::sdNegative : QCP::sdPositive);
9230 if (plottable->keyAxis() == this)
9231 plottableRange = plottable->getKeyRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
9232 else
9233 plottableRange = plottable->getValueRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
9234 if (currentFoundRange)
9235 {
9236 if (!haveRange)
9237 newRange = plottableRange;
9238 else
9239 newRange.expand(plottableRange);
9240 haveRange = true;
9241 }
9242 }
9243 if (haveRange)
9244 {
9245 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
9246 {
9247 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
9248 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9249 {
9250 newRange.lower = center-mRange.size()/2.0;
9251 newRange.upper = center+mRange.size()/2.0;
9252 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9253 {
9254 newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
9255 newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
9256 }
9257 }
9258 setRange(newRange);
9259 }
9260}
9261
9265double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const
9266{
9267 if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
9268 {
9269 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9270 {
9271 if (!mRangeReversed)
9272 return (value-mAxisRect->left())/double(mAxisRect->width())*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
9273 else
9274 return -(value-mAxisRect->left())/double(mAxisRect->width())*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
9275 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9276 {
9277 if (!mRangeReversed)
9278 return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->left())/double(mAxisRect->width()))*mRange.lower;
9279 else
9280 return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->left()-value)/double(mAxisRect->width()))*mRange.upper;
9281 }
9282 } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
9283 {
9284 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9285 {
9286 if (!mRangeReversed)
9287 return (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/double(mAxisRect->height())*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
9288 else
9289 return -(mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/double(mAxisRect->height())*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
9290 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9291 {
9292 if (!mRangeReversed)
9293 return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect->bottom()-value)/double(mAxisRect->height()))*mRange.lower;
9294 else
9295 return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect->bottom())/double(mAxisRect->height()))*mRange.upper;
9296 }
9297 }
9298}
9299
9303double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const
9304{
9305 if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
9306 {
9307 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9308 {
9309 if (!mRangeReversed)
9310 return (value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
9311 else
9312 return (mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
9313 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9314 {
9315 if (value >= 0.0 && mRange.upper < 0.0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
9316 return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->right()+200 : mAxisRect->left()-200;
9317 else if (value <= 0.0 && mRange.upper >= 0.0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
9318 return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->left()-200 : mAxisRect->right()+200;
9319 else
9320 {
9321 if (!mRangeReversed)
9322 return qLn(value/mRange.lower)/qLn(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
9323 else
9324 return qLn(mRange.upper/value)/qLn(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->width()+mAxisRect->left();
9325 }
9326 }
9327 } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
9328 {
9329 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
9330 {
9331 if (!mRangeReversed)
9332 return mAxisRect->bottom()-(value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
9333 else
9334 return mAxisRect->bottom()-(mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect->height();
9335 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
9336 {
9337 if (value >= 0.0 && mRange.upper < 0.0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
9338 return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->top()-200 : mAxisRect->bottom()+200;
9339 else if (value <= 0.0 && mRange.upper >= 0.0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
9340 return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect->bottom()+200 : mAxisRect->top()-200;
9341 else
9342 {
9343 if (!mRangeReversed)
9344 return mAxisRect->bottom()-qLn(value/mRange.lower)/qLn(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
9345 else
9346 return mAxisRect->bottom()-qLn(mRange.upper/value)/qLn(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect->height();
9347 }
9348 }
9349 }
9350}
9351
9361QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
9362{
9363 if (!mVisible)
9364 return spNone;
9365
9366 if (mAxisPainter->axisSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
9367 return spAxis;
9368 else if (mAxisPainter->tickLabelsSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
9369 return spTickLabels;
9370 else if (mAxisPainter->labelSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
9371 return spAxisLabel;
9372 else
9373 return spNone;
9374}
9375
9376/* inherits documentation from base class */
9377double QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
9378{
9379 if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
9380 SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
9381 if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
9382 return -1;
9383
9384 if (details)
9385 details->setValue(part);
9386 return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
9387}
9388
9396QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxis::plottables() const
9397{
9398 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
9399 if (!mParentPlot) return result;
9400
9401 foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mParentPlot->mPlottables)
9402 {
9403 if (plottable->keyAxis() == this || plottable->valueAxis() == this)
9404 result.append(plottable);
9405 }
9406 return result;
9407}
9408
9414QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxis::graphs() const
9415{
9416 QList<QCPGraph*> result;
9417 if (!mParentPlot) return result;
9418
9419 foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mParentPlot->mGraphs)
9420 {
9421 if (graph->keyAxis() == this || graph->valueAxis() == this)
9422 result.append(graph);
9423 }
9424 return result;
9425}
9426
9433QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCPAxis::items() const
9434{
9435 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
9436 if (!mParentPlot) return result;
9437
9438 foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mParentPlot->mItems)
9439 {
9440 foreach (QCPItemPosition *position, item->positions())
9441 {
9442 if (position->keyAxis() == this || position->valueAxis() == this)
9443 {
9444 result.append(item);
9445 break;
9446 }
9447 }
9448 }
9449 return result;
9450}
9451
9456QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(QCP::MarginSide side)
9457{
9458 switch (side)
9459 {
9460 case QCP::msLeft: return atLeft;
9461 case QCP::msRight: return atRight;
9462 case QCP::msTop: return atTop;
9463 case QCP::msBottom: return atBottom;
9464 default: break;
9465 }
9466 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid margin side passed:" << static_cast<int>(side);
9467 return atLeft;
9468}
9469
9473QCPAxis::AxisType QCPAxis::opposite(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
9474{
9475 switch (type)
9476 {
9477 case atLeft: return atRight;
9478 case atRight: return atLeft;
9479 case atBottom: return atTop;
9480 case atTop: return atBottom;
9481 }
9482 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis type";
9483 return atLeft;
9484}
9485
9486/* inherits documentation from base class */
9487void QCPAxis::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
9488{
9489 Q_UNUSED(event)
9490 SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
9491 if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part))
9492 {
9493 SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
9494 setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^part : part);
9495 if (selectionStateChanged)
9496 *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
9497 }
9498}
9499
9500/* inherits documentation from base class */
9501void QCPAxis::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
9502{
9503 SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
9504 setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
9505 if (selectionStateChanged)
9506 *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
9507}
9508
9524void QCPAxis::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
9525{
9526 Q_UNUSED(details)
9527 if (!mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag) ||
9528 !mAxisRect->rangeDrag().testFlag(orientation()) ||
9529 !mAxisRect->rangeDragAxes(orientation()).contains(this))
9530 {
9531 event->ignore();
9532 return;
9533 }
9534
9535 if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
9536 {
9537 mDragging = true;
9538 // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
9539 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
9540 {
9541 mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
9542 mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
9543 }
9544 // Mouse range dragging interaction:
9545 if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
9546 mDragStartRange = mRange;
9547 }
9548}
9549
9562void QCPAxis::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
9563{
9564 if (mDragging)
9565 {
9566 const double startPixel = orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? startPos.x() : startPos.y();
9567 const double currentPixel = orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? event->pos().x() : event->pos().y();
9568 if (mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
9569 {
9570 const double diff = pixelToCoord(startPixel) - pixelToCoord(currentPixel);
9571 setRange(mDragStartRange.lower+diff, mDragStartRange.upper+diff);
9572 } else if (mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
9573 {
9574 const double diff = pixelToCoord(startPixel) / pixelToCoord(currentPixel);
9575 setRange(mDragStartRange.lower*diff, mDragStartRange.upper*diff);
9576 }
9577
9578 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
9579 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
9580 mParentPlot->replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot);
9581 }
9582}
9583
9596void QCPAxis::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
9597{
9598 Q_UNUSED(event)
9599 Q_UNUSED(startPos)
9600 mDragging = false;
9601 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
9602 {
9603 mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
9604 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
9605 }
9606}
9607
9623void QCPAxis::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
9624{
9625 // Mouse range zooming interaction:
9626 if (!mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom) ||
9627 !mAxisRect->rangeZoom().testFlag(orientation()) ||
9628 !mAxisRect->rangeZoomAxes(orientation()).contains(this))
9629 {
9630 event->ignore();
9631 return;
9632 }
9633
9634#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0)
9635 const double delta = event->delta();
9636#else
9637 const double delta = event->angleDelta().y();
9638#endif
9639
9640#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
9641 const QPointF pos = event->pos();
9642#else
9643 const QPointF pos = event->position();
9644#endif
9645
9646 const double wheelSteps = delta/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
9647 const double factor = qPow(mAxisRect->rangeZoomFactor(orientation()), wheelSteps);
9648 scaleRange(factor, pixelToCoord(orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? pos.x() : pos.y()));
9649 mParentPlot->replot();
9650}
9651
9667void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
9668{
9669 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
9670}
9671
9678void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
9679{
9680 QVector<double> subTickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
9681 QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
9682 QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
9683 tickPositions.reserve(mTickVector.size());
9684 tickLabels.reserve(mTickVector.size());
9685 subTickPositions.reserve(mSubTickVector.size());
9686
9687 if (mTicks)
9688 {
9689 for (int i=0; i<mTickVector.size(); ++i)
9690 {
9691 tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
9692 if (mTickLabels)
9693 tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
9694 }
9695
9696 if (mSubTicks)
9697 {
9698 const int subTickCount = mSubTickVector.size();
9699 for (int i=0; i<subTickCount; ++i)
9700 subTickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i)));
9701 }
9702 }
9703
9704 // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it needs to draw the axis.
9705 // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct feed-through with QCPAxis setters
9706 mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
9707 mAxisPainter->basePen = getBasePen();
9708 mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
9709 mAxisPainter->labelColor = getLabelColor();
9710 mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
9711 mAxisPainter->substituteExponent = mNumberBeautifulPowers;
9712 mAxisPainter->tickPen = getTickPen();
9713 mAxisPainter->subTickPen = getSubTickPen();
9714 mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = getTickLabelFont();
9715 mAxisPainter->tickLabelColor = getTickLabelColor();
9716 mAxisPainter->axisRect = mAxisRect->rect();
9717 mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
9718 mAxisPainter->abbreviateDecimalPowers = mScaleType == stLogarithmic;
9719 mAxisPainter->reversedEndings = mRangeReversed;
9720 mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
9721 mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
9722 mAxisPainter->subTickPositions = subTickPositions;
9723 mAxisPainter->draw(painter);
9724}
9725
9734void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors()
9735{
9736 if (!mParentPlot) return;
9737 if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
9738
9739 QVector<QString> oldLabels = mTickVectorLabels;
9740 mTicker->generate(mRange, mParentPlot->locale(), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision, mTickVector, mSubTicks ? &mSubTickVector : nullptr, mTickLabels ? &mTickVectorLabels : nullptr);
9741 mCachedMarginValid &= mTickVectorLabels == oldLabels; // if labels have changed, margin might have changed, too
9742}
9743
9749QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const
9750{
9751 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
9752}
9753
9759QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const
9760{
9761 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
9762}
9763
9769QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const
9770{
9771 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
9772}
9773
9779QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const
9780{
9781 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
9782}
9783
9789QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const
9790{
9791 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
9792}
9793
9799QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const
9800{
9801 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
9802}
9803
9809QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const
9810{
9811 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
9812}
9813
9828int QCPAxis::calculateMargin()
9829{
9830 if (!mVisible) // if not visible, directly return 0, don't cache 0 because we can't react to setVisible in QCPAxis
9831 return 0;
9832
9833 if (mCachedMarginValid)
9834 return mCachedMargin;
9835
9836 // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and calculate margin needed to fit axis and its labels
9837 int margin = 0;
9838
9839 QVector<double> tickPositions; // the final coordToPixel transformed vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
9840 QVector<QString> tickLabels; // the final vector passed to QCPAxisPainter
9841 tickPositions.reserve(mTickVector.size());
9842 tickLabels.reserve(mTickVector.size());
9843
9844 if (mTicks)
9845 {
9846 for (int i=0; i<mTickVector.size(); ++i)
9847 {
9848 tickPositions.append(coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)));
9849 if (mTickLabels)
9850 tickLabels.append(mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
9851 }
9852 }
9853 // transfer all properties of this axis to QCPAxisPainterPrivate which it needs to calculate the size.
9854 // Note that some axis painter properties are already set by direct feed-through with QCPAxis setters
9855 mAxisPainter->type = mAxisType;
9856 mAxisPainter->labelFont = getLabelFont();
9857 mAxisPainter->label = mLabel;
9858 mAxisPainter->tickLabelFont = mTickLabelFont;
9859 mAxisPainter->axisRect = mAxisRect->rect();
9860 mAxisPainter->viewportRect = mParentPlot->viewport();
9861 mAxisPainter->tickPositions = tickPositions;
9862 mAxisPainter->tickLabels = tickLabels;
9863 margin += mAxisPainter->size();
9864 margin += mPadding;
9865
9866 mCachedMargin = margin;
9867 mCachedMarginValid = true;
9868 return margin;
9869}
9870
9871/* inherits documentation from base class */
9872QCP::Interaction QCPAxis::selectionCategory() const
9873{
9874 return QCP::iSelectAxes;
9875}
9876
9877
9881
9898QCPAxisPainterPrivate::QCPAxisPainterPrivate(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
9899 type(QCPAxis::atLeft),
9900 basePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
9901 lowerEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
9902 upperEnding(QCPLineEnding::esNone),
9903 labelPadding(0),
9904 tickLabelPadding(0),
9905 tickLabelRotation(0),
9906 tickLabelSide(QCPAxis::lsOutside),
9907 substituteExponent(true),
9908 numberMultiplyCross(false),
9909 tickLengthIn(5),
9910 tickLengthOut(0),
9911 subTickLengthIn(2),
9912 subTickLengthOut(0),
9913 tickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
9914 subTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
9915 offset(0),
9916 abbreviateDecimalPowers(false),
9917 reversedEndings(false),
9918 mParentPlot(parentPlot),
9919 mLabelCache(16) // cache at most 16 (tick) labels
9920{
9921}
9922
9923QCPAxisPainterPrivate::~QCPAxisPainterPrivate()
9924{
9925}
9926
9934void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
9935{
9936 QByteArray newHash = generateLabelParameterHash();
9937 if (newHash != mLabelParameterHash)
9938 {
9939 mLabelCache.clear();
9940 mLabelParameterHash = newHash;
9941 }
9942
9943 QPoint origin;
9944 switch (type)
9945 {
9946 case QCPAxis::atLeft: origin = axisRect.bottomLeft() +QPoint(-offset, 0); break;
9947 case QCPAxis::atRight: origin = axisRect.bottomRight()+QPoint(+offset, 0); break;
9948 case QCPAxis::atTop: origin = axisRect.topLeft() +QPoint(0, -offset); break;
9949 case QCPAxis::atBottom: origin = axisRect.bottomLeft() +QPoint(0, +offset); break;
9950 }
9951
9952 double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
9953 switch (type)
9954 {
9955 case QCPAxis::atTop: yCor = -1; break;
9956 case QCPAxis::atRight: xCor = 1; break;
9957 default: break;
9958 }
9959 int margin = 0;
9960 // draw baseline:
9961 QLineF baseLine;
9962 painter->setPen(basePen);
9963 if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
9964 baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(axisRect.width()+xCor, yCor));
9965 else
9966 baseLine.setPoints(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(xCor, -axisRect.height()+yCor));
9967 if (reversedEndings)
9968 baseLine = QLineF(baseLine.p2(), baseLine.p1()); // won't make a difference for line itself, but for line endings later
9969 painter->drawLine(baseLine);
9970
9971 // draw ticks:
9972 if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
9973 {
9974 painter->setPen(tickPen);
9975 int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1; // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
9976 if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
9977 {
9978 foreach (double tickPos, tickPositions)
9979 painter->drawLine(QLineF(tickPos+xCor, origin.y()-tickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, tickPos+xCor, origin.y()+tickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
9980 } else
9981 {
9982 foreach (double tickPos, tickPositions)
9983 painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-tickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, tickPos+yCor, origin.x()+tickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, tickPos+yCor));
9984 }
9985 }
9986
9987 // draw subticks:
9988 if (!subTickPositions.isEmpty())
9989 {
9990 painter->setPen(subTickPen);
9991 // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
9992 int tickDir = (type == QCPAxis::atBottom || type == QCPAxis::atRight) ? -1 : 1;
9993 if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
9994 {
9995 foreach (double subTickPos, subTickPositions)
9996 painter->drawLine(QLineF(subTickPos+xCor, origin.y()-subTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, subTickPos+xCor, origin.y()+subTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
9997 } else
9998 {
9999 foreach (double subTickPos, subTickPositions)
10000 painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-subTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, subTickPos+yCor, origin.x()+subTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, subTickPos+yCor));
10001 }
10002 }
10003 margin += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
10004
10005 // draw axis base endings:
10006 bool antialiasingBackup = painter->antialiasing();
10007 painter->setAntialiasing(true); // always want endings to be antialiased, even if base and ticks themselves aren't
10008 painter->setBrush(QBrush(basePen.color()));
10009 QCPVector2D baseLineVector(baseLine.dx(), baseLine.dy());
10010 if (lowerEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
10011 lowerEnding.draw(painter, QCPVector2D(baseLine.p1())-baseLineVector.normalized()*lowerEnding.realLength()*(lowerEnding.inverted()?-1:1), -baseLineVector);
10012 if (upperEnding.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
10013 upperEnding.draw(painter, QCPVector2D(baseLine.p2())+baseLineVector.normalized()*upperEnding.realLength()*(upperEnding.inverted()?-1:1), baseLineVector);
10014 painter->setAntialiasing(antialiasingBackup);
10015
10016 // tick labels:
10017 QRect oldClipRect;
10018 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside) // if using inside labels, clip them to the axis rect
10019 {
10020 oldClipRect = painter->clipRegion().boundingRect();
10021 painter->setClipRect(axisRect);
10022 }
10023 QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
10024 if (!tickLabels.isEmpty())
10025 {
10026 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
10027 margin += tickLabelPadding;
10028 painter->setFont(tickLabelFont);
10029 painter->setPen(QPen(tickLabelColor));
10030 const int maxLabelIndex = qMin(tickPositions.size(), tickLabels.size());
10031 int distanceToAxis = margin;
10032 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)
10033 distanceToAxis = -(qMax(tickLengthIn, subTickLengthIn)+tickLabelPadding);
10034 for (int i=0; i<maxLabelIndex; ++i)
10035 placeTickLabel(painter, tickPositions.at(i), distanceToAxis, tickLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
10036 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
10037 margin += (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal) ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
10038 }
10039 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)
10040 painter->setClipRect(oldClipRect);
10041
10042 // axis label:
10043 QRect labelBounds;
10044 if (!label.isEmpty())
10045 {
10046 margin += labelPadding;
10047 painter->setFont(labelFont);
10048 painter->setPen(QPen(labelColor));
10049 labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, label);
10050 if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
10051 {
10052 QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
10053 painter->translate((origin.x()-margin-labelBounds.height()), origin.y());
10054 painter->rotate(-90);
10055 painter->drawText(0, 0, axisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
10056 painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
10057 }
10058 else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
10059 {
10060 QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
10061 painter->translate((origin.x()+margin+labelBounds.height()), origin.y()-axisRect.height());
10062 painter->rotate(90);
10063 painter->drawText(0, 0, axisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
10064 painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
10065 }
10066 else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
10067 painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()-margin-labelBounds.height(), axisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
10068 else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
10069 painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()+margin, axisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, label);
10070 }
10071
10072 // set selection boxes:
10073 int selectionTolerance = 0;
10074 if (mParentPlot)
10075 selectionTolerance = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
10076 else
10077 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "mParentPlot is null";
10078 int selAxisOutSize = qMax(qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut), selectionTolerance);
10079 int selAxisInSize = selectionTolerance;
10080 int selTickLabelSize;
10081 int selTickLabelOffset;
10082 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
10083 {
10084 selTickLabelSize = (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
10085 selTickLabelOffset = qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut)+tickLabelPadding;
10086 } else
10087 {
10088 selTickLabelSize = -(QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
10089 selTickLabelOffset = -(qMax(tickLengthIn, subTickLengthIn)+tickLabelPadding);
10090 }
10091 int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
10092 int selLabelOffset = qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut)+(!tickLabels.isEmpty() && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside ? tickLabelPadding+selTickLabelSize : 0)+labelPadding;
10093 if (type == QCPAxis::atLeft)
10094 {
10095 mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisOutSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selAxisInSize, axisRect.bottom());
10096 mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()-selTickLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
10097 mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()-selLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
10098 } else if (type == QCPAxis::atRight)
10099 {
10100 mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()-selAxisInSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selAxisOutSize, axisRect.bottom());
10101 mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selTickLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
10102 mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(origin.x()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, axisRect.top(), origin.x()+selLabelOffset, axisRect.bottom());
10103 } else if (type == QCPAxis::atTop)
10104 {
10105 mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selAxisOutSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selAxisInSize);
10106 mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()-selTickLabelOffset);
10107 mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()-selLabelOffset);
10108 } else if (type == QCPAxis::atBottom)
10109 {
10110 mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()-selAxisInSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selAxisOutSize);
10111 mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selTickLabelOffset);
10112 mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(axisRect.left(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, axisRect.right(), origin.y()+selLabelOffset);
10113 }
10114 mAxisSelectionBox = mAxisSelectionBox.normalized();
10115 mTickLabelsSelectionBox = mTickLabelsSelectionBox.normalized();
10116 mLabelSelectionBox = mLabelSelectionBox.normalized();
10117 // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
10118 //painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
10119 //painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox << mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
10120}
10121
10127int QCPAxisPainterPrivate::size()
10128{
10129 int result = 0;
10130
10131 QByteArray newHash = generateLabelParameterHash();
10132 if (newHash != mLabelParameterHash)
10133 {
10134 mLabelCache.clear();
10135 mLabelParameterHash = newHash;
10136 }
10137
10138 // get length of tick marks pointing outwards:
10139 if (!tickPositions.isEmpty())
10140 result += qMax(0, qMax(tickLengthOut, subTickLengthOut));
10141
10142 // calculate size of tick labels:
10143 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
10144 {
10145 QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
10146 if (!tickLabels.isEmpty())
10147 {
10148 foreach (const QString &tickLabel, tickLabels)
10149 getMaxTickLabelSize(tickLabelFont, tickLabel, &tickLabelsSize);
10150 result += QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width();
10151 result += tickLabelPadding;
10152 }
10153 }
10154
10155 // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels are rotated by 90 degrees):
10156 if (!label.isEmpty())
10157 {
10158 QFontMetrics fontMetrics(labelFont);
10159 QRect bounds;
10160 bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter, label);
10161 result += bounds.height() + labelPadding;
10162 }
10163
10164 return result;
10165}
10166
10173void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::clearCache()
10174{
10175 mLabelCache.clear();
10176}
10177
10185QByteArray QCPAxisPainterPrivate::generateLabelParameterHash() const
10186{
10187 QByteArray result;
10188 result.append(QByteArray::number(mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio()));
10189 result.append(QByteArray::number(tickLabelRotation));
10190 result.append(QByteArray::number(int(tickLabelSide)));
10191 result.append(QByteArray::number(int(substituteExponent)));
10192 result.append(QByteArray::number(int(numberMultiplyCross)));
10193 result.append(tickLabelColor.name().toLatin1()+QByteArray::number(tickLabelColor.alpha(), 16));
10194 result.append(tickLabelFont.toString().toLatin1());
10195 return result;
10196}
10197
10217void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::placeTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position, int distanceToAxis, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize)
10218{
10219 // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize() accordingly!
10220 if (text.isEmpty()) return;
10221 QSize finalSize;
10222 QPointF labelAnchor;
10223 switch (type)
10224 {
10225 case QCPAxis::atLeft: labelAnchor = QPointF(axisRect.left()-distanceToAxis-offset, position); break;
10226 case QCPAxis::atRight: labelAnchor = QPointF(axisRect.right()+distanceToAxis+offset, position); break;
10227 case QCPAxis::atTop: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, axisRect.top()-distanceToAxis-offset); break;
10228 case QCPAxis::atBottom: labelAnchor = QPointF(position, axisRect.bottom()+distanceToAxis+offset); break;
10229 }
10230 if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching)) // label caching enabled
10231 {
10232 CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.take(text); // attempt to get label from cache
10233 if (!cachedLabel) // no cached label existed, create it
10234 {
10235 cachedLabel = new CachedLabel;
10236 TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
10237 cachedLabel->offset = getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData)+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft();
10238 if (!qFuzzyCompare(1.0, mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio()))
10239 {
10240 cachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size()*mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio());
10241#ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
10242# ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_FLOAT
10243 cachedLabel->pixmap.setDevicePixelRatio(mParentPlot->devicePixelRatioF());
10244# else
10245 cachedLabel->pixmap.setDevicePixelRatio(mParentPlot->devicePixelRatio());
10246# endif
10247#endif
10248 } else
10249 cachedLabel->pixmap = QPixmap(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size());
10250 cachedLabel->pixmap.fill(Qt::transparent);
10251 QCPPainter cachePainter(&cachedLabel->pixmap);
10252 cachePainter.setPen(painter->pen());
10253 drawTickLabel(&cachePainter, -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().x(), -labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.topLeft().y(), labelData);
10254 }
10255 // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it (only for outside tick labels):
10256 bool labelClippedByBorder = false;
10257 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
10258 {
10259 if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
10260 labelClippedByBorder = labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x()+cachedLabel->pixmap.width()/mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio() > viewportRect.right() || labelAnchor.x()+cachedLabel->offset.x() < viewportRect.left();
10261 else
10262 labelClippedByBorder = labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y()+cachedLabel->pixmap.height()/mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio() > viewportRect.bottom() || labelAnchor.y()+cachedLabel->offset.y() < viewportRect.top();
10263 }
10264 if (!labelClippedByBorder)
10265 {
10266 painter->drawPixmap(labelAnchor+cachedLabel->offset, cachedLabel->pixmap);
10267 finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size()/mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio();
10268 }
10269 mLabelCache.insert(text, cachedLabel); // return label to cache or insert for the first time if newly created
10270 } else // label caching disabled, draw text directly on surface:
10271 {
10272 TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(painter->font(), text);
10273 QPointF finalPosition = labelAnchor + getTickLabelDrawOffset(labelData);
10274 // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it (only for outside tick labels):
10275 bool labelClippedByBorder = false;
10276 if (tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside)
10277 {
10278 if (QCPAxis::orientation(type) == Qt::Horizontal)
10279 labelClippedByBorder = finalPosition.x()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.width()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left()) > viewportRect.right() || finalPosition.x()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.left() < viewportRect.left();
10280 else
10281 labelClippedByBorder = finalPosition.y()+(labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.height()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top()) > viewportRect.bottom() || finalPosition.y()+labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.top() < viewportRect.top();
10282 }
10283 if (!labelClippedByBorder)
10284 {
10285 drawTickLabel(painter, finalPosition.x(), finalPosition.y(), labelData);
10286 finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
10287 }
10288 }
10289
10290 // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
10291 if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
10292 tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
10293 if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
10294 tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
10295}
10296
10306void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::drawTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const TickLabelData &labelData) const
10307{
10308 // backup painter settings that we're about to change:
10309 QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
10310 QFont oldFont = painter->font();
10311
10312 // transform painter to position/rotation:
10313 painter->translate(x, y);
10314 if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
10315 painter->rotate(tickLabelRotation);
10316
10317 // draw text:
10318 if (!labelData.expPart.isEmpty()) // indicator that beautiful powers must be used
10319 {
10320 painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
10321 painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.basePart);
10322 if (!labelData.suffixPart.isEmpty())
10323 painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width()+1+labelData.expBounds.width(), 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.suffixPart);
10324 painter->setFont(labelData.expFont);
10325 painter->drawText(labelData.baseBounds.width()+1, 0, labelData.expBounds.width(), labelData.expBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, labelData.expPart);
10326 } else
10327 {
10328 painter->setFont(labelData.baseFont);
10329 painter->drawText(0, 0, labelData.totalBounds.width(), labelData.totalBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, labelData.basePart);
10330 }
10331
10332 // reset painter settings to what it was before:
10333 painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
10334 painter->setFont(oldFont);
10335}
10336
10345QCPAxisPainterPrivate::TickLabelData QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelData(const QFont &font, const QString &text) const
10346{
10347 TickLabelData result;
10348
10349 // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
10350 bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
10351 int ePos = -1; // first index of exponent part, text before that will be basePart, text until eLast will be expPart
10352 int eLast = -1; // last index of exponent part, rest of text after this will be suffixPart
10353 if (substituteExponent)
10354 {
10355 ePos = text.indexOf(QString(mParentPlot->locale().exponential()));
10356 if (ePos > 0 && text.at(ePos-1).isDigit())
10357 {
10358 eLast = ePos;
10359 while (eLast+1 < text.size() && (text.at(eLast+1) == QLatin1Char('+') || text.at(eLast+1) == QLatin1Char('-') || text.at(eLast+1).isDigit()))
10360 ++eLast;
10361 if (eLast > ePos) // only if also to right of 'e' is a digit/+/- interpret it as beautifiable power
10362 useBeautifulPowers = true;
10363 }
10364 }
10365
10366 // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful decimal powers:
10367 result.baseFont = font;
10368 if (result.baseFont.pointSizeF() > 0) // might return -1 if specified with setPixelSize, in that case we can't do correction in next line
10369 result.baseFont.setPointSizeF(result.baseFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding
10370 if (useBeautifulPowers)
10371 {
10372 // split text into parts of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
10373 result.basePart = text.left(ePos);
10374 result.suffixPart = text.mid(eLast+1); // also drawn normally but after exponent
10375 // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
10376 if (abbreviateDecimalPowers && result.basePart == QLatin1String("1"))
10377 result.basePart = QLatin1String("10");
10378 else
10379 result.basePart += (numberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + QLatin1String("10");
10380 result.expPart = text.mid(ePos+1, eLast-ePos);
10381 // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
10382 while (result.expPart.length() > 2 && result.expPart.at(1) == QLatin1Char('0')) // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
10383 result.expPart.remove(1, 1);
10384 if (!result.expPart.isEmpty() && result.expPart.at(0) == QLatin1Char('+'))
10385 result.expPart.remove(0, 1);
10386 // prepare smaller font for exponent:
10387 result.expFont = font;
10388 if (result.expFont.pointSize() > 0)
10389 result.expFont.setPointSize(int(result.expFont.pointSize()*0.75));
10390 else
10391 result.expFont.setPixelSize(int(result.expFont.pixelSize()*0.75));
10392 // calculate bounding rects of base part(s), exponent part and total one:
10393 result.baseBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.basePart);
10394 result.expBounds = QFontMetrics(result.expFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.expPart);
10395 if (!result.suffixPart.isEmpty())
10396 result.suffixBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, result.suffixPart);
10397 result.totalBounds = result.baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, result.expBounds.width()+result.suffixBounds.width()+2, 0); // +2 consists of the 1 pixel spacing between base and exponent (see drawTickLabel) and an extra pixel to include AA
10398 } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
10399 {
10400 result.basePart = text;
10401 result.totalBounds = QFontMetrics(result.baseFont).boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, result.basePart);
10402 }
10403 result.totalBounds.moveTopLeft(QPoint(0, 0)); // want bounding box aligned top left at origin, independent of how it was created, to make further processing simpler
10404
10405 // calculate possibly different bounding rect after rotation:
10406 result.rotatedTotalBounds = result.totalBounds;
10407 if (!qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation))
10408 {
10409 QTransform transform;
10410 transform.rotate(tickLabelRotation);
10411 result.rotatedTotalBounds = transform.mapRect(result.rotatedTotalBounds);
10412 }
10413
10414 return result;
10415}
10416
10427QPointF QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getTickLabelDrawOffset(const TickLabelData &labelData) const
10428{
10429 /*
10430 calculate label offset from base point at tick (non-trivial, for best visual appearance): short
10431 explanation for bottom axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is placed
10432 horizontally under the corresponding tick is always on the label side that is closer to the
10433 axis (e.g. the left side of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that side, the height
10434 is halved and the resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90 degree rotated text
10435 will be centered under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its height). At the same
10436 time, a 45 degree rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical for rotated tick
10437 labels.
10438 */
10439 bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(tickLabelRotation);
10440 bool flip = qFuzzyCompare(qAbs(tickLabelRotation), 90.0); // perfect +/-90 degree flip. Indicates vertical label centering on vertical axes.
10441 double radians = tickLabelRotation/180.0*M_PI;
10442 double x = 0;
10443 double y = 0;
10444 if ((type == QCPAxis::atLeft && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atRight && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at right side of tick label
10445 {
10446 if (doRotation)
10447 {
10448 if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
10449 {
10450 x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
10451 y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10452 } else
10453 {
10454 x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
10455 y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10456 }
10457 } else
10458 {
10459 x = -labelData.totalBounds.width();
10460 y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10461 }
10462 } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atRight && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atLeft && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at left side of tick label
10463 {
10464 if (doRotation)
10465 {
10466 if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
10467 {
10468 x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
10469 y = flip ? -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10470 } else
10471 {
10472 x = 0;
10473 y = flip ? +labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0 : -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10474 }
10475 } else
10476 {
10477 x = 0;
10478 y = -labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10479 }
10480 } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atTop && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at bottom side of tick label
10481 {
10482 if (doRotation)
10483 {
10484 if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
10485 {
10486 x = -qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()+qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10487 y = -qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qCos(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
10488 } else
10489 {
10490 x = -qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10491 y = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height();
10492 }
10493 } else
10494 {
10495 x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
10496 y = -labelData.totalBounds.height();
10497 }
10498 } else if ((type == QCPAxis::atBottom && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsOutside) || (type == QCPAxis::atTop && tickLabelSide == QCPAxis::lsInside)) // Anchor at top side of tick label
10499 {
10500 if (doRotation)
10501 {
10502 if (tickLabelRotation > 0)
10503 {
10504 x = +qSin(radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10505 y = 0;
10506 } else
10507 {
10508 x = -qCos(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.height()/2.0;
10509 y = +qSin(-radians)*labelData.totalBounds.width();
10510 }
10511 } else
10512 {
10513 x = -labelData.totalBounds.width()/2.0;
10514 y = 0;
10515 }
10516 }
10517
10518 return {x, y};
10519}
10520
10528void QCPAxisPainterPrivate::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize) const
10529{
10530 // note: this function must return the same tick label sizes as the placeTickLabel function.
10531 QSize finalSize;
10532 if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels) && mLabelCache.contains(text)) // label caching enabled and have cached label
10533 {
10534 const CachedLabel *cachedLabel = mLabelCache.object(text);
10535 finalSize = cachedLabel->pixmap.size()/mParentPlot->bufferDevicePixelRatio();
10536 } else // label caching disabled or no label with this text cached:
10537 {
10538 TickLabelData labelData = getTickLabelData(font, text);
10539 finalSize = labelData.rotatedTotalBounds.size();
10540 }
10541
10542 // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
10543 if (finalSize.width() > tickLabelsSize->width())
10544 tickLabelsSize->setWidth(finalSize.width());
10545 if (finalSize.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
10546 tickLabelsSize->setHeight(finalSize.height());
10547}
10548/* end of 'src/axis/axis.cpp' */
10549
10550
10551/* including file 'src/scatterstyle.cpp' */
10552/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 17466 */
10553
10557
10608/* start documentation of inline functions */
10609
10631/* end documentation of inline functions */

10639QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle() :

10643 mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
10644 mPenDefined(false)
10645{
10646}

10660 mPenDefined(false)

10737QCPScatterStyle::QCPScatterStyle(const QPainterPath &customPath, const QPen &pen, const QBrush &brush, double size) :
10738 mSize(size),
10739 mShape(ssCustom),

10743 mPenDefined(pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)

10745}
10746
10750void QCPScatterStyle::setFromOther(const QCPScatterStyle &other, ScatterProperties properties)
10751{
10752 if (properties.testFlag(spPen))
10753 {
10754 setPen(other.pen());
10755 if (!other.isPenDefined())
10756 undefinePen();
10757 }
10758 if (properties.testFlag(spBrush))
10759 setBrush(other.brush());
10760 if (properties.testFlag(spSize))
10761 setSize(other.size());
10762 if (properties.testFlag(spShape))
10763 {
10764 setShape(other.shape());
10765 if (other.shape() == ssPixmap)
10766 setPixmap(other.pixmap());
10767 else if (other.shape() == ssCustom)
10768 setCustomPath(other.customPath());
10769 }
10770}
10771
10777void QCPScatterStyle::setSize(double size)
10778{
10779 mSize = size;
10780}
10781
10790void QCPScatterStyle::setShape(QCPScatterStyle::ScatterShape shape)
10791{
10792 mShape = shape;
10793}
10794
10804void QCPScatterStyle::setPen(const QPen &pen)
10805{
10806 mPenDefined = true;
10807 mPen = pen;
10808}
10809
10816void QCPScatterStyle::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
10817{
10818 mBrush = brush;
10819}
10820
10828void QCPScatterStyle::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
10829{
10830 setShape(ssPixmap);
10831 mPixmap = pixmap;
10832}
10833
10839void QCPScatterStyle::setCustomPath(const QPainterPath &customPath)
10840{
10841 setShape(ssCustom);
10842 mCustomPath = customPath;
10843}
10844
10851void QCPScatterStyle::undefinePen()
10852{
10853 mPenDefined = false;
10854}
10855
10865void QCPScatterStyle::applyTo(QCPPainter *painter, const QPen &defaultPen) const
10866{
10867 painter->setPen(mPenDefined ? mPen : defaultPen);
10868 painter->setBrush(mBrush);
10869}
10870
10879void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, const QPointF &pos) const
10880{
10881 drawShape(painter, pos.x(), pos.y());
10882}
10883
10887void QCPScatterStyle::drawShape(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y) const
10888{
10889 double w = mSize/2.0;
10890 switch (mShape)
10891 {
10892 case ssNone: break;
10893 case ssDot:
10894 {
10895 painter->drawLine(QPointF(x, y), QPointF(x+0.0001, y));
10896 break;
10897 }
10898 case ssCross:
10899 {
10900 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w, y+w));
10901 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w, x+w, y-w));
10902 break;
10903 }
10904 case ssPlus:
10905 {
10906 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
10907 painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
10908 break;
10909 }
10910 case ssCircle:
10911 {
10912 painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
10913 break;
10914 }
10915 case ssDisc:
10916 {
10917 QBrush b = painter->brush();
10918 painter->setBrush(painter->pen().color());
10919 painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x , y), w, w);
10920 painter->setBrush(b);
10921 break;
10922 }
10923 case ssSquare:
10924 {
10925 painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
10926 break;
10927 }
10928 case ssDiamond:
10929 {
10930 QPointF lineArray[4] = {QPointF(x-w, y),
10931 QPointF( x, y-w),
10932 QPointF(x+w, y),
10933 QPointF( x, y+w)};
10934 painter->drawPolygon(lineArray, 4);
10935 break;
10936 }
10937 case ssStar:
10938 {
10939 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
10940 painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
10941 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
10942 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707, x+w*0.707, y-w*0.707));
10943 break;
10944 }
10945 case ssTriangle:
10946 {
10947 QPointF lineArray[3] = {QPointF(x-w, y+0.755*w),
10948 QPointF(x+w, y+0.755*w),
10949 QPointF( x, y-0.977*w)};
10950 painter->drawPolygon(lineArray, 3);
10951 break;
10952 }
10953 case ssTriangleInverted:
10954 {
10955 QPointF lineArray[3] = {QPointF(x-w, y-0.755*w),
10956 QPointF(x+w, y-0.755*w),
10957 QPointF( x, y+0.977*w)};
10958 painter->drawPolygon(lineArray, 3);
10959 break;
10960 }
10961 case ssCrossSquare:
10962 {
10963 painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
10964 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y-w, x+w*0.95, y+w*0.95));
10965 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y+w*0.95, x+w*0.95, y-w));
10966 break;
10967 }
10968 case ssPlusSquare:
10969 {
10970 painter->drawRect(QRectF(x-w, y-w, mSize, mSize));
10971 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w*0.95, y));
10972 painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
10973 break;
10974 }
10975 case ssCrossCircle:
10976 {
10977 painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
10978 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y-w*0.707, x+w*0.670, y+w*0.670));
10979 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w*0.707, y+w*0.670, x+w*0.670, y-w*0.707));
10980 break;
10981 }
10982 case ssPlusCircle:
10983 {
10984 painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
10985 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-w, y, x+w, y));
10986 painter->drawLine(QLineF( x, y+w, x, y-w));
10987 break;
10988 }
10989 case ssPeace:
10990 {
10991 painter->drawEllipse(QPointF(x, y), w, w);
10992 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-w, x, y+w));
10993 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x-w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
10994 painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y, x+w*0.707, y+w*0.707));
10995 break;
10996 }
10997 case ssPixmap:
10998 {
10999 const double widthHalf = mPixmap.width()*0.5;
11000 const double heightHalf = mPixmap.height()*0.5;
11001#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 8, 0)
11002 const QRectF clipRect = painter->clipRegion().boundingRect().adjusted(-widthHalf, -heightHalf, widthHalf, heightHalf);
11003#else
11004 const QRectF clipRect = painter->clipBoundingRect().adjusted(-widthHalf, -heightHalf, widthHalf, heightHalf);
11005#endif
11006 if (clipRect.contains(x, y))
11007 painter->drawPixmap(qRound(x-widthHalf), qRound(y-heightHalf), mPixmap);
11008 break;
11009 }
11010 case ssCustom:
11011 {
11012 QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
11013 painter->translate(x, y);
11014 painter->scale(mSize/6.0, mSize/6.0);
11015 painter->drawPath(mCustomPath);
11016 painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
11017 break;
11018 }
11019 }
11020}
11021/* end of 'src/scatterstyle.cpp' */
11022
11023
11024/* including file 'src/plottable.cpp' */
11025/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 38818 */
11026
11030
11060QCPSelectionDecorator::QCPSelectionDecorator() :
11061 mPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5),
11062 mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
11063 mUsedScatterProperties(QCPScatterStyle::spNone),
11064 mPlottable(nullptr)
11065{
11066}
11067
11068QCPSelectionDecorator::~QCPSelectionDecorator()
11069{
11070}
11071
11075void QCPSelectionDecorator::setPen(const QPen &pen)
11076{
11077 mPen = pen;
11078}
11079
11083void QCPSelectionDecorator::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
11084{
11085 mBrush = brush;
11086}
11087
11095void QCPSelectionDecorator::setScatterStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &scatterStyle, QCPScatterStyle::ScatterProperties usedProperties)
11096{
11097 mScatterStyle = scatterStyle;
11098 setUsedScatterProperties(usedProperties);
11099}
11100
11108void QCPSelectionDecorator::setUsedScatterProperties(const QCPScatterStyle::ScatterProperties &properties)
11109{
11110 mUsedScatterProperties = properties;
11111}
11112
11118void QCPSelectionDecorator::applyPen(QCPPainter *painter) const
11119{
11120 painter->setPen(mPen);
11121}
11122
11128void QCPSelectionDecorator::applyBrush(QCPPainter *painter) const
11129{
11130 painter->setBrush(mBrush);
11131}
11132
11141QCPScatterStyle QCPSelectionDecorator::getFinalScatterStyle(const QCPScatterStyle &unselectedStyle) const
11142{
11143 QCPScatterStyle result(unselectedStyle);
11144 result.setFromOther(mScatterStyle, mUsedScatterProperties);
11145
11146 // if style shall inherit pen from plottable (has no own pen defined), give it the selected
11147 // plottable pen explicitly, so it doesn't use the unselected plottable pen when used in the
11148 // plottable:
11149 if (!result.isPenDefined())
11150 result.setPen(mPen);
11151
11152 return result;
11153}
11154
11159void QCPSelectionDecorator::copyFrom(const QCPSelectionDecorator *other)
11160{
11161 setPen(other->pen());
11162 setBrush(other->brush());
11163 setScatterStyle(other->scatterStyle(), other->usedScatterProperties());
11164}
11165
11174void QCPSelectionDecorator::drawDecoration(QCPPainter *painter, QCPDataSelection selection)
11175{
11176 Q_UNUSED(painter)
11177 Q_UNUSED(selection)
11178}
11179
11189bool QCPSelectionDecorator::registerWithPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
11190{
11191 if (!mPlottable)
11192 {
11193 mPlottable = plottable;
11194 return true;
11195 } else
11196 {
11197 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "This selection decorator is already registered with plottable:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(mPlottable);
11198 return false;
11199 }
11200}

11418QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
11419 QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), QString(), keyAxis->axisRect()),
11420 mName(),
11421 mAntialiasedFill(true),
11422 mAntialiasedScatters(true),
11423 mPen(Qt::black),
11424 mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
11425 mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
11426 mValueAxis(valueAxis),
11427 mSelectable(QCP::stWhole),
11428 mSelectionDecorator(nullptr)
11429{
11430 if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
11431 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
11432 if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
11433 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
11434
11435 mParentPlot->registerPlottable(this);
11436 setSelectionDecorator(new QCPSelectionDecorator);
11437}
11438
11439QCPAbstractPlottable::~QCPAbstractPlottable()
11440{
11441 if (mSelectionDecorator)
11442 {
11443 delete mSelectionDecorator;
11444 mSelectionDecorator = nullptr;
11445 }
11446}
11447
11452void QCPAbstractPlottable::setName(const QString &name)
11453{
11454 mName = name;
11455}
11456
11463void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedFill(bool enabled)
11464{
11465 mAntialiasedFill = enabled;
11466}
11467
11474void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedScatters(bool enabled)
11475{
11476 mAntialiasedScatters = enabled;
11477}

11487void QCPAbstractPlottable::setPen(const QPen &pen)
11488{
11489 mPen = pen;
11490}
11491
11501void QCPAbstractPlottable::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
11502{
11503 mBrush = brush;
11504}
11505
11517void QCPAbstractPlottable::setKeyAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
11518{
11519 mKeyAxis = axis;
11520}
11521
11533void QCPAbstractPlottable::setValueAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
11534{
11535 mValueAxis = axis;
11536}
