11538
11557void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelection(QCPDataSelection selection)
11558{
11559 selection.enforceType(mSelectable);
11560 if (mSelection != selection)
11561 {
11562 mSelection = selection;
11563 emit selectionChanged(selected());
11564 emit selectionChanged(mSelection);
11565 }
11566}
11567
11577void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectionDecorator(QCPSelectionDecorator *decorator)
11578{
11579 if (decorator)
11580 {
11581 if (decorator->registerWithPlottable(this))
11582 {
11583 delete mSelectionDecorator; // delete old decorator if necessary
11584 mSelectionDecorator = decorator;
11585 }
11586 } else if (mSelectionDecorator) // just clear decorator
11587 {
11588 delete mSelectionDecorator;
11589 mSelectionDecorator = nullptr;
11590 }
11591}
11592
11603void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectable(QCP::SelectionType selectable)
11604{
11605 if (mSelectable != selectable)
11606 {
11607 mSelectable = selectable;
11608 QCPDataSelection oldSelection = mSelection;
11609 mSelection.enforceType(mSelectable);
11610 emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
11611 if (mSelection != oldSelection)
11612 {
11613 emit selectionChanged(selected());
11614 emit selectionChanged(mSelection);
11615 }
11616 }
11617}
11618
11619
11629void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
11630{
11631 QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
11632 QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
11633 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
11634
11635 if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
11636 {
11637 x = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
11638 y = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
11639 } else
11640 {
11641 y = keyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
11642 x = valueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
11643 }
11644}
11645
11650const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
11651{
11652 QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
11653 QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
11654 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
11655
11656 if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
11657 return QPointF(keyAxis->coordToPixel(key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
11658 else
11659 return QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
11660}
11661
11671void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
11672{
11673 QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
11674 QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
11675 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
11676
11677 if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
11678 {
11679 key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
11680 value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
11681 } else
11682 {
11683 key = keyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
11684 value = valueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
11685 }
11686}
11687
11692void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
11693{
11694 pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
11695}
11696
11710void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
11711{
11712 rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
11713 rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
11714}
11715
11721void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
11722{
11723 QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
11724 if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
11725
11726 QCP::SignDomain signDomain = QCP::sdBoth;
11727 if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
11728 signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? QCP::sdNegative : QCP::sdPositive);
11729
11730 bool foundRange;
11731 QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain);
11732 if (foundRange)
11733 {
11734 if (onlyEnlarge)
11735 newRange.expand(keyAxis->range());
11736 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
11737 {
11738 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
11739 if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
11740 {
11741 newRange.lower = center-keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
11742 newRange.upper = center+keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
11743 } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
11744 {
11745 newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper/keyAxis->range().lower);
11746 newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(keyAxis->range().upper/keyAxis->range().lower);
11747 }
11748 }
11749 keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
11750 }
11751}
11752
11763void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool inKeyRange) const
11764{
11765 QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
11766 QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
11767 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
11768
11769 QCP::SignDomain signDomain = QCP::sdBoth;
11770 if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
11771 signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? QCP::sdNegative : QCP::sdPositive);
11772
11773 bool foundRange;
11774 QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain, inKeyRange ? keyAxis->range() : QCPRange());
11775 if (foundRange)
11776 {
11777 if (onlyEnlarge)
11778 newRange.expand(valueAxis->range());
11779 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
11780 {
11781 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
11782 if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
11783 {
11784 newRange.lower = center-valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
11785 newRange.upper = center+valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
11786 } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
11787 {
11788 newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
11789 newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
11790 }
11791 }
11792 valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
11793 }
11794}
11795
11810bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend(QCPLegend *legend)
11811{
11812 if (!legend)
11813 {
11814 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed legend is null";
11815 return false;
11816 }
11817 if (legend->parentPlot() != mParentPlot)
11818 {
11819 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed legend isn't in the same QCustomPlot as this plottable";
11820 return false;
11821 }
11822
11823 if (!legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this))
11824 {
11825 legend->addItem(new QCPPlottableLegendItem(legend, this));
11826 return true;
11827 } else
11828 return false;
11829}
11830
11837bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend()
11838{
11839 if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
11840 return false;
11841 else
11842 return addToLegend(mParentPlot->legend);
11843}
11844
11855bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend(QCPLegend *legend) const
11856{
11857 if (!legend)
11858 {
11859 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed legend is null";
11860 return false;
11861 }
11862
11863 if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip = legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
11864 return legend->removeItem(lip);
11865 else
11866 return false;
11867}
11868
11875bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const
11876{
11877 if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
11878 return false;
11879 else
11880 return removeFromLegend(mParentPlot->legend);
11881}
11882
11883/* inherits documentation from base class */
11884QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const
11885{
11886 if (mKeyAxis && mValueAxis)
11887 return mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect() & mValueAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect();
11888 else
11889 return {};
11890}
11891
11892/* inherits documentation from base class */
11893QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractPlottable::selectionCategory() const
11894{
11895 return QCP::iSelectPlottables;
11896}
11897
11913void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
11914{
11915 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
11916}
11917
11929void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyFillAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
11930{
11931 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedFill, QCP::aeFills);
11932}
11933
11945void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyScattersAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
11946{
11947 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedScatters, QCP::aeScatters);
11948}
11949
11950/* inherits documentation from base class */
11951void QCPAbstractPlottable::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
11952{
11953 Q_UNUSED(event)
11954
11955 if (mSelectable != QCP::stNone)
11956 {
11957 QCPDataSelection newSelection = details.value<QCPDataSelection>();
11958 QCPDataSelection selectionBefore = mSelection;
11959 if (additive)
11960 {
11961 if (mSelectable == QCP::stWhole) // in whole selection mode, we toggle to no selection even if currently unselected point was hit
11962 {
11963 if (selected())
11964 setSelection(QCPDataSelection());
11965 else
11966 setSelection(newSelection);
11967 } else // in all other selection modes we toggle selections of homogeneously selected/unselected segments
11968 {
11969 if (mSelection.contains(newSelection)) // if entire newSelection is already selected, toggle selection
11970 setSelection(mSelection-newSelection);
11971 else
11972 setSelection(mSelection+newSelection);
11973 }
11974 } else
11975 setSelection(newSelection);
11976 if (selectionStateChanged)
11977 *selectionStateChanged = mSelection != selectionBefore;
11978 }
11979}
11980
11981/* inherits documentation from base class */
11982void QCPAbstractPlottable::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
11983{
11984 if (mSelectable != QCP::stNone)
11985 {
11986 QCPDataSelection selectionBefore = mSelection;
11987 setSelection(QCPDataSelection());
11988 if (selectionStateChanged)
11989 *selectionStateChanged = mSelection != selectionBefore;
11990 }
11991}
11992/* end of 'src/plottable.cpp' */
11993
11994
11995/* including file 'src/item.cpp' */
11996/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 49486 */
11997
12001
12023/* start documentation of inline functions */
12024
12035/* end documentation of inline functions */
12036
12042QCPItemAnchor::QCPItemAnchor(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString &name, int anchorId) :
12043 mName(name),
12044 mParentPlot(parentPlot),
12045 mParentItem(parentItem),
12046 mAnchorId(anchorId)
12047{
12048}
12049
12050QCPItemAnchor::~QCPItemAnchor()
12051{
12052 // unregister as parent at children:
12053 foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.values())
12054 {
12055 if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
12056 child->setParentAnchorX(nullptr); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenX
12057 }
12058 foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.values())
12059 {
12060 if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
12061 child->setParentAnchorY(nullptr); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenY
12062 }
12063}
12064
12071QPointF QCPItemAnchor::pixelPosition() const
12072{
12073 if (mParentItem)
12074 {
12075 if (mAnchorId > -1)
12076 {
12077 return mParentItem->anchorPixelPosition(mAnchorId);
12078 } else
12079 {
12080 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no valid anchor id set:" << mAnchorId;
12081 return {};
12082 }
12083 } else
12084 {
12085 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no parent item set";
12086 return {};
12087 }
12088}
12089
12098void QCPItemAnchor::addChildX(QCPItemPosition *pos)
12099{
12100 if (!mChildrenX.contains(pos))
12101 mChildrenX.insert(pos);
12102 else
12103 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
12104}
12105
12112void QCPItemAnchor::removeChildX(QCPItemPosition *pos)
12113{
12114 if (!mChildrenX.remove(pos))
12115 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
12116}
12117
12126void QCPItemAnchor::addChildY(QCPItemPosition *pos)
12127{
12128 if (!mChildrenY.contains(pos))
12129 mChildrenY.insert(pos);
12130 else
12131 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos is child already" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
12132}
12133
12140void QCPItemAnchor::removeChildY(QCPItemPosition *pos)
12141{
12142 if (!mChildrenY.remove(pos))
12143 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "provided pos isn't child" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(pos);
12144}
12145
12146
12150
12186/* start documentation of inline functions */
12187
12209/* end documentation of inline functions */
12210
12216QCPItemPosition::QCPItemPosition(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, QCPAbstractItem *parentItem, const QString &name) :
12217 QCPItemAnchor(parentPlot, parentItem, name),
12218 mPositionTypeX(ptAbsolute),
12219 mPositionTypeY(ptAbsolute),
12220 mKey(0),
12221 mValue(0),
12222 mParentAnchorX(nullptr),
12223 mParentAnchorY(nullptr)
12224{
12225}
12226
12227QCPItemPosition::~QCPItemPosition()
12228{
12229 // unregister as parent at children:
12230 // Note: this is done in ~QCPItemAnchor again, but it's important QCPItemPosition does it itself, because only then
12231 // the setParentAnchor(0) call the correct QCPItemPosition::pixelPosition function instead of QCPItemAnchor::pixelPosition
12232 foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenX.values())
12233 {
12234 if (child->parentAnchorX() == this)
12235 child->setParentAnchorX(nullptr); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenX
12236 }
12237 foreach (QCPItemPosition *child, mChildrenY.values())
12238 {
12239 if (child->parentAnchorY() == this)
12240 child->setParentAnchorY(nullptr); // this acts back on this anchor and child removes itself from mChildrenY
12241 }
12242 // unregister as child in parent:
12243 if (mParentAnchorX)
12244 mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
12245 if (mParentAnchorY)
12246 mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
12247}
12248
12249/* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
12250QCPAxisRect *QCPItemPosition::axisRect() const
12251{
12252 return mAxisRect.data();
12253}
12254
12280void QCPItemPosition::setType(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
12281{
12282 setTypeX(type);
12283 setTypeY(type);
12284}
12285
12293void QCPItemPosition::setTypeX(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
12294{
12295 if (mPositionTypeX != type)
12296 {
12297 // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
12298 // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPosition() because it would output a qDebug warning.
12299 bool retainPixelPosition = true;
12300 if ((mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
12301 retainPixelPosition = false;
12302 if ((mPositionTypeX == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
12303 retainPixelPosition = false;
12304
12305 QPointF pixel;
12306 if (retainPixelPosition)
12307 pixel = pixelPosition();
12308
12309 mPositionTypeX = type;
12310
12311 if (retainPixelPosition)
12312 setPixelPosition(pixel);
12313 }
12314}
12315
12323void QCPItemPosition::setTypeY(QCPItemPosition::PositionType type)
12324{
12325 if (mPositionTypeY != type)
12326 {
12327 // if switching from or to coordinate type that isn't valid (e.g. because axes or axis rect
12328 // were deleted), don't try to recover the pixelPosition() because it would output a qDebug warning.
12329 bool retainPixelPosition = true;
12330 if ((mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords || type == ptPlotCoords) && (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis))
12331 retainPixelPosition = false;
12332 if ((mPositionTypeY == ptAxisRectRatio || type == ptAxisRectRatio) && (!mAxisRect))
12333 retainPixelPosition = false;
12334
12335 QPointF pixel;
12336 if (retainPixelPosition)
12337 pixel = pixelPosition();
12338
12339 mPositionTypeY = type;
12340
12341 if (retainPixelPosition)
12342 setPixelPosition(pixel);
12343 }
12344}
12345
12364bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchor(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
12365{
12366 bool successX = setParentAnchorX(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
12367 bool successY = setParentAnchorY(parentAnchor, keepPixelPosition);
12368 return successX && successY;
12369}
12370
12378bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorX(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
12379{
12380 // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
12381 if (parentAnchor == this)
12382 {
12383 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12384 return false;
12385 }
12386 // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
12387 QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
12388 while (currentParent)
12389 {
12390 if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
12391 {
12392 // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
12393 if (currentParentPos == this)
12394 {
12395 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12396 return false;
12397 }
12398 currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorX();
12399 } else
12400 {
12401 // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
12402 // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
12403 // because they're both on the same item:
12404 if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
12405 {
12406 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12407 return false;
12408 }
12409 break;
12410 }
12411 }
12412
12413 // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
12414 if (!mParentAnchorX && mPositionTypeX == ptPlotCoords)
12415 setTypeX(ptAbsolute);
12416
12417 // save pixel position:
12418 QPointF pixelP;
12419 if (keepPixelPosition)
12420 pixelP = pixelPosition();
12421 // unregister at current parent anchor:
12422 if (mParentAnchorX)
12423 mParentAnchorX->removeChildX(this);
12424 // register at new parent anchor:
12425 if (parentAnchor)
12426 parentAnchor->addChildX(this);
12427 mParentAnchorX = parentAnchor;
12428 // restore pixel position under new parent:
12429 if (keepPixelPosition)
12430 setPixelPosition(pixelP);
12431 else
12432 setCoords(0, coords().y());
12433 return true;
12434}
12435
12443bool QCPItemPosition::setParentAnchorY(QCPItemAnchor *parentAnchor, bool keepPixelPosition)
12444{
12445 // make sure self is not assigned as parent:
12446 if (parentAnchor == this)
12447 {
12448 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set self as parent anchor" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12449 return false;
12450 }
12451 // make sure no recursive parent-child-relationships are created:
12452 QCPItemAnchor *currentParent = parentAnchor;
12453 while (currentParent)
12454 {
12455 if (QCPItemPosition *currentParentPos = currentParent->toQCPItemPosition())
12456 {
12457 // is a QCPItemPosition, might have further parent, so keep iterating
12458 if (currentParentPos == this)
12459 {
12460 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't create recursive parent-child-relationship" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12461 return false;
12462 }
12463 currentParent = currentParentPos->parentAnchorY();
12464 } else
12465 {
12466 // is a QCPItemAnchor, can't have further parent. Now make sure the parent items aren't the
12467 // same, to prevent a position being child of an anchor which itself depends on the position,
12468 // because they're both on the same item:
12469 if (currentParent->mParentItem == mParentItem)
12470 {
12471 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't set parent to be an anchor which itself depends on this position" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(parentAnchor);
12472 return false;
12473 }
12474 break;
12475 }
12476 }
12477
12478 // if previously no parent set and PosType is still ptPlotCoords, set to ptAbsolute:
12479 if (!mParentAnchorY && mPositionTypeY == ptPlotCoords)
12480 setTypeY(ptAbsolute);
12481
12482 // save pixel position:
12483 QPointF pixelP;
12484 if (keepPixelPosition)
12485 pixelP = pixelPosition();
12486 // unregister at current parent anchor:
12487 if (mParentAnchorY)
12488 mParentAnchorY->removeChildY(this);
12489 // register at new parent anchor:
12490 if (parentAnchor)
12491 parentAnchor->addChildY(this);
12492 mParentAnchorY = parentAnchor;
12493 // restore pixel position under new parent:
12494 if (keepPixelPosition)
12495 setPixelPosition(pixelP);
12496 else
12497 setCoords(coords().x(), 0);
12498 return true;
12499}
12500
12518void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(double key, double value)
12519{
12520 mKey = key;
12521 mValue = value;
12522}
12523
12529void QCPItemPosition::setCoords(const QPointF &pos)
12530{
12531 setCoords(pos.x(), pos.y());
12532}
12533
12540QPointF QCPItemPosition::pixelPosition() const
12541{
12542 QPointF result;
12543
12544 // determine X:
12545 switch (mPositionTypeX)
12546 {
12547 case ptAbsolute:
12548 {
12549 result.rx() = mKey;
12550 if (mParentAnchorX)
12551 result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12552 break;
12553 }
12554 case ptViewportRatio:
12555 {
12556 result.rx() = mKey*mParentPlot->viewport().width();
12557 if (mParentAnchorX)
12558 result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12559 else
12560 result.rx() += mParentPlot->viewport().left();
12561 break;
12562 }
12563 case ptAxisRectRatio:
12564 {
12565 if (mAxisRect)
12566 {
12567 result.rx() = mKey*mAxisRect.data()->width();
12568 if (mParentAnchorX)
12569 result.rx() += mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12570 else
12571 result.rx() += mAxisRect.data()->left();
12572 } else
12573 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12574 break;
12575 }
12576 case ptPlotCoords:
12577 {
12578 if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12579 result.rx() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
12580 else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12581 result.rx() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
12582 else
12583 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12584 break;
12585 }
12586 }
12587
12588 // determine Y:
12589 switch (mPositionTypeY)
12590 {
12591 case ptAbsolute:
12592 {
12593 result.ry() = mValue;
12594 if (mParentAnchorY)
12595 result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12596 break;
12597 }
12598 case ptViewportRatio:
12599 {
12600 result.ry() = mValue*mParentPlot->viewport().height();
12601 if (mParentAnchorY)
12602 result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12603 else
12604 result.ry() += mParentPlot->viewport().top();
12605 break;
12606 }
12607 case ptAxisRectRatio:
12608 {
12609 if (mAxisRect)
12610 {
12611 result.ry() = mValue*mAxisRect.data()->height();
12612 if (mParentAnchorY)
12613 result.ry() += mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12614 else
12615 result.ry() += mAxisRect.data()->top();
12616 } else
12617 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12618 break;
12619 }
12620 case ptPlotCoords:
12621 {
12622 if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12623 result.ry() = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey);
12624 else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12625 result.ry() = mValueAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mValue);
12626 else
12627 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12628 break;
12629 }
12630 }
12631
12632 return result;
12633}
12634
12640void QCPItemPosition::setAxes(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
12641{
12642 mKeyAxis = keyAxis;
12643 mValueAxis = valueAxis;
12644}
12645
12651void QCPItemPosition::setAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *axisRect)
12652{
12653 mAxisRect = axisRect;
12654}
12655
12666void QCPItemPosition::setPixelPosition(const QPointF &pixelPosition)
12667{
12668 double x = pixelPosition.x();
12669 double y = pixelPosition.y();
12670
12671 switch (mPositionTypeX)
12672 {
12673 case ptAbsolute:
12674 {
12675 if (mParentAnchorX)
12676 x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12677 break;
12678 }
12679 case ptViewportRatio:
12680 {
12681 if (mParentAnchorX)
12682 x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12683 else
12684 x -= mParentPlot->viewport().left();
12685 x /= double(mParentPlot->viewport().width());
12686 break;
12687 }
12688 case ptAxisRectRatio:
12689 {
12690 if (mAxisRect)
12691 {
12692 if (mParentAnchorX)
12693 x -= mParentAnchorX->pixelPosition().x();
12694 else
12695 x -= mAxisRect.data()->left();
12696 x /= double(mAxisRect.data()->width());
12697 } else
12698 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12699 break;
12700 }
12701 case ptPlotCoords:
12702 {
12703 if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12704 x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
12705 else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
12706 y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(x);
12707 else
12708 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type x is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12709 break;
12710 }
12711 }
12712
12713 switch (mPositionTypeY)
12714 {
12715 case ptAbsolute:
12716 {
12717 if (mParentAnchorY)
12718 y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12719 break;
12720 }
12721 case ptViewportRatio:
12722 {
12723 if (mParentAnchorY)
12724 y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12725 else
12726 y -= mParentPlot->viewport().top();
12727 y /= double(mParentPlot->viewport().height());
12728 break;
12729 }
12730 case ptAxisRectRatio:
12731 {
12732 if (mAxisRect)
12733 {
12734 if (mParentAnchorY)
12735 y -= mParentAnchorY->pixelPosition().y();
12736 else
12737 y -= mAxisRect.data()->top();
12738 y /= double(mAxisRect.data()->height());
12739 } else
12740 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptAxisRectRatio, but no axis rect was defined";
12741 break;
12742 }
12743 case ptPlotCoords:
12744 {
12745 if (mKeyAxis && mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12746 x = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
12747 else if (mValueAxis && mValueAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
12748 y = mValueAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(y);
12749 else
12750 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item position type y is ptPlotCoords, but no axes were defined";
12751 break;
12752 }
12753 }
12754
12755 setCoords(x, y);
12756}
12757
12758
12762
12888/* start of documentation of inline functions */

12905/* end of documentation of inline functions */

12927
12931QCPAbstractItem::QCPAbstractItem(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
12932 QCPLayerable(parentPlot),
12933 mClipToAxisRect(false),
12934 mSelectable(true),
12935 mSelected(false)
12936{
12937 parentPlot->registerItem(this);
12938
12939 QList<QCPAxisRect*> rects = parentPlot->axisRects();
12940 if (!rects.isEmpty())
12941 {
12942 setClipToAxisRect(true);
12943 setClipAxisRect(rects.first());
12944 }
12945}
12946
12947QCPAbstractItem::~QCPAbstractItem()
12948{
12949 // don't delete mPositions because every position is also an anchor and thus in mAnchors
12950 qDeleteAll(mAnchors);
12951}
12952
12953/* can't make this a header inline function, because QPointer breaks with forward declared types, see QTBUG-29588 */
12954QCPAxisRect *QCPAbstractItem::clipAxisRect() const
12955{
12956 return mClipAxisRect.data();
12957}
12958
12965void QCPAbstractItem::setClipToAxisRect(bool clip)
12966{
12967 mClipToAxisRect = clip;
12968 if (mClipToAxisRect)
12969 setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
12970}
12971
12978void QCPAbstractItem::setClipAxisRect(QCPAxisRect *rect)
12979{
12980 mClipAxisRect = rect;
12981 if (mClipToAxisRect)
12982 setParentLayerable(mClipAxisRect.data());
12983}
12984
12994void QCPAbstractItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
12995{
12996 if (mSelectable != selectable)
12997 {
12998 mSelectable = selectable;
12999 emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13000 }
13001}
13002
13017void QCPAbstractItem::setSelected(bool selected)
13018{
13019 if (mSelected != selected)
13020 {
13021 mSelected = selected;
13022 emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
13023 }
13024}
13025
13036QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::position(const QString &name) const
13037{
13038 foreach (QCPItemPosition *position, mPositions)
13039 {
13040 if (position->name() == name)
13041 return position;
13042 }
13043 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "position with name not found:" << name;
13044 return nullptr;
13045}
13046
13057QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::anchor(const QString &name) const
13058{
13059 foreach (QCPItemAnchor *anchor, mAnchors)
13060 {
13061 if (anchor->name() == name)
13062 return anchor;
13063 }
13064 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor with name not found:" << name;
13065 return nullptr;
13066}
13067
13076bool QCPAbstractItem::hasAnchor(const QString &name) const
13077{
13078 foreach (QCPItemAnchor *anchor, mAnchors)
13079 {
13080 if (anchor->name() == name)
13081 return true;
13082 }
13083 return false;
13084}
13085
13095QRect QCPAbstractItem::clipRect() const
13096{
13097 if (mClipToAxisRect && mClipAxisRect)
13098 return mClipAxisRect.data()->rect();
13099 else
13100 return mParentPlot->viewport();
13101}
13102
13116void QCPAbstractItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13117{
13118 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeItems);
13119}
13120
13134double QCPAbstractItem::rectDistance(const QRectF &rect, const QPointF &pos, bool filledRect) const
13135{
13136 double result = -1;
13137
13138 // distance to border:
13139 const QList<QLineF> lines = QList<QLineF>() << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.topRight()) << QLineF(rect.bottomLeft(), rect.bottomRight())
13140 << QLineF(rect.topLeft(), rect.bottomLeft()) << QLineF(rect.topRight(), rect.bottomRight());
13141 const QCPVector2D posVec(pos);
13142 double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
13143 foreach (const QLineF &line, lines)
13144 {
13145 double distSqr = posVec.distanceSquaredToLine(line.p1(), line.p2());
13146 if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
13147 minDistSqr = distSqr;
13148 }
13149 result = qSqrt(minDistSqr);
13150
13151 // filled rect, allow click inside to count as hit:
13152 if (filledRect && result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99)
13153 {
13154 if (rect.contains(pos))
13155 result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13156 }
13157 return result;
13158}
13159
13170QPointF QCPAbstractItem::anchorPixelPosition(int anchorId) const
13171{
13172 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "called on item which shouldn't have any anchors (this method not reimplemented). anchorId" << anchorId;
13173 return {};
13174}
13175
13190QCPItemPosition *QCPAbstractItem::createPosition(const QString &name)
13191{
13192 if (hasAnchor(name))
13193 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
13194 QCPItemPosition *newPosition = new QCPItemPosition(mParentPlot, this, name);
13195 mPositions.append(newPosition);
13196 mAnchors.append(newPosition); // every position is also an anchor
13197 newPosition->setAxes(mParentPlot->xAxis, mParentPlot->yAxis);
13198 newPosition->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
13199 if (mParentPlot->axisRect())
13200 newPosition->setAxisRect(mParentPlot->axisRect());
13201 newPosition->setCoords(0, 0);
13202 return newPosition;
13203}
13204
13224QCPItemAnchor *QCPAbstractItem::createAnchor(const QString &name, int anchorId)
13225{
13226 if (hasAnchor(name))
13227 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "anchor/position with name exists already:" << name;
13228 QCPItemAnchor *newAnchor = new QCPItemAnchor(mParentPlot, this, name, anchorId);
13229 mAnchors.append(newAnchor);
13230 return newAnchor;
13231}
13232
13233/* inherits documentation from base class */
13234void QCPAbstractItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13235{
13236 Q_UNUSED(event)
13237 Q_UNUSED(details)
13238 if (mSelectable)
13239 {
13240 bool selBefore = mSelected;
13241 setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
13242 if (selectionStateChanged)
13243 *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13244 }
13245}
13246
13247/* inherits documentation from base class */
13248void QCPAbstractItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13249{
13250 if (mSelectable)
13251 {
13252 bool selBefore = mSelected;
13253 setSelected(false);
13254 if (selectionStateChanged)
13255 *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13256 }
13257}
13258
13259/* inherits documentation from base class */
13260QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractItem::selectionCategory() const
13261{
13262 return QCP::iSelectItems;
13263}

13493/* end of documentation of signals */

13495
13592/* end of documentation of public members */
13593
13597QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
13598 QWidget(parent),
13599 xAxis(nullptr),
13600 yAxis(nullptr),
13601 xAxis2(nullptr),
13602 yAxis2(nullptr),
13603 legend(nullptr),
13604 mBufferDevicePixelRatio(1.0), // will be adapted to true value below
13605 mPlotLayout(nullptr),
13606 mAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true),
13607 mAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
13608 mNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone),
13609 mInteractions(QCP::iNone),
13610 mSelectionTolerance(8),
13611 mNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false),
13612 mBackgroundBrush(Qt::white, Qt::SolidPattern),
13613 mBackgroundScaled(true),
13614 mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
13615 mCurrentLayer(nullptr),
13616 mPlottingHints(QCP::phCacheLabels|QCP::phImmediateRefresh),
13617 mMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier),
13618 mSelectionRectMode(QCP::srmNone),
13619 mSelectionRect(nullptr),
13620 mOpenGl(false),
13621 mMouseHasMoved(false),
13622 mMouseEventLayerable(nullptr),
13623 mMouseSignalLayerable(nullptr),
13624 mReplotting(false),
13625 mReplotQueued(false),
13626 mReplotTime(0),
13627 mReplotTimeAverage(0),
13628 mOpenGlMultisamples(16),
13629 mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup(QCP::aeNone),
13630 mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup(true)
13631{
13632 setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
13633 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
13634 setMouseTracking(true);
13635 QLocale currentLocale = locale();
13636 currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
13637 setLocale(currentLocale);
13638#ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
13639# ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_FLOAT
13640 setBufferDevicePixelRatio(QWidget::devicePixelRatioF());
13641# else
13642 setBufferDevicePixelRatio(QWidget::devicePixelRatio());
13643# endif
13644#endif
13645
13646 mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup = mAntialiasedElements;
13647 mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup = mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels);
13648 // create initial layers:
13649 mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("background")));
13650 mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("grid")));
13651 mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("main")));
13652 mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("axes")));
13653 mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("legend")));
13654 mLayers.append(new QCPLayer(this, QLatin1String("overlay")));
13655 updateLayerIndices();
13656 setCurrentLayer(QLatin1String("main"));
13657 layer(QLatin1String("overlay"))->setMode(QCPLayer::lmBuffered);
13658
13659 // create initial layout, axis rect and legend:
13660 mPlotLayout = new QCPLayoutGrid;
13661 mPlotLayout->initializeParentPlot(this);
13662 mPlotLayout->setParent(this); // important because if parent is QWidget, QCPLayout::sizeConstraintsChanged will call QWidget::updateGeometry
13663 mPlotLayout->setLayer(QLatin1String("main"));
13664 QCPAxisRect *defaultAxisRect = new QCPAxisRect(this, true);
13665 mPlotLayout->addElement(0, 0, defaultAxisRect);
13666 xAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
13667 yAxis = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
13668 xAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
13669 yAxis2 = defaultAxisRect->axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
13670 legend = new QCPLegend;
13671 legend->setVisible(false);
13672 defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->addElement(legend, Qt::AlignRight|Qt::AlignTop);
13673 defaultAxisRect->insetLayout()->setMargins(QMargins(12, 12, 12, 12));
13674
13675 defaultAxisRect->setLayer(QLatin1String("background"));
13676 xAxis->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13677 yAxis->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13678 xAxis2->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13679 yAxis2->setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13680 xAxis->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13681 yAxis->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13682 xAxis2->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13683 yAxis2->grid()->setLayer(QLatin1String("grid"));
13684 legend->setLayer(QLatin1String("legend"));
13685
13686 // create selection rect instance:
13687 mSelectionRect = new QCPSelectionRect(this);
13688 mSelectionRect->setLayer(QLatin1String("overlay"));
13689
13690 setViewport(rect()); // needs to be called after mPlotLayout has been created
13691
13692 replot(rpQueuedReplot);
13693}
13694
13695QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
13696{
13697 clearPlottables();
13698 clearItems();
13699
13700 if (mPlotLayout)
13701 {
13702 delete mPlotLayout;
13703 mPlotLayout = nullptr;
13704 }
13705
13706 mCurrentLayer = nullptr;
13707 qDeleteAll(mLayers); // don't use removeLayer, because it would prevent the last layer to be removed
13708 mLayers.clear();
13709}
13710
13728void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
13729{
13730 mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
13731
13732 // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13733 if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13734 mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
13735}
13736
13744void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
13745{
13746 if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
13747 mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
13748 else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
13749 mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
13750
13751 // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13752 if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13753 mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
13754}
13755
13774void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
13775{
13776 mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
13777
13778 // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13779 if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13780 mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
13781}
13782
13790void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
13791{
13792 if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
13793 mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
13794 else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
13795 mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
13796
13797 // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
13798 if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
13799 mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
13800}
13801
13808void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
13809{
13810 mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
13811}
13812
13867void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const QCP::Interactions &interactions)
13868{
13869 mInteractions = interactions;
13870}
13871
13879void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCP::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
13880{
13881 if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
13882 mInteractions &= ~interaction;
13883 else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
13884 mInteractions |= interaction;
13885}
13886
13900void QCustomPlot::setSelectionTolerance(int pixels)
13901{
13902 mSelectionTolerance = pixels;
13903}
13904
13914void QCustomPlot::setNoAntialiasingOnDrag(bool enabled)
13915{
13916 mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
13917}
13918
13924void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
13925{
13926 mPlottingHints = hints;
13927}
13928
13934void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
13935{
13936 QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
13937 if (!enabled)
13938 newHints &= ~hint;
13939 else
13940 newHints |= hint;
13941
13942 if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
13943 setPlottingHints(newHints);
13944}
13945
13956void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
13957{
13958 mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
13959}
13960
13981void QCustomPlot::setSelectionRectMode(QCP::SelectionRectMode mode)
13982{
13983 if (mSelectionRect)
13984 {
13985 if (mode == QCP::srmNone)
13986 mSelectionRect->cancel(); // when switching to none, we immediately want to abort a potentially active selection rect
13987
13988 // disconnect old connections:
13989 if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmSelect)
13990 disconnect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectSelection(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13991 else if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmZoom)
13992 disconnect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectZoom(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13993
13994 // establish new ones:
13995 if (mode == QCP::srmSelect)
13996 connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectSelection(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13997 else if (mode == QCP::srmZoom)
13998 connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectZoom(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
13999 }
14000
14001 mSelectionRectMode = mode;
14002}
14003
14014void QCustomPlot::setSelectionRect(QCPSelectionRect *selectionRect)
14015{
14016 delete mSelectionRect;
14017
14018 mSelectionRect = selectionRect;
14019
14020 if (mSelectionRect)
14021 {
14022 // establish connections with new selection rect:
14023 if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmSelect)
14024 connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectSelection(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
14025 else if (mSelectionRectMode == QCP::srmZoom)
14026 connect(mSelectionRect, SIGNAL(accepted(QRect,QMouseEvent*)), this, SLOT(processRectZoom(QRect,QMouseEvent*)));
14027 }
14028}
14029
14066void QCustomPlot::setOpenGl(bool enabled, int multisampling)
14067{
14068 mOpenGlMultisamples = qMax(0, multisampling);
14069#ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_USE_OPENGL
14070 mOpenGl = enabled;
14071 if (mOpenGl)
14072 {
14073 if (setupOpenGl())
14074 {
14075 // backup antialiasing override and labelcaching setting so we can restore upon disabling OpenGL
14076 mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup = mAntialiasedElements;
14077 mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup = mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels);
14078 // set antialiasing override to antialias all (aligns gl pixel grid properly), and disable label caching (would use software rasterizer for pixmap caches):
14079 setAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
14080 setPlottingHint(QCP::phCacheLabels, false);
14081 } else
14082 {
14083 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Failed to enable OpenGL, continuing plotting without hardware acceleration.";
14084 mOpenGl = false;
14085 }
14086 } else
14087 {
14088 // restore antialiasing override and labelcaching to what it was before enabling OpenGL, if nobody changed it in the meantime:
14089 if (mAntialiasedElements == QCP::aeAll)
14090 setAntialiasedElements(mOpenGlAntialiasedElementsBackup);
14091 if (!mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phCacheLabels))
14092 setPlottingHint(QCP::phCacheLabels, mOpenGlCacheLabelsBackup);
14093 freeOpenGl();
14094 }
14095 // recreate all paint buffers:
14096 mPaintBuffers.clear();
14097 setupPaintBuffers();
14098#else
14099 Q_UNUSED(enabled)
14100 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "QCustomPlot can't use OpenGL because QCUSTOMPLOT_USE_OPENGL was not defined during compilation (add 'DEFINES += QCUSTOMPLOT_USE_OPENGL' to your qmake .pro file)";
14101#endif
14102}
14103
14120void QCustomPlot::setViewport(const QRect &rect)
14121{
14122 mViewport = rect;
14123 if (mPlotLayout)
14124 mPlotLayout->setOuterRect(mViewport);
14125}
14126
14138void QCustomPlot::setBufferDevicePixelRatio(double ratio)
14139{
14140 if (!qFuzzyCompare(ratio, mBufferDevicePixelRatio))
14141 {
14142#ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
14143 mBufferDevicePixelRatio = ratio;
14144 foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
14145 buffer->setDevicePixelRatio(mBufferDevicePixelRatio);
14146 // Note: axis label cache has devicePixelRatio as part of cache hash, so no need to manually clear cache here
14147#else
14148 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Device pixel ratios not supported for Qt versions before 5.4";
14149 mBufferDevicePixelRatio = 1.0;
14150#endif
14151 }
14152}
14153
14169void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
14170{
14171 mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
14172 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
14173}
14174
14188void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
14189{
14190 mBackgroundBrush = brush;
14191}
14192
14200void QCustomPlot::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
14201{
14202 mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
14203 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
14204 mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
14205 mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
14206}
14207
14218void QCustomPlot::setBackgroundScaled(bool scaled)
14219{
14220 mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
14221}
14222
14229void QCustomPlot::setBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
14230{
14231 mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
14232}
14233
14242QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index)
14243{
14244 if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
14245 {
14246 return mPlottables.at(index);
14247 } else
14248 {
14249 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14250 return nullptr;
14251 }
14252}
14253
14261QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable()
14262{
14263 if (!mPlottables.isEmpty())
14264 {
14265 return mPlottables.last();
14266 } else
14267 return nullptr;
14268}
14269
14278bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
14279{
14280 if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable))
14281 {
14282 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
14283 return false;
14284 }
14285
14286 // remove plottable from legend:
14287 plottable->removeFromLegend();
14288 // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
14289 if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
14290 mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
14291 // remove plottable:
14292 delete plottable;
14293 mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
14294 return true;
14295}
14296
14301bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index)
14302{
14303 if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
14304 return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
14305 else
14306 {
14307 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14308 return false;
14309 }
14310}
14311
14320int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables()
14321{
14322 int c = mPlottables.size();
14323 for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
14324 removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
14325 return c;
14326}
14327
14333int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const
14334{
14335 return mPlottables.size();
14336}
14337
14345QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const
14346{
14347 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
14348 foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mPlottables)
14349 {
14350 if (plottable->selected())
14351 result.append(plottable);
14352 }
14353 return result;
14354}
14355
14365QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, int *dataIndex) const
14366{
14367 return plottableAt<QCPAbstractPlottable>(pos, onlySelectable, dataIndex);
14368}
14369
14373bool QCustomPlot::hasPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
14374{
14375 return mPlottables.contains(plottable);
14376}
14377
14386QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph(int index) const
14387{
14388 if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
14389 {
14390 return mGraphs.at(index);
14391 } else
14392 {
14393 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14394 return nullptr;
14395 }
14396}
14397
14405QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph() const
14406{
14407 if (!mGraphs.isEmpty())
14408 {
14409 return mGraphs.last();
14410 } else
14411 return nullptr;
14412}
14413
14426QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::addGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
14427{
14428 if (!keyAxis) keyAxis = xAxis;
14429 if (!valueAxis) valueAxis = yAxis;
14430 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis)
14431 {
14432 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't use default QCustomPlot xAxis or yAxis, because at least one is invalid (has been deleted)";
14433 return nullptr;
14434 }
14435 if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != this || valueAxis->parentPlot() != this)
14436 {
14437 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed keyAxis or valueAxis doesn't have this QCustomPlot as parent";
14438 return nullptr;
14439 }
14440
14441 QCPGraph *newGraph = new QCPGraph(keyAxis, valueAxis);
14442 newGraph->setName(QLatin1String("Graph ")+QString::number(mGraphs.size()));
14443 return newGraph;
14444}
14445
14456bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
14457{
14458 return removePlottable(graph);
14459}
14460
14465bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(int index)
14466{
14467 if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
14468 return removeGraph(mGraphs[index]);
14469 else
14470 return false;
14471}
14472
14481int QCustomPlot::clearGraphs()
14482{
14483 int c = mGraphs.size();
14484 for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
14485 removeGraph(mGraphs[i]);
14486 return c;
14487}
14488
14494int QCustomPlot::graphCount() const
14495{
14496 return mGraphs.size();
14497}
14498
14507QList<QCPGraph*> QCustomPlot::selectedGraphs() const
14508{
14509 QList<QCPGraph*> result;
14510 foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mGraphs)
14511 {
14512 if (graph->selected())
14513 result.append(graph);
14514 }
14515 return result;
14516}
14517
14526QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item(int index) const
14527{
14528 if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
14529 {
14530 return mItems.at(index);
14531 } else
14532 {
14533 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14534 return nullptr;
14535 }
14536}
14537
14545QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item() const
14546{
14547 if (!mItems.isEmpty())
14548 {
14549 return mItems.last();
14550 } else
14551 return nullptr;
14552}
14553
14561bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
14562{
14563 if (mItems.contains(item))
14564 {
14565 delete item;
14566 mItems.removeOne(item);
14567 return true;
14568 } else
14569 {
14570 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
14571 return false;
14572 }
14573}
14574
14579bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(int index)
14580{
14581 if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
14582 return removeItem(mItems[index]);
14583 else
14584 {
14585 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14586 return false;
14587 }
14588}
14589
14597int QCustomPlot::clearItems()
14598{
14599 int c = mItems.size();
14600 for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
14601 removeItem(mItems[i]);
14602 return c;
14603}
14604
14610int QCustomPlot::itemCount() const
14611{
14612 return mItems.size();
14613}
14614
14620QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCustomPlot::selectedItems() const
14621{
14622 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
14623 foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mItems)
14624 {
14625 if (item->selected())
14626 result.append(item);
14627 }
14628 return result;
14629}
14630
14640QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::itemAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
14641{
14642 return itemAt<QCPAbstractItem>(pos, onlySelectable);
14643}
14644
14650bool QCustomPlot::hasItem(QCPAbstractItem *item) const
14651{
14652 return mItems.contains(item);
14653}
14654
14663QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(const QString &name) const
14664{
14665 foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
14666 {
14667 if (layer->name() == name)
14668 return layer;
14669 }
14670 return nullptr;
14671}
14672
14679QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(int index) const
14680{
14681 if (index >= 0 && index < mLayers.size())
14682 {
14683 return mLayers.at(index);
14684 } else
14685 {
14686 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
14687 return nullptr;
14688 }
14689}
14690
14694QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::currentLayer() const
14695{
14696 return mCurrentLayer;
14697}
14698
14709bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(const QString &name)
14710{
14711 if (QCPLayer *newCurrentLayer = layer(name))
14712 {
14713 return setCurrentLayer(newCurrentLayer);
14714 } else
14715 {
14716 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer with name doesn't exist:" << name;
14717 return false;
14718 }
14719}
14720
14729bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
14730{
14731 if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
14732 {
14733 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
14734 return false;
14735 }
14736
14737 mCurrentLayer = layer;
14738 return true;
14739}
14740
14746int QCustomPlot::layerCount() const
14747{
14748 return mLayers.size();
14749}
14750
14764bool QCustomPlot::addLayer(const QString &name, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
14765{
14766 if (!otherLayer)
14767 otherLayer = mLayers.last();
14768 if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
14769 {
14770 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
14771 return false;
14772 }
14773 if (layer(name))
14774 {
14775 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "A layer exists already with the name" << name;
14776 return false;
14777 }
14778
14779 QCPLayer *newLayer = new QCPLayer(this, name);
14780 mLayers.insert(otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0), newLayer);
14781 updateLayerIndices();
14782 setupPaintBuffers(); // associates new layer with the appropriate paint buffer
14783 return true;
14784}
14785
14800bool QCustomPlot::removeLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
14801{
14802 if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
14803 {
14804 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
14805 return false;
14806 }
14807 if (mLayers.size() < 2)
14808 {
14809 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't remove last layer";
14810 return false;
14811 }
14812
14813 // append all children of this layer to layer below (if this is lowest layer, prepend to layer above)
14814 int removedIndex = layer->index();
14815 bool isFirstLayer = removedIndex==0;
14816 QCPLayer *targetLayer = isFirstLayer ? mLayers.at(removedIndex+1) : mLayers.at(removedIndex-1);
14817 QList<QCPLayerable*> children = layer->children();
14818 if (isFirstLayer) // prepend in reverse order (such that relative order stays the same)
14819 std::reverse(children.begin(), children.end());
14820 foreach (QCPLayerable *child, children)
14821 child->moveToLayer(targetLayer, isFirstLayer); // prepend if isFirstLayer, otherwise append
14822
14823 // if removed layer is current layer, change current layer to layer below/above:
14824 if (layer == mCurrentLayer)
14825 setCurrentLayer(targetLayer);
14826
14827 // invalidate the paint buffer that was responsible for this layer:
14828 if (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> pb = layer->mPaintBuffer.toStrongRef())
14829 pb->setInvalidated();
14830
14831 // remove layer:
14832 delete layer;
14833 mLayers.removeOne(layer);
14834 updateLayerIndices();
14835 return true;
14836}
14837
14847bool QCustomPlot::moveLayer(QCPLayer *layer, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
14848{
14849 if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
14850 {
14851 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
14852 return false;
14853 }
14854 if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
14855 {
14856 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
14857 return false;
14858 }
14859
14860 if (layer->index() > otherLayer->index())
14861 mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0));
14862 else if (layer->index() < otherLayer->index())
14863 mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 0:-1));
14864
14865 // invalidate the paint buffers that are responsible for the layers:
14866 if (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> pb = layer->mPaintBuffer.toStrongRef())
14867 pb->setInvalidated();
14868 if (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> pb = otherLayer->mPaintBuffer.toStrongRef())
14869 pb->setInvalidated();
14870
14871 updateLayerIndices();
14872 return true;
14873}
14874
14884int QCustomPlot::axisRectCount() const
14885{
14886 return axisRects().size();
14887}
14888
14908QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRect(int index) const
14909{
14910 const QList<QCPAxisRect*> rectList = axisRects();
14911 if (index >= 0 && index < rectList.size())
14912 {
14913 return rectList.at(index);
14914 } else
14915 {
14916 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis rect index" << index;
14917 return nullptr;
14918 }
14919}
14920
14932QList<QCPAxisRect*> QCustomPlot::axisRects() const
14933{
14934 QList<QCPAxisRect*> result;
14935 QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
14936 if (mPlotLayout)
14937 elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
14938
14939 while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
14940 {
14941 foreach (QCPLayoutElement *element, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
14942 {
14943 if (element)
14944 {
14945 elementStack.push(element);
14946 if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(element))
14947 result.append(ar);
14948 }
14949 }
14950 }
14951
14952 return result;
14953}
14954
14964QCPLayoutElement *QCustomPlot::layoutElementAt(const QPointF &pos) const
14965{
14966 QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
14967 bool searchSubElements = true;
14968 while (searchSubElements && currentElement)
14969 {
14970 searchSubElements = false;
14971 foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false))
14972 {
14973 if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() && subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0)
14974 {
14975 currentElement = subElement;
14976 searchSubElements = true;
14977 break;
14978 }
14979 }
14980 }
14981 return currentElement;
14982}
14983
14994QCPAxisRect *QCustomPlot::axisRectAt(const QPointF &pos) const
14995{
14996 QCPAxisRect *result = nullptr;
14997 QCPLayoutElement *currentElement = mPlotLayout;
14998 bool searchSubElements = true;
14999 while (searchSubElements && currentElement)
15000 {
15001 searchSubElements = false;
15002 foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, currentElement->elements(false))
15003 {
15004 if (subElement && subElement->realVisibility() && subElement->selectTest(pos, false) >= 0)
15005 {
15006 currentElement = subElement;
15007 searchSubElements = true;
15008 if (QCPAxisRect *ar = qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(currentElement))
15009 result = ar;
15010 break;
15011 }
15012 }
15013 }
15014 return result;
15015}
15016
15024QList<QCPAxis*> QCustomPlot::selectedAxes() const
15025{
15026 QList<QCPAxis*> result, allAxes;
15027 foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
15028 allAxes << rect->axes();
15029
15030 foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
15031 {
15032 if (axis->selectedParts() != QCPAxis::spNone)
15033 result.append(axis);
15034 }
15035
15036 return result;
15037}
15038
15046QList<QCPLegend*> QCustomPlot::selectedLegends() const
15047{
15048 QList<QCPLegend*> result;
15049
15050 QStack<QCPLayoutElement*> elementStack;
15051 if (mPlotLayout)
15052 elementStack.push(mPlotLayout);
15053
15054 while (!elementStack.isEmpty())
15055 {
15056 foreach (QCPLayoutElement *subElement, elementStack.pop()->elements(false))
15057 {
15058 if (subElement)
15059 {
15060 elementStack.push(subElement);
15061 if (QCPLegend *leg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(subElement))
15062 {
15063 if (leg->selectedParts() != QCPLegend::spNone)
15064 result.append(leg);
15065 }
15066 }
15067 }
15068 }
15069
15070 return result;
15071}
15072
15082void QCustomPlot::deselectAll()
15083{
15084 foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
15085 {
15086 foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
15087 layerable->deselectEvent(nullptr);
15088 }
15089}
15090
15118void QCustomPlot::replot(QCustomPlot::RefreshPriority refreshPriority)
15119{
15120 if (refreshPriority == QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot)
15121 {
15122 if (!mReplotQueued)
15123 {
15124 mReplotQueued = true;
15125 QTimer::singleShot(0, this, SLOT(replot()));
15126 }
15127 return;
15128 }
15129
15130 if (mReplotting) // incase signals loop back to replot slot
15131 return;
15132 mReplotting = true;
15133 mReplotQueued = false;
15134 emit beforeReplot();
15135
15136# if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 8, 0)
15137 QTime replotTimer;
15138 replotTimer.start();
15139# else
15140 QElapsedTimer replotTimer;
15141 replotTimer.start();
15142# endif
15143
15144 updateLayout();
15145 // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...) into their buffers:
15146 setupPaintBuffers();
15147 foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
15148 layer->drawToPaintBuffer();
15149 foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15150 buffer->setInvalidated(false);
15151
15152 if ((refreshPriority == rpRefreshHint && mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phImmediateRefresh)) || refreshPriority==rpImmediateRefresh)
15153 repaint();
15154 else
15155 update();
15156
15157# if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 8, 0)
15158 mReplotTime = replotTimer.elapsed();
15159# else
15160 mReplotTime = replotTimer.nsecsElapsed()*1e-6;
15161# endif
15162 if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mReplotTimeAverage))
15163 mReplotTimeAverage = mReplotTimeAverage*0.9 + mReplotTime*0.1; // exponential moving average with a time constant of 10 last replots
15164 else
15165 mReplotTimeAverage = mReplotTime; // no previous replots to average with, so initialize with replot time
15166
15167 emit afterReplot();
15168 mReplotting = false;
15169}
15170
15177double QCustomPlot::replotTime(bool average) const
15178{
15179 return average ? mReplotTimeAverage : mReplotTime;
15180}
15181
15190void QCustomPlot::rescaleAxes(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
15191{
15192 QList<QCPAxis*> allAxes;
15193 foreach (QCPAxisRect *rect, axisRects())
15194 allAxes << rect->axes();
15195
15196 foreach (QCPAxis *axis, allAxes)
15197 axis->rescale(onlyVisiblePlottables);
15198}
15199
15237bool QCustomPlot::savePdf(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, QCP::ExportPen exportPen, const QString &pdfCreator, const QString &pdfTitle)
15238{
15239 bool success = false;
15240#ifdef QT_NO_PRINTER
15241 Q_UNUSED(fileName)
15242 Q_UNUSED(exportPen)
15243 Q_UNUSED(width)
15244 Q_UNUSED(height)
15245 Q_UNUSED(pdfCreator)
15246 Q_UNUSED(pdfTitle)
15247 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Qt was built without printer support (QT_NO_PRINTER). PDF not created.";
15248#else
15249 int newWidth, newHeight;
15250 if (width == 0 || height == 0)
15251 {
15252 newWidth = this->width();
15253 newHeight = this->height();
15254 } else
15255 {
15256 newWidth = width;
15257 newHeight = height;
15258 }
15259
15260 QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
15261 printer.setOutputFileName(fileName);
15262 printer.setOutputFormat(QPrinter::PdfFormat);
15263 printer.setColorMode(QPrinter::Color);
15264 printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_Creator, pdfCreator);
15265 printer.printEngine()->setProperty(QPrintEngine::PPK_DocumentName, pdfTitle);
15266 QRect oldViewport = viewport();
15267 setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
15268#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 3, 0)
15269 printer.setFullPage(true);
15270 printer.setPaperSize(viewport().size(), QPrinter::DevicePixel);
15271#else
15272 QPageLayout pageLayout;
15273 pageLayout.setMode(QPageLayout::FullPageMode);
15274 pageLayout.setOrientation(QPageLayout::Portrait);
15275 pageLayout.setMargins(QMarginsF(0, 0, 0, 0));
15276 pageLayout.setPageSize(QPageSize(viewport().size(), QPageSize::Point, QString(), QPageSize::ExactMatch));
15277 printer.setPageLayout(pageLayout);
15278#endif
15279 QCPPainter printpainter;
15280 if (printpainter.begin(&printer))
15281 {
15282 printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmVectorized);
15283 printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
15284 printpainter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic, exportPen==QCP::epNoCosmetic);
15285 printpainter.setWindow(mViewport);
15286 if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush &&
15287 mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::white &&
15288 mBackgroundBrush.color() != Qt::transparent &&
15289 mBackgroundBrush.color().alpha() > 0) // draw pdf background color if not white/transparent
15290 printpainter.fillRect(viewport(), mBackgroundBrush);
15291 draw(&printpainter);
15292 printpainter.end();
15293 success = true;
15294 }
15295 setViewport(oldViewport);
15296#endif // QT_NO_PRINTER
15297 return success;
15298}
15299
15345bool QCustomPlot::savePng(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
15346{
15347 return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "PNG", quality, resolution, resolutionUnit);
15348}
15349
15392bool QCustomPlot::saveJpg(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
15393{
15394 return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "JPG", quality, resolution, resolutionUnit);
15395}
15396
15436bool QCustomPlot::saveBmp(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
15437{
15438 return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "BMP", -1, resolution, resolutionUnit);
15439}
15440
15449QSize QCustomPlot::minimumSizeHint() const
15450{
15451 return mPlotLayout->minimumOuterSizeHint();
15452}
15453
15459QSize QCustomPlot::sizeHint() const
15460{
15461 return mPlotLayout->minimumOuterSizeHint();
15462}
15463
15469void QCustomPlot::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event)
15470{
15471 Q_UNUSED(event)
15472
15473 // detect if the device pixel ratio has changed (e.g. moving window between different DPI screens), and adapt buffers if necessary:
15474#ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_SUPPORTED
15475# ifdef QCP_DEVICEPIXELRATIO_FLOAT
15476 double newDpr = devicePixelRatioF();
15477# else
15478 double newDpr = devicePixelRatio();
15479# endif
15480 if (!qFuzzyCompare(mBufferDevicePixelRatio, newDpr))
15481 {
15482 setBufferDevicePixelRatio(newDpr);
15483 replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedRefresh);
15484 return;
15485 }
15486#endif
15487
15488 QCPPainter painter(this);
15489 if (painter.isActive())
15490 {
15491#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(6, 0, 0)
15492 painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::HighQualityAntialiasing); // to make Antialiasing look good if using the OpenGL graphicssystem
15493#endif
15494 if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
15495 painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
15496 drawBackground(&painter);
15497 foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15498 buffer->draw(&painter);
15499 }
15500}
15501
15507void QCustomPlot::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
15508{
15509 Q_UNUSED(event)
15510 // resize and repaint the buffer:
15511 setViewport(rect());
15512 replot(rpQueuedRefresh); // queued refresh is important here, to prevent painting issues in some contexts (e.g. MDI subwindow)
15513}
15514
15524void QCustomPlot::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15525{
15526 emit mouseDoubleClick(event);
15527 mMouseHasMoved = false;
15528 mMousePressPos = event->pos();
15529
15530 // determine layerable under the cursor (this event is called instead of the second press event in a double-click):
15531 QList<QVariant> details;
15532 QList<QCPLayerable*> candidates = layerableListAt(mMousePressPos, false, &details);
15533 for (int i=0; i<candidates.size(); ++i)
15534 {
15535 event->accept(); // default impl of QCPLayerable's mouse events ignore the event, in that case propagate to next candidate in list
15536 candidates.at(i)->mouseDoubleClickEvent(event, details.at(i));
15537 if (event->isAccepted())
15538 {
15539 mMouseEventLayerable = candidates.at(i);
15540 mMouseEventLayerableDetails = details.at(i);
15541 break;
15542 }
15543 }
15544
15545 // emit specialized object double click signals:
15546 if (!candidates.isEmpty())
15547 {
15548 if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(candidates.first()))
15549 {
15550 int dataIndex = 0;
15551 if (!details.first().value<QCPDataSelection>().isEmpty())
15552 dataIndex = details.first().value<QCPDataSelection>().dataRange().begin();
15553 emit plottableDoubleClick(ap, dataIndex, event);
15554 } else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(candidates.first()))
15555 emit axisDoubleClick(ax, details.first().value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
15556 else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(candidates.first()))
15557 emit itemDoubleClick(ai, event);
15558 else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(candidates.first()))
15559 emit legendDoubleClick(lg, nullptr, event);
15560 else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(candidates.first()))
15561 emit legendDoubleClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
15562 }
15563
15564 event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15565}
15566
15576void QCustomPlot::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15577{
15578 emit mousePress(event);
15579 // save some state to tell in releaseEvent whether it was a click:
15580 mMouseHasMoved = false;
15581 mMousePressPos = event->pos();
15582
15583 if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRectMode != QCP::srmNone)
15584 {
15585 if (mSelectionRectMode != QCP::srmZoom || qobject_cast<QCPAxisRect*>(axisRectAt(mMousePressPos))) // in zoom mode only activate selection rect if on an axis rect
15586 mSelectionRect->startSelection(event);
15587 } else
15588 {
15589 // no selection rect interaction, prepare for click signal emission and forward event to layerable under the cursor:
15590 QList<QVariant> details;
15591 QList<QCPLayerable*> candidates = layerableListAt(mMousePressPos, false, &details);
15592 if (!candidates.isEmpty())
15593 {
15594 mMouseSignalLayerable = candidates.first(); // candidate for signal emission is always topmost hit layerable (signal emitted in release event)
15595 mMouseSignalLayerableDetails = details.first();
15596 }
15597 // forward event to topmost candidate which accepts the event:
15598 for (int i=0; i<candidates.size(); ++i)
15599 {
15600 event->accept(); // default impl of QCPLayerable's mouse events call ignore() on the event, in that case propagate to next candidate in list
15601 candidates.at(i)->mousePressEvent(event, details.at(i));
15602 if (event->isAccepted())
15603 {
15604 mMouseEventLayerable = candidates.at(i);
15605 mMouseEventLayerableDetails = details.at(i);
15606 break;
15607 }
15608 }
15609 }
15610
15611 event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15612}
15613
15626void QCustomPlot::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15627{
15628 emit mouseMove(event);
15629
15630 if (!mMouseHasMoved && (mMousePressPos-event->pos()).manhattanLength() > 3)
15631 mMouseHasMoved = true; // moved too far from mouse press position, don't handle as click on mouse release
15632
15633 if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRect->isActive())
15634 mSelectionRect->moveSelection(event);
15635 else if (mMouseEventLayerable) // call event of affected layerable:
15636 mMouseEventLayerable->mouseMoveEvent(event, mMousePressPos);
15637
15638 event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15639}
15640
15655void QCustomPlot::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
15656{
15657 emit mouseRelease(event);
15658
15659 if (!mMouseHasMoved) // mouse hasn't moved (much) between press and release, so handle as click
15660 {
15661 if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRect->isActive()) // a simple click shouldn't successfully finish a selection rect, so cancel it here
15662 mSelectionRect->cancel();
15663 if (event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
15664 processPointSelection(event);
15665
15666 // emit specialized click signals of QCustomPlot instance:
15667 if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractPlottable*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15668 {
15669 int dataIndex = 0;
15670 if (!mMouseSignalLayerableDetails.value<QCPDataSelection>().isEmpty())
15671 dataIndex = mMouseSignalLayerableDetails.value<QCPDataSelection>().dataRange().begin();
15672 emit plottableClick(ap, dataIndex, event);
15673 } else if (QCPAxis *ax = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15674 emit axisClick(ax, mMouseSignalLayerableDetails.value<QCPAxis::SelectablePart>(), event);
15675 else if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractItem*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15676 emit itemClick(ai, event);
15677 else if (QCPLegend *lg = qobject_cast<QCPLegend*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15678 emit legendClick(lg, nullptr, event);
15679 else if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *li = qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(mMouseSignalLayerable))
15680 emit legendClick(li->parentLegend(), li, event);
15681 mMouseSignalLayerable = nullptr;
15682 }
15683
15684 if (mSelectionRect && mSelectionRect->isActive()) // Note: if a click was detected above, the selection rect is canceled there
15685 {
15686 // finish selection rect, the appropriate action will be taken via signal-slot connection:
15687 mSelectionRect->endSelection(event);
15688 } else
15689 {
15690 // call event of affected layerable:
15691 if (mMouseEventLayerable)
15692 {
15693 mMouseEventLayerable->mouseReleaseEvent(event, mMousePressPos);
15694 mMouseEventLayerable = nullptr;
15695 }
15696 }
15697
15698 if (noAntialiasingOnDrag())
15699 replot(rpQueuedReplot);
15700
15701 event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15702}
15703
15709void QCustomPlot::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
15710{
15711 emit mouseWheel(event);
15712
15713#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
15714 const QPointF pos = event->pos();
15715#else
15716 const QPointF pos = event->position();
15717#endif
15718
15719 // forward event to layerable under cursor:
15720 foreach (QCPLayerable *candidate, layerableListAt(pos, false))
15721 {
15722 event->accept(); // default impl of QCPLayerable's mouse events ignore the event, in that case propagate to next candidate in list
15723 candidate->wheelEvent(event);
15724 if (event->isAccepted())
15725 break;
15726 }
15727 event->accept(); // in case QCPLayerable reimplementation manipulates event accepted state. In QWidget event system, QCustomPlot wants to accept the event.
15728}
15729
15740void QCustomPlot::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15741{
15742 updateLayout();
15743
15744 // draw viewport background pixmap:
15745 drawBackground(painter);
15746
15747 // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...):
15748 foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
15749 layer->draw(painter);
15750
15751 /* Debug code to draw all layout element rects
15752 foreach (QCPLayoutElement *el, findChildren<QCPLayoutElement*>())
15753 {
15754 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15755 painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(0, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
15756 painter->drawRect(el->rect());
15757 painter->setPen(QPen(QColor(255, 0, 0, 100), 0, Qt::DashLine));
15758 painter->drawRect(el->outerRect());
15759 }
15760 */
15761}
15762
15771void QCustomPlot::updateLayout()
15772{
15773 // run through layout phases:
15774 mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upPreparation);
15775 mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upMargins);
15776 mPlotLayout->update(QCPLayoutElement::upLayout);
15777
15778 emit afterLayout();
15779}
15780
15798void QCustomPlot::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
15799{
15800 // Note: background color is handled in individual replot/save functions
15801
15802 // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
15803 if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
15804 {
15805 if (mBackgroundScaled)
15806 {
15807 // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
15808 QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
15809 scaledSize.scale(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
15810 if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
15811 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mViewport.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
15812 painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
15813 } else
15814 {
15815 painter->drawPixmap(mViewport.topLeft(), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mViewport.width(), mViewport.height()));
15816 }
15817 }
15818}
15819
15839void QCustomPlot::setupPaintBuffers()
15840{
15841 int bufferIndex = 0;
15842 if (mPaintBuffers.isEmpty())
15843 mPaintBuffers.append(QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer>(createPaintBuffer()));
15844
15845 for (int layerIndex = 0; layerIndex < mLayers.size(); ++layerIndex)
15846 {
15847 QCPLayer *layer = mLayers.at(layerIndex);
15848 if (layer->mode() == QCPLayer::lmLogical)
15849 {
15850 layer->mPaintBuffer = mPaintBuffers.at(bufferIndex).toWeakRef();
15851 } else if (layer->mode() == QCPLayer::lmBuffered)
15852 {
15853 ++bufferIndex;
15854 if (bufferIndex >= mPaintBuffers.size())
15855 mPaintBuffers.append(QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer>(createPaintBuffer()));
15856 layer->mPaintBuffer = mPaintBuffers.at(bufferIndex).toWeakRef();
15857 if (layerIndex < mLayers.size()-1 && mLayers.at(layerIndex+1)->mode() == QCPLayer::lmLogical) // not last layer, and next one is logical, so prepare another buffer for next layerables
15858 {
15859 ++bufferIndex;
15860 if (bufferIndex >= mPaintBuffers.size())
15861 mPaintBuffers.append(QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer>(createPaintBuffer()));
15862 }
15863 }
15864 }
15865 // remove unneeded buffers:
15866 while (mPaintBuffers.size()-1 > bufferIndex)
15867 mPaintBuffers.removeLast();
15868 // resize buffers to viewport size and clear contents:
15869 foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15870 {
15871 buffer->setSize(viewport().size()); // won't do anything if already correct size
15872 buffer->clear(Qt::transparent);
15873 buffer->setInvalidated();
15874 }
15875}
15876
15885QCPAbstractPaintBuffer *QCustomPlot::createPaintBuffer()
15886{
15887 if (mOpenGl)
15888 {
15889#if defined(QCP_OPENGL_FBO)
15890 return new QCPPaintBufferGlFbo(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio, mGlContext, mGlPaintDevice);
15891#elif defined(QCP_OPENGL_PBUFFER)
15892 return new QCPPaintBufferGlPbuffer(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio, mOpenGlMultisamples);
15893#else
15894 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "OpenGL enabled even though no support for it compiled in, this shouldn't have happened. Falling back to pixmap paint buffer.";
15895 return new QCPPaintBufferPixmap(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio);
15896#endif
15897 } else
15898 return new QCPPaintBufferPixmap(viewport().size(), mBufferDevicePixelRatio);
15899}
15900
15912bool QCustomPlot::hasInvalidatedPaintBuffers()
15913{
15914 foreach (QSharedPointer<QCPAbstractPaintBuffer> buffer, mPaintBuffers)
15915 {
15916 if (buffer->invalidated())
15917 return true;
15918 }
15919 return false;
15920}
15921
15935bool QCustomPlot::setupOpenGl()
15936{
15937#ifdef QCP_OPENGL_FBO
15938 freeOpenGl();
15939 QSurfaceFormat proposedSurfaceFormat;
15940 proposedSurfaceFormat.setSamples(mOpenGlMultisamples);
15941#ifdef QCP_OPENGL_OFFSCREENSURFACE
15942 QOffscreenSurface *surface = new QOffscreenSurface;
15943#else
15944 QWindow *surface = new QWindow;
15945 surface->setSurfaceType(QSurface::OpenGLSurface);
15946#endif
