15947 surface->setFormat(proposedSurfaceFormat);
15948 surface->create();
15949 mGlSurface = QSharedPointer<QSurface>(surface);
15950 mGlContext = QSharedPointer<QOpenGLContext>(new QOpenGLContext);
15951 mGlContext->setFormat(mGlSurface->format());
15952 if (!mGlContext->create())
15953 {
15954 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Failed to create OpenGL context";
15955 mGlContext.clear();
15956 mGlSurface.clear();
15957 return false;
15958 }
15959 if (!mGlContext->makeCurrent(mGlSurface.data())) // context needs to be current to create paint device
15960 {
15961 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Failed to make opengl context current";
15962 mGlContext.clear();
15963 mGlSurface.clear();
15964 return false;
15965 }
15966 if (!QOpenGLFramebufferObject::hasOpenGLFramebufferObjects())
15967 {
15968 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "OpenGL of this system doesn't support frame buffer objects";
15969 mGlContext.clear();
15970 mGlSurface.clear();
15971 return false;
15972 }
15973 mGlPaintDevice = QSharedPointer<QOpenGLPaintDevice>(new QOpenGLPaintDevice);
15974 return true;
15975#elif defined(QCP_OPENGL_PBUFFER)
15976 return QGLFormat::hasOpenGL();
15977#else
15978 return false;
15979#endif
15980}
15981
15993void QCustomPlot::freeOpenGl()
15994{
15995#ifdef QCP_OPENGL_FBO
15996 mGlPaintDevice.clear();
15997 mGlContext.clear();
15998 mGlSurface.clear();
15999#endif
16000}
16001
16007void QCustomPlot::axisRemoved(QCPAxis *axis)
16008{
16009 if (xAxis == axis)
16010 xAxis = nullptr;
16011 if (xAxis2 == axis)
16012 xAxis2 = nullptr;
16013 if (yAxis == axis)
16014 yAxis = nullptr;
16015 if (yAxis2 == axis)
16016 yAxis2 = nullptr;
16017
16018 // Note: No need to take care of range drag axes and range zoom axes, because they are stored in smart pointers
16019}
16020
16026void QCustomPlot::legendRemoved(QCPLegend *legend)
16027{
16028 if (this->legend == legend)
16029 this->legend = nullptr;
16030}
16031
16049void QCustomPlot::processRectSelection(QRect rect, QMouseEvent *event)
16050{
16051 typedef QPair<QCPAbstractPlottable*, QCPDataSelection> SelectionCandidate;
16052 typedef QMultiMap<int, SelectionCandidate> SelectionCandidates; // map key is number of selected data points, so we have selections sorted by size
16053
16054 bool selectionStateChanged = false;
16055
16056 if (mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iSelectPlottables))
16057 {
16058 SelectionCandidates potentialSelections;
16059 QRectF rectF(rect.normalized());
16060 if (QCPAxisRect *affectedAxisRect = axisRectAt(rectF.topLeft()))
16061 {
16062 // determine plottables that were hit by the rect and thus are candidates for selection:
16063 foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, affectedAxisRect->plottables())
16064 {
16065 if (QCPPlottableInterface1D *plottableInterface = plottable->interface1D())
16066 {
16067 QCPDataSelection dataSel = plottableInterface->selectTestRect(rectF, true);
16068 if (!dataSel.isEmpty())
16069 potentialSelections.insert(dataSel.dataPointCount(), SelectionCandidate(plottable, dataSel));
16070 }
16071 }
16072
16073 if (!mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect))
16074 {
16075 // only leave plottable with most selected points in map, since we will only select a single plottable:
16076 if (!potentialSelections.isEmpty())
16077 {
16078 SelectionCandidates::iterator it = potentialSelections.begin();
16079 while (it != std::prev(potentialSelections.end())) // erase all except last element
16080 it = potentialSelections.erase(it);
16081 }
16082 }
16083
16084 bool additive = event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
16085 // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
16086 if (!additive)
16087 {
16088 // emit deselection except to those plottables who will be selected afterwards:
16089 foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
16090 {
16091 foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
16092 {
16093 if ((potentialSelections.isEmpty() || potentialSelections.constBegin()->first != layerable) && mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory()))
16094 {
16095 bool selChanged = false;
16096 layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
16097 selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16098 }
16099 }
16100 }
16101 }
16102
16103 // go through selections in reverse (largest selection first) and emit select events:
16104 SelectionCandidates::const_iterator it = potentialSelections.constEnd();
16105 while (it != potentialSelections.constBegin())
16106 {
16107 --it;
16108 if (mInteractions.testFlag(it.value().first->selectionCategory()))
16109 {
16110 bool selChanged = false;
16111 it.value().first->selectEvent(event, additive, QVariant::fromValue(it.value().second), &selChanged);
16112 selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16113 }
16114 }
16115 }
16116 }
16117
16118 if (selectionStateChanged)
16119 {
16120 emit selectionChangedByUser();
16121 replot(rpQueuedReplot);
16122 } else if (mSelectionRect)
16123 mSelectionRect->layer()->replot();
16124}
16125
16137void QCustomPlot::processRectZoom(QRect rect, QMouseEvent *event)
16138{
16139 Q_UNUSED(event)
16140 if (QCPAxisRect *axisRect = axisRectAt(rect.topLeft()))
16141 {
16142 QList<QCPAxis*> affectedAxes = QList<QCPAxis*>() << axisRect->rangeZoomAxes(Qt::Horizontal) << axisRect->rangeZoomAxes(Qt::Vertical);
16143 affectedAxes.removeAll(static_cast<QCPAxis*>(nullptr));
16144 axisRect->zoom(QRectF(rect), affectedAxes);
16145 }
16146 replot(rpQueuedReplot); // always replot to make selection rect disappear
16147}
16148
16166void QCustomPlot::processPointSelection(QMouseEvent *event)
16167{
16168 QVariant details;
16169 QCPLayerable *clickedLayerable = layerableAt(event->pos(), true, &details);
16170 bool selectionStateChanged = false;
16171 bool additive = mInteractions.testFlag(QCP::iMultiSelect) && event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
16172 // deselect all other layerables if not additive selection:
16173 if (!additive)
16174 {
16175 foreach (QCPLayer *layer, mLayers)
16176 {
16177 foreach (QCPLayerable *layerable, layer->children())
16178 {
16179 if (layerable != clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(layerable->selectionCategory()))
16180 {
16181 bool selChanged = false;
16182 layerable->deselectEvent(&selChanged);
16183 selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16184 }
16185 }
16186 }
16187 }
16188 if (clickedLayerable && mInteractions.testFlag(clickedLayerable->selectionCategory()))
16189 {
16190 // a layerable was actually clicked, call its selectEvent:
16191 bool selChanged = false;
16192 clickedLayerable->selectEvent(event, additive, details, &selChanged);
16193 selectionStateChanged |= selChanged;
16194 }
16195 if (selectionStateChanged)
16196 {
16197 emit selectionChangedByUser();
16198 replot(rpQueuedReplot);
16199 }
16200}
16201
16213bool QCustomPlot::registerPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
16214{
16215 if (mPlottables.contains(plottable))
16216 {
16217 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
16218 return false;
16219 }
16220 if (plottable->parentPlot() != this)
16221 {
16222 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
16223 return false;
16224 }
16225
16226 mPlottables.append(plottable);
16227 // possibly add plottable to legend:
16228 if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
16229 plottable->addToLegend();
16230 if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
16231 plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
16232 return true;
16233}
16234
16244bool QCustomPlot::registerGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
16245{
16246 if (!graph)
16247 {
16248 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed graph is zero";
16249 return false;
16250 }
16251 if (mGraphs.contains(graph))
16252 {
16253 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph already registered with this QCustomPlot";
16254 return false;
16255 }
16256
16257 mGraphs.append(graph);
16258 return true;
16259}
16260
16261
16271bool QCustomPlot::registerItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
16272{
16273 if (mItems.contains(item))
16274 {
16275 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
16276 return false;
16277 }
16278 if (item->parentPlot() != this)
16279 {
16280 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
16281 return false;
16282 }
16283
16284 mItems.append(item);
16285 if (!item->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the item (via QCPLayerable constructor)
16286 item->setLayer(currentLayer());
16287 return true;
16288}
16289
16296void QCustomPlot::updateLayerIndices() const
16297{
16298 for (int i=0; i<mLayers.size(); ++i)
16299 mLayers.at(i)->mIndex = i;
16300}
16301
16317QCPLayerable *QCustomPlot::layerableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *selectionDetails) const
16318{
16319 QList<QVariant> details;
16320 QList<QCPLayerable*> candidates = layerableListAt(pos, onlySelectable, selectionDetails ? &details : nullptr);
16321 if (selectionDetails && !details.isEmpty())
16322 *selectionDetails = details.first();
16323 if (!candidates.isEmpty())
16324 return candidates.first();
16325 else
16326 return nullptr;
16327}
16328
16348QList<QCPLayerable*> QCustomPlot::layerableListAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QList<QVariant> *selectionDetails) const
16349{
16350 QList<QCPLayerable*> result;
16351 for (int layerIndex=mLayers.size()-1; layerIndex>=0; --layerIndex)
16352 {
16353 const QList<QCPLayerable*> layerables = mLayers.at(layerIndex)->children();
16354 for (int i=layerables.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
16355 {
16356 if (!layerables.at(i)->realVisibility())
16357 continue;
16358 QVariant details;
16359 double dist = layerables.at(i)->selectTest(pos, onlySelectable, selectionDetails ? &details : nullptr);
16360 if (dist >= 0 && dist < selectionTolerance())
16361 {
16362 result.append(layerables.at(i));
16363 if (selectionDetails)
16364 selectionDetails->append(details);
16365 }
16366 }
16367 }
16368 return result;
16369}
16370
16389bool QCustomPlot::saveRastered(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, const char *format, int quality, int resolution, QCP::ResolutionUnit resolutionUnit)
16390{
16391 QImage buffer = toPixmap(width, height, scale).toImage();
16392
16393 int dotsPerMeter = 0;
16394 switch (resolutionUnit)
16395 {
16396 case QCP::ruDotsPerMeter: dotsPerMeter = resolution; break;
16397 case QCP::ruDotsPerCentimeter: dotsPerMeter = resolution*100; break;
16398 case QCP::ruDotsPerInch: dotsPerMeter = int(resolution/0.0254); break;
16399 }
16400 buffer.setDotsPerMeterX(dotsPerMeter); // this is saved together with some image formats, e.g. PNG, and is relevant when opening image in other tools
16401 buffer.setDotsPerMeterY(dotsPerMeter); // this is saved together with some image formats, e.g. PNG, and is relevant when opening image in other tools
16402 if (!buffer.isNull())
16403 return buffer.save(fileName, format, quality);
16404 else
16405 return false;
16406}
16407
16416QPixmap QCustomPlot::toPixmap(int width, int height, double scale)
16417{
16418 // this method is somewhat similar to toPainter. Change something here, and a change in toPainter might be necessary, too.
16419 int newWidth, newHeight;
16420 if (width == 0 || height == 0)
16421 {
16422 newWidth = this->width();
16423 newHeight = this->height();
16424 } else
16425 {
16426 newWidth = width;
16427 newHeight = height;
16428 }
16429 int scaledWidth = qRound(scale*newWidth);
16430 int scaledHeight = qRound(scale*newHeight);
16431
16432 QPixmap result(scaledWidth, scaledHeight);
16433 result.fill(mBackgroundBrush.style() == Qt::SolidPattern ? mBackgroundBrush.color() : Qt::transparent); // if using non-solid pattern, make transparent now and draw brush pattern later
16434 QCPPainter painter;
16435 painter.begin(&result);
16436 if (painter.isActive())
16437 {
16438 QRect oldViewport = viewport();
16439 setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
16440 painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
16441 if (!qFuzzyCompare(scale, 1.0))
16442 {
16443 if (scale > 1.0) // for scale < 1 we always want cosmetic pens where possible, because else lines might disappear for very small scales
16444 painter.setMode(QCPPainter::pmNonCosmetic);
16445 painter.scale(scale, scale);
16446 }
16447 if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::SolidPattern && mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) // solid fills were done a few lines above with QPixmap::fill
16448 painter.fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
16449 draw(&painter);
16450 setViewport(oldViewport);
16451 painter.end();
16452 } else // might happen if pixmap has width or height zero
16453 {
16454 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on pixmap";
16455 return QPixmap();
16456 }
16457 return result;
16458}
16459
16472void QCustomPlot::toPainter(QCPPainter *painter, int width, int height)
16473{
16474 // this method is somewhat similar to toPixmap. Change something here, and a change in toPixmap might be necessary, too.
16475 int newWidth, newHeight;
16476 if (width == 0 || height == 0)
16477 {
16478 newWidth = this->width();
16479 newHeight = this->height();
16480 } else
16481 {
16482 newWidth = width;
16483 newHeight = height;
16484 }
16485
16486 if (painter->isActive())
16487 {
16488 QRect oldViewport = viewport();
16489 setViewport(QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight));
16490 painter->setMode(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching);
16491 if (mBackgroundBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush) // unlike in toPixmap, we can't do QPixmap::fill for Qt::SolidPattern brush style, so we also draw solid fills with fillRect here
16492 painter->fillRect(mViewport, mBackgroundBrush);
16493 draw(painter);
16494 setViewport(oldViewport);
16495 } else
16496 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed painter is not active";
16497}
16498/* end of 'src/core.cpp' */
16499
16500
16501/* including file 'src/colorgradient.cpp' */
16502/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 25408 */
16503
16504
16508
16545QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient() :
16546 mLevelCount(350),
16547 mColorInterpolation(ciRGB),
16548 mNanHandling(nhNone),
16549 mNanColor(Qt::black),
16550 mPeriodic(false),
16551 mColorBufferInvalidated(true)
16552{
16553 mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
16554}
16555
16562QCPColorGradient::QCPColorGradient(GradientPreset preset) :
16563 mLevelCount(350),
16564 mColorInterpolation(ciRGB),
16565 mNanHandling(nhNone),
16566 mNanColor(Qt::black),
16567 mPeriodic(false),
16568 mColorBufferInvalidated(true)
16569{
16570 mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0), mLevelCount);
16571 loadPreset(preset);
16572}
16573
16574/* undocumented operator */
16575bool QCPColorGradient::operator==(const QCPColorGradient &other) const
16576{
16577 return ((other.mLevelCount == this->mLevelCount) &&
16578 (other.mColorInterpolation == this->mColorInterpolation) &&
16579 (other.mNanHandling == this ->mNanHandling) &&
16580 (other.mNanColor == this->mNanColor) &&
16581 (other.mPeriodic == this->mPeriodic) &&
16582 (other.mColorStops == this->mColorStops));
16583}
16584
16591void QCPColorGradient::setLevelCount(int n)
16592{
16593 if (n < 2)
16594 {
16595 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "n must be greater or equal 2 but was" << n;
16596 n = 2;
16597 }
16598 if (n != mLevelCount)
16599 {
16600 mLevelCount = n;
16601 mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16602 }
16603}
16604
16616void QCPColorGradient::setColorStops(const QMap<double, QColor> &colorStops)
16617{
16618 mColorStops = colorStops;
16619 mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16620}
16621
16628void QCPColorGradient::setColorStopAt(double position, const QColor &color)
16629{
16630 mColorStops.insert(position, color);
16631 mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16632}
16633
16641void QCPColorGradient::setColorInterpolation(QCPColorGradient::ColorInterpolation interpolation)
16642{
16643 if (interpolation != mColorInterpolation)
16644 {
16645 mColorInterpolation = interpolation;
16646 mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16647 }
16648}
16649
16655void QCPColorGradient::setNanHandling(QCPColorGradient::NanHandling handling)
16656{
16657 mNanHandling = handling;
16658}
16659
16666void QCPColorGradient::setNanColor(const QColor &color)
16667{
16668 mNanColor = color;
16669}
16670
16686void QCPColorGradient::setPeriodic(bool enabled)
16687{
16688 mPeriodic = enabled;
16689}
16690
16709void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const QCPRange &range, QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor, bool logarithmic)
16710{
16711 // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt color() and the other colorize() overload
16712 if (!data)
16713 {
16714 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
16715 return;
16716 }
16717 if (!scanLine)
16718 {
16719 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
16720 return;
16721 }
16722 if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
16723 updateColorBuffer();
16724
16725 const bool skipNanCheck = mNanHandling == nhNone;
16726 const double posToIndexFactor = !logarithmic ? (mLevelCount-1)/range.size() : (mLevelCount-1)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower);
16727 for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
16728 {
16729 const double value = data[dataIndexFactor*i];
16730 if (skipNanCheck || !std::isnan(value))
16731 {
16732 qint64 index = qint64((!logarithmic ? value-range.lower : qLn(value/range.lower)) * posToIndexFactor);
16733 if (!mPeriodic)
16734 {
16735 index = qBound(qint64(0), index, qint64(mLevelCount-1));
16736 } else
16737 {
16738 index %= mLevelCount;
16739 if (index < 0)
16740 index += mLevelCount;
16741 }
16742 scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
16743 } else
16744 {
16745 switch(mNanHandling)
16746 {
16747 case nhLowestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.first(); break;
16748 case nhHighestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.last(); break;
16749 case nhTransparent: scanLine[i] = qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0); break;
16750 case nhNanColor: scanLine[i] = mNanColor.rgba(); break;
16751 case nhNone: break; // shouldn't happen
16752 }
16753 }
16754 }
16755}
16756
16765void QCPColorGradient::colorize(const double *data, const unsigned char *alpha, const QCPRange &range, QRgb *scanLine, int n, int dataIndexFactor, bool logarithmic)
16766{
16767 // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt color() and the other colorize() overload
16768 if (!data)
16769 {
16770 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as data";
16771 return;
16772 }
16773 if (!alpha)
16774 {
16775 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as alpha";
16776 return;
16777 }
16778 if (!scanLine)
16779 {
16780 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer given as scanLine";
16781 return;
16782 }
16783 if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
16784 updateColorBuffer();
16785
16786 const bool skipNanCheck = mNanHandling == nhNone;
16787 const double posToIndexFactor = !logarithmic ? (mLevelCount-1)/range.size() : (mLevelCount-1)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower);
16788 for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
16789 {
16790 const double value = data[dataIndexFactor*i];
16791 if (skipNanCheck || !std::isnan(value))
16792 {
16793 qint64 index = qint64((!logarithmic ? value-range.lower : qLn(value/range.lower)) * posToIndexFactor);
16794 if (!mPeriodic)
16795 {
16796 index = qBound(qint64(0), index, qint64(mLevelCount-1));
16797 } else
16798 {
16799 index %= mLevelCount;
16800 if (index < 0)
16801 index += mLevelCount;
16802 }
16803 if (alpha[dataIndexFactor*i] == 255)
16804 {
16805 scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.at(index);
16806 } else
16807 {
16808 const QRgb rgb = mColorBuffer.at(index);
16809 const float alphaF = alpha[dataIndexFactor*i]/255.0f;
16810 scanLine[i] = qRgba(int(qRed(rgb)*alphaF), int(qGreen(rgb)*alphaF), int(qBlue(rgb)*alphaF), int(qAlpha(rgb)*alphaF)); // also multiply r,g,b with alpha, to conform to Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
16811 }
16812 } else
16813 {
16814 switch(mNanHandling)
16815 {
16816 case nhLowestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.first(); break;
16817 case nhHighestColor: scanLine[i] = mColorBuffer.last(); break;
16818 case nhTransparent: scanLine[i] = qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0); break;
16819 case nhNanColor: scanLine[i] = mNanColor.rgba(); break;
16820 case nhNone: break; // shouldn't happen
16821 }
16822 }
16823 }
16824}
16825
16838QRgb QCPColorGradient::color(double position, const QCPRange &range, bool logarithmic)
16839{
16840 // If you change something here, make sure to also adapt ::colorize()
16841 if (mColorBufferInvalidated)
16842 updateColorBuffer();
16843
16844 const bool skipNanCheck = mNanHandling == nhNone;
16845 if (!skipNanCheck && std::isnan(position))
16846 {
16847 switch(mNanHandling)
16848 {
16849 case nhLowestColor: return mColorBuffer.first();
16850 case nhHighestColor: return mColorBuffer.last();
16851 case nhTransparent: return qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
16852 case nhNanColor: return mNanColor.rgba();
16853 case nhNone: return qRgba(0, 0, 0, 0); // shouldn't happen
16854 }
16855 }
16856
16857 const double posToIndexFactor = !logarithmic ? (mLevelCount-1)/range.size() : (mLevelCount-1)/qLn(range.upper/range.lower);
16858 int index = int((!logarithmic ? position-range.lower : qLn(position/range.lower)) * posToIndexFactor);
16859 if (!mPeriodic)
16860 {
16861 index = qBound(0, index, mLevelCount-1);
16862 } else
16863 {
16864 index %= mLevelCount;
16865 if (index < 0)
16866 index += mLevelCount;
16867 }
16868 return mColorBuffer.at(index);
16869}
16870
16878void QCPColorGradient::loadPreset(GradientPreset preset)
16879{
16880 clearColorStops();
16881 switch (preset)
16882 {
16883 case gpGrayscale:
16884 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16885 setColorStopAt(0, Qt::black);
16886 setColorStopAt(1, Qt::white);
16887 break;
16888 case gpHot:
16889 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16890 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 0));
16891 setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(180, 10, 0));
16892 setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(245, 50, 0));
16893 setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 150, 10));
16894 setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(255, 255, 50));
16895 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
16896 break;
16897 case gpCold:
16898 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16899 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
16900 setColorStopAt(0.2, QColor(0, 10, 180));
16901 setColorStopAt(0.4, QColor(0, 50, 245));
16902 setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(10, 150, 255));
16903 setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(50, 255, 255));
16904 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
16905 break;
16906 case gpNight:
16907 setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16908 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(10, 20, 30));
16909 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(250, 255, 250));
16910 break;
16911 case gpCandy:
16912 setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16913 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16914 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 250, 250));
16915 break;
16916 case gpGeography:
16917 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16918 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(70, 170, 210));
16919 setColorStopAt(0.20, QColor(90, 160, 180));
16920 setColorStopAt(0.25, QColor(45, 130, 175));
16921 setColorStopAt(0.30, QColor(100, 140, 125));
16922 setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(100, 140, 100));
16923 setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(130, 145, 120));
16924 setColorStopAt(0.7, QColor(140, 130, 120));
16925 setColorStopAt(0.9, QColor(180, 190, 190));
16926 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(210, 210, 230));
16927 break;
16928 case gpIon:
16929 setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16930 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 10, 10));
16931 setColorStopAt(0.45, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16932 setColorStopAt(0.8, QColor(0, 255, 255));
16933 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(0, 255, 0));
16934 break;
16935 case gpThermal:
16936 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16937 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 50));
16938 setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(20, 0, 120));
16939 setColorStopAt(0.33, QColor(200, 30, 140));
16940 setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 100, 0));
16941 setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 255, 40));
16942 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 255));
16943 break;
16944 case gpPolar:
16945 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16946 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 255, 255));
16947 setColorStopAt(0.18, QColor(10, 70, 255));
16948 setColorStopAt(0.28, QColor(10, 10, 190));
16949 setColorStopAt(0.5, QColor(0, 0, 0));
16950 setColorStopAt(0.72, QColor(190, 10, 10));
16951 setColorStopAt(0.82, QColor(255, 70, 10));
16952 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 255, 50));
16953 break;
16954 case gpSpectrum:
16955 setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16956 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(50, 0, 50));
16957 setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16958 setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
16959 setColorStopAt(0.6, QColor(255, 255, 0));
16960 setColorStopAt(0.75, QColor(255, 30, 0));
16961 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(50, 0, 0));
16962 break;
16963 case gpJet:
16964 setColorInterpolation(ciRGB);
16965 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(0, 0, 100));
16966 setColorStopAt(0.15, QColor(0, 50, 255));
16967 setColorStopAt(0.35, QColor(0, 255, 255));
16968 setColorStopAt(0.65, QColor(255, 255, 0));
16969 setColorStopAt(0.85, QColor(255, 30, 0));
16970 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(100, 0, 0));
16971 break;
16972 case gpHues:
16973 setColorInterpolation(ciHSV);
16974 setColorStopAt(0, QColor(255, 0, 0));
16975 setColorStopAt(1.0/3.0, QColor(0, 0, 255));
16976 setColorStopAt(2.0/3.0, QColor(0, 255, 0));
16977 setColorStopAt(1, QColor(255, 0, 0));
16978 break;
16979 }
16980}
16981
16987void QCPColorGradient::clearColorStops()
16988{
16989 mColorStops.clear();
16990 mColorBufferInvalidated = true;
16991}
16992
16999QCPColorGradient QCPColorGradient::inverted() const
17000{
17001 QCPColorGradient result(*this);
17002 result.clearColorStops();
17003 for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it=mColorStops.constBegin(); it!=mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
17004 result.setColorStopAt(1.0-it.key(), it.value());
17005 return result;
17006}
17007
17013bool QCPColorGradient::stopsUseAlpha() const
17014{
17015 for (QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it=mColorStops.constBegin(); it!=mColorStops.constEnd(); ++it)
17016 {
17017 if (it.value().alpha() < 255)
17018 return true;
17019 }
17020 return false;
17021}
17022
17028void QCPColorGradient::updateColorBuffer()
17029{
17030 if (mColorBuffer.size() != mLevelCount)
17031 mColorBuffer.resize(mLevelCount);
17032 if (mColorStops.size() > 1)
17033 {
17034 double indexToPosFactor = 1.0/double(mLevelCount-1);
17035 const bool useAlpha = stopsUseAlpha();
17036 for (int i=0; i<mLevelCount; ++i)
17037 {
17038 double position = i*indexToPosFactor;
17039 QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator it = const_cast<const QMap<double, QColor>*>(&mColorStops)->lowerBound(position); // force using the const lowerBound method
17040 if (it == mColorStops.constEnd()) // position is on or after last stop, use color of last stop
17041 {
17042 if (useAlpha)
17043 {
17044 const QColor col = std::prev(it).value();
17045 const double alphaPremultiplier = col.alpha()/255.0; // since we use QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
17046 mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int(col.red()*alphaPremultiplier),
17047 int(col.green()*alphaPremultiplier),
17048 int(col.blue()*alphaPremultiplier),
17049 col.alpha());
17050 } else
17051 mColorBuffer[i] = std::prev(it).value().rgba();
17052 } else if (it == mColorStops.constBegin()) // position is on or before first stop, use color of first stop
17053 {
17054 if (useAlpha)
17055 {
17056 const QColor &col = it.value();
17057 const double alphaPremultiplier = col.alpha()/255.0; // since we use QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
17058 mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int(col.red()*alphaPremultiplier),
17059 int(col.green()*alphaPremultiplier),
17060 int(col.blue()*alphaPremultiplier),
17061 col.alpha());
17062 } else
17063 mColorBuffer[i] = it.value().rgba();
17064 } else // position is in between stops (or on an intermediate stop), interpolate color
17065 {
17066 QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator high = it;
17067 QMap<double, QColor>::const_iterator low = std::prev(it);
17068 double t = (position-low.key())/(high.key()-low.key()); // interpolation factor 0..1
17069 switch (mColorInterpolation)
17070 {
17071 case ciRGB:
17072 {
17073 if (useAlpha)
17074 {
17075 const int alpha = int((1-t)*low.value().alpha() + t*high.value().alpha());
17076 const double alphaPremultiplier = alpha/255.0; // since we use QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied
17077 mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int( ((1-t)*low.value().red() + t*high.value().red())*alphaPremultiplier ),
17078 int( ((1-t)*low.value().green() + t*high.value().green())*alphaPremultiplier ),
17079 int( ((1-t)*low.value().blue() + t*high.value().blue())*alphaPremultiplier ),
17080 alpha);
17081 } else
17082 {
17083 mColorBuffer[i] = qRgb(int( ((1-t)*low.value().red() + t*high.value().red()) ),
17084 int( ((1-t)*low.value().green() + t*high.value().green()) ),
17085 int( ((1-t)*low.value().blue() + t*high.value().blue())) );
17086 }
17087 break;
17088 }
17089 case ciHSV:
17090 {
17091 QColor lowHsv = low.value().toHsv();
17092 QColor highHsv = high.value().toHsv();
17093 double hue = 0;
17094 double hueDiff = highHsv.hueF()-lowHsv.hueF();
17095 if (hueDiff > 0.5)
17096 hue = lowHsv.hueF() - t*(1.0-hueDiff);
17097 else if (hueDiff < -0.5)
17098 hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*(1.0+hueDiff);
17099 else
17100 hue = lowHsv.hueF() + t*hueDiff;
17101 if (hue < 0) hue += 1.0;
17102 else if (hue >= 1.0) hue -= 1.0;
17103 if (useAlpha)
17104 {
17105 const QRgb rgb = QColor::fromHsvF(hue,
17106 (1-t)*lowHsv.saturationF() + t*highHsv.saturationF(),
17107 (1-t)*lowHsv.valueF() + t*highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
17108 const double alpha = (1-t)*lowHsv.alphaF() + t*highHsv.alphaF();
17109 mColorBuffer[i] = qRgba(int(qRed(rgb)*alpha), int(qGreen(rgb)*alpha), int(qBlue(rgb)*alpha), int(255*alpha));
17110 }
17111 else
17112 {
17113 mColorBuffer[i] = QColor::fromHsvF(hue,
17114 (1-t)*lowHsv.saturationF() + t*highHsv.saturationF(),
17115 (1-t)*lowHsv.valueF() + t*highHsv.valueF()).rgb();
17116 }
17117 break;
17118 }
17119 }
17120 }
17121 }
17122 } else if (mColorStops.size() == 1)
17123 {
17124 const QRgb rgb = mColorStops.constBegin().value().rgb();
17125 const double alpha = mColorStops.constBegin().value().alphaF();
17126 mColorBuffer.fill(qRgba(int(qRed(rgb)*alpha), int(qGreen(rgb)*alpha), int(qBlue(rgb)*alpha), int(255*alpha)));
17127 } else // mColorStops is empty, fill color buffer with black
17128 {
17129 mColorBuffer.fill(qRgb(0, 0, 0));
17130 }
17131 mColorBufferInvalidated = false;
17132}
17133/* end of 'src/colorgradient.cpp' */
17134
17135
17136/* including file 'src/selectiondecorator-bracket.cpp' */
17137/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 12308 */
17138
17142
17162QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket() :
17163 mBracketPen(QPen(Qt::black)),
17164 mBracketBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
17165 mBracketWidth(5),
17166 mBracketHeight(50),
17167 mBracketStyle(bsSquareBracket),
17168 mTangentToData(false),
17169 mTangentAverage(2)
17170{
17171
17172}
17173
17174QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::~QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket()
17175{
17176}
17177
17182void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketPen(const QPen &pen)
17183{
17184 mBracketPen = pen;
17185}
17186
17191void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketBrush(const QBrush &brush)
17192{
17193 mBracketBrush = brush;
17194}
17195
17201void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketWidth(int width)
17202{
17203 mBracketWidth = width;
17204}
17205
17211void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketHeight(int height)
17212{
17213 mBracketHeight = height;
17214}
17215
17221void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setBracketStyle(QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::BracketStyle style)
17222{
17223 mBracketStyle = style;
17224}
17225
17233void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setTangentToData(bool enabled)
17234{
17235 mTangentToData = enabled;
17236}
17237
17246void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::setTangentAverage(int pointCount)
17247{
17248 mTangentAverage = pointCount;
17249 if (mTangentAverage < 1)
17250 mTangentAverage = 1;
17251}
17252
17266void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::drawBracket(QCPPainter *painter, int direction) const
17267{
17268 switch (mBracketStyle)
17269 {
17270 case bsSquareBracket:
17271 {
17272 painter->drawLine(QLineF(mBracketWidth*direction, -mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, -mBracketHeight*0.5));
17273 painter->drawLine(QLineF(mBracketWidth*direction, mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, mBracketHeight*0.5));
17274 painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, -mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, mBracketHeight*0.5));
17275 break;
17276 }
17277 case bsHalfEllipse:
17278 {
17279 painter->drawArc(QRectF(-mBracketWidth*0.5, -mBracketHeight*0.5, mBracketWidth, mBracketHeight), -90*16, -180*16*direction);
17280 break;
17281 }
17282 case bsEllipse:
17283 {
17284 painter->drawEllipse(QRectF(-mBracketWidth*0.5, -mBracketHeight*0.5, mBracketWidth, mBracketHeight));
17285 break;
17286 }
17287 case bsPlus:
17288 {
17289 painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, -mBracketHeight*0.5, 0, mBracketHeight*0.5));
17290 painter->drawLine(QLineF(-mBracketWidth*0.5, 0, mBracketWidth*0.5, 0));
17291 break;
17292 }
17293 default:
17294 {
17295 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "unknown/custom bracket style can't be handeld by default implementation:" << static_cast<int>(mBracketStyle);
17296 break;
17297 }
17298 }
17299}
17300
17309void QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::drawDecoration(QCPPainter *painter, QCPDataSelection selection)
17310{
17311 if (!mPlottable || selection.isEmpty()) return;
17312
17313 if (QCPPlottableInterface1D *interface1d = mPlottable->interface1D())
17314 {
17315 foreach (const QCPDataRange &dataRange, selection.dataRanges())
17316 {
17317 // determine position and (if tangent mode is enabled) angle of brackets:
17318 int openBracketDir = (mPlottable->keyAxis() && !mPlottable->keyAxis()->rangeReversed()) ? 1 : -1;
17319 int closeBracketDir = -openBracketDir;
17320 QPointF openBracketPos = getPixelCoordinates(interface1d, dataRange.begin());
17321 QPointF closeBracketPos = getPixelCoordinates(interface1d, dataRange.end()-1);
17322 double openBracketAngle = 0;
17323 double closeBracketAngle = 0;
17324 if (mTangentToData)
17325 {
17326 openBracketAngle = getTangentAngle(interface1d, dataRange.begin(), openBracketDir);
17327 closeBracketAngle = getTangentAngle(interface1d, dataRange.end()-1, closeBracketDir);
17328 }
17329 // draw opening bracket:
17330 QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
17331 painter->setPen(mBracketPen);
17332 painter->setBrush(mBracketBrush);
17333 painter->translate(openBracketPos);
17334 painter->rotate(openBracketAngle/M_PI*180.0);
17335 drawBracket(painter, openBracketDir);
17336 painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
17337 // draw closing bracket:
17338 painter->setPen(mBracketPen);
17339 painter->setBrush(mBracketBrush);
17340 painter->translate(closeBracketPos);
17341 painter->rotate(closeBracketAngle/M_PI*180.0);
17342 drawBracket(painter, closeBracketDir);
17343 painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
17344 }
17345 }
17346}
17347
17361double QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::getTangentAngle(const QCPPlottableInterface1D *interface1d, int dataIndex, int direction) const
17362{
17363 if (!interface1d || dataIndex < 0 || dataIndex >= interface1d->dataCount())
17364 return 0;
17365 direction = direction < 0 ? -1 : 1; // enforce direction is either -1 or 1
17366
17367 // how many steps we can actually go from index in the given direction without exceeding data bounds:
17368 int averageCount;
17369 if (direction < 0)
17370 averageCount = qMin(mTangentAverage, dataIndex);
17371 else
17372 averageCount = qMin(mTangentAverage, interface1d->dataCount()-1-dataIndex);
17373 qDebug() << averageCount;
17374 // calculate point average of averageCount points:
17375 QVector<QPointF> points(averageCount);
17376 QPointF pointsAverage;
17377 int currentIndex = dataIndex;
17378 for (int i=0; i<averageCount; ++i)
17379 {
17380 points[i] = getPixelCoordinates(interface1d, currentIndex);
17381 pointsAverage += points[i];
17382 currentIndex += direction;
17383 }
17384 pointsAverage /= double(averageCount);
17385
17386 // calculate slope of linear regression through points:
17387 double numSum = 0;
17388 double denomSum = 0;
17389 for (int i=0; i<averageCount; ++i)
17390 {
17391 const double dx = points.at(i).x()-pointsAverage.x();
17392 const double dy = points.at(i).y()-pointsAverage.y();
17393 numSum += dx*dy;
17394 denomSum += dx*dx;
17395 }
17396 if (!qFuzzyIsNull(denomSum) && !qFuzzyIsNull(numSum))
17397 {
17398 return qAtan2(numSum, denomSum);
17399 } else // undetermined angle, probably mTangentAverage == 1, so using only one data point
17400 return 0;
17401}
17402
17408QPointF QCPSelectionDecoratorBracket::getPixelCoordinates(const QCPPlottableInterface1D *interface1d, int dataIndex) const
17409{
17410 QCPAxis *keyAxis = mPlottable->keyAxis();
17411 QCPAxis *valueAxis = mPlottable->valueAxis();
17412 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return {0, 0}; }
17413
17414 if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
17415 return {keyAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainKey(dataIndex)), valueAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainValue(dataIndex))};
17416 else
17417 return {valueAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainValue(dataIndex)), keyAxis->coordToPixel(interface1d->dataMainKey(dataIndex))};
17418}
17419/* end of 'src/selectiondecorator-bracket.cpp' */
17420
17421
17422/* including file 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-axisrect.cpp' */
17423/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 47193 */
17424
17425
17429
17467/* start documentation of inline functions */
17468
17549/* end documentation of inline functions */
17550
17555QCPAxisRect::QCPAxisRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, bool setupDefaultAxes) :
17556 QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
17557 mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
17558 mBackgroundScaled(true),
17559 mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
17560 mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
17561 mRangeDrag(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
17562 mRangeZoom(Qt::Horizontal|Qt::Vertical),
17563 mRangeZoomFactorHorz(0.85),
17564 mRangeZoomFactorVert(0.85),
17565 mDragging(false)
17566{
17567 mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
17568 mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
17569 mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
17570
17571 setMinimumSize(50, 50);
17572 setMinimumMargins(QMargins(15, 15, 15, 15));
17573 mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atLeft, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17574 mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atRight, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17575 mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atTop, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17576 mAxes.insert(QCPAxis::atBottom, QList<QCPAxis*>());
17577
17578 if (setupDefaultAxes)
17579 {
17580 QCPAxis *xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17581 QCPAxis *yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17582 QCPAxis *xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17583 QCPAxis *yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17584 setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
17585 setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
17586 xAxis2->setVisible(false);
17587 yAxis2->setVisible(false);
17588 xAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
17589 yAxis->grid()->setVisible(true);
17590 xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17591 yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17592 xAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
17593 yAxis2->grid()->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
17594 xAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17595 yAxis2->grid()->setVisible(false);
17596 }
17597}
17598
17599QCPAxisRect::~QCPAxisRect()
17600{
17601 delete mInsetLayout;
17602 mInsetLayout = nullptr;
17603
17604 foreach (QCPAxis *axis, axes())
17605 removeAxis(axis);
17606}
17607
17613int QCPAxisRect::axisCount(QCPAxis::AxisType type) const
17614{
17615 return mAxes.value(type).size();
17616}
17617
17623QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::axis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, int index) const
17624{
17625 QList<QCPAxis*> ax(mAxes.value(type));
17626 if (index >= 0 && index < ax.size())
17627 {
17628 return ax.at(index);
17629 } else
17630 {
17631 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
17632 return nullptr;
17633 }
17634}
17635
17644QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types) const
17645{
17646 QList<QCPAxis*> result;
17647 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
17648 result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17649 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
17650 result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atRight);
17651 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
17652 result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atTop);
17653 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
17654 result << mAxes.value(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17655 return result;
17656}
17657
17662QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::axes() const
17663{
17664 QList<QCPAxis*> result;
17665 QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
17666 while (it.hasNext())
17667 {
17668 it.next();
17669 result << it.value();
17670 }
17671 return result;
17672}
17673
17694QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::addAxis(QCPAxis::AxisType type, QCPAxis *axis)
17695{
17696 QCPAxis *newAxis = axis;
17697 if (!newAxis)
17698 {
17699 newAxis = new QCPAxis(this, type);
17700 } else // user provided existing axis instance, do some sanity checks
17701 {
17702 if (newAxis->axisType() != type)
17703 {
17704 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis has different axis type than specified in type parameter";
17705 return nullptr;
17706 }
17707 if (newAxis->axisRect() != this)
17708 {
17709 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis doesn't have this axis rect as parent axis rect";
17710 return nullptr;
17711 }
17712 if (axes().contains(newAxis))
17713 {
17714 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis is already owned by this axis rect";
17715 return nullptr;
17716 }
17717 }
17718 if (!mAxes[type].isEmpty()) // multiple axes on one side, add half-bar axis ending to additional axes with offset
17719 {
17720 bool invert = (type == QCPAxis::atRight) || (type == QCPAxis::atBottom);
17721 newAxis->setLowerEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, !invert));
17722 newAxis->setUpperEnding(QCPLineEnding(QCPLineEnding::esHalfBar, 6, 10, invert));
17723 }
17724 mAxes[type].append(newAxis);
17725
17726 // reset convenience axis pointers on parent QCustomPlot if they are unset:
17727 if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->axisRectCount() > 0 && mParentPlot->axisRect(0) == this)
17728 {
17729 switch (type)
17730 {
17731 case QCPAxis::atBottom: { if (!mParentPlot->xAxis) mParentPlot->xAxis = newAxis; break; }
17732 case QCPAxis::atLeft: { if (!mParentPlot->yAxis) mParentPlot->yAxis = newAxis; break; }
17733 case QCPAxis::atTop: { if (!mParentPlot->xAxis2) mParentPlot->xAxis2 = newAxis; break; }
17734 case QCPAxis::atRight: { if (!mParentPlot->yAxis2) mParentPlot->yAxis2 = newAxis; break; }
17735 }
17736 }
17737
17738 return newAxis;
17739}
17740
17749QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::addAxes(QCPAxis::AxisTypes types)
17750{
17751 QList<QCPAxis*> result;
17752 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atLeft))
17753 result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17754 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atRight))
17755 result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17756 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atTop))
17757 result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17758 if (types.testFlag(QCPAxis::atBottom))
17759 result << addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17760 return result;
17761}
17762
17770bool QCPAxisRect::removeAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
17771{
17772 // don't access axis->axisType() to provide safety when axis is an invalid pointer, rather go through all axis containers:
17773 QHashIterator<QCPAxis::AxisType, QList<QCPAxis*> > it(mAxes);
17774 while (it.hasNext())
17775 {
17776 it.next();
17777 if (it.value().contains(axis))
17778 {
17779 if (it.value().first() == axis && it.value().size() > 1) // if removing first axis, transfer axis offset to the new first axis (which at this point is the second axis, if it exists)
17780 it.value()[1]->setOffset(axis->offset());
17781 mAxes[it.key()].removeOne(axis);
17782 if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(parentPlot())) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the axis rect is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
17783 parentPlot()->axisRemoved(axis);
17784 delete axis;
17785 return true;
17786 }
17787 }
17788 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis isn't in axis rect:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(axis);
17789 return false;
17790}
17791
17800void QCPAxisRect::zoom(const QRectF &pixelRect)
17801{
17802 zoom(pixelRect, axes());
17803}
17804
17813void QCPAxisRect::zoom(const QRectF &pixelRect, const QList<QCPAxis*> &affectedAxes)
17814{
17815 foreach (QCPAxis *axis, affectedAxes)
17816 {
17817 if (!axis)
17818 {
17819 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "a passed axis was zero";
17820 continue;
17821 }
17822 QCPRange pixelRange;
17823 if (axis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
17824 pixelRange = QCPRange(pixelRect.left(), pixelRect.right());
17825 else
17826 pixelRange = QCPRange(pixelRect.top(), pixelRect.bottom());
17827 axis->setRange(axis->pixelToCoord(pixelRange.lower), axis->pixelToCoord(pixelRange.upper));
17828 }
17829}
17830
17850void QCPAxisRect::setupFullAxesBox(bool connectRanges)
17851{
17852 QCPAxis *xAxis, *yAxis, *xAxis2, *yAxis2;
17853 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) == 0)
17854 xAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17855 else
17856 xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
17857
17858 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) == 0)
17859 yAxis = addAxis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17860 else
17861 yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
17862
17863 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) == 0)
17864 xAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17865 else
17866 xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
17867
17868 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) == 0)
17869 yAxis2 = addAxis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17870 else
17871 yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
17872
17873 xAxis->setVisible(true);
17874 yAxis->setVisible(true);
17875 xAxis2->setVisible(true);
17876 yAxis2->setVisible(true);
17877 xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
17878 yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
17879
17880 xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
17881 xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
17882 xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
17883 xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
17884 xAxis2->setNumberFormat(xAxis->numberFormat());
17885 xAxis2->setNumberPrecision(xAxis->numberPrecision());
17886 xAxis2->ticker()->setTickCount(xAxis->ticker()->tickCount());
17887 xAxis2->ticker()->setTickOrigin(xAxis->ticker()->tickOrigin());
17888
17889 yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
17890 yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
17891 yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
17892 yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
17893 yAxis2->setNumberFormat(yAxis->numberFormat());
17894 yAxis2->setNumberPrecision(yAxis->numberPrecision());
17895 yAxis2->ticker()->setTickCount(yAxis->ticker()->tickCount());
17896 yAxis2->ticker()->setTickOrigin(yAxis->ticker()->tickOrigin());
17897
17898 if (connectRanges)
17899 {
17900 connect(xAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), xAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17901 connect(yAxis, SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), yAxis2, SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
17902 }
17903}
17904
17913QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCPAxisRect::plottables() const
17914{
17915 // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::plottables() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17916 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
17917 foreach (QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable, mParentPlot->mPlottables)
17918 {
17919 if (plottable->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || plottable->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17920 result.append(plottable);
17921 }
17922 return result;
17923}
17924
17933QList<QCPGraph*> QCPAxisRect::graphs() const
17934{
17935 // Note: don't append all QCPAxis::graphs() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17936 QList<QCPGraph*> result;
17937 foreach (QCPGraph *graph, mParentPlot->mGraphs)
17938 {
17939 if (graph->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this || graph->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17940 result.append(graph);
17941 }
17942 return result;
17943}
17944
17955QList<QCPAbstractItem *> QCPAxisRect::items() const
17956{
17957 // Note: don't just append all QCPAxis::items() into a list, because we might get duplicate entries
17958 // and miss those items that have this axis rect as clipAxisRect.
17959 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
17960 foreach (QCPAbstractItem *item, mParentPlot->mItems)
17961 {
17962 if (item->clipAxisRect() == this)
17963 {
17964 result.append(item);
17965 continue;
17966 }
17967 foreach (QCPItemPosition *position, item->positions())
17968 {
17969 if (position->axisRect() == this ||
17970 position->keyAxis()->axisRect() == this ||
17971 position->valueAxis()->axisRect() == this)
17972 {
17973 result.append(item);
17974 break;
17975 }
17976 }
17977 }
17978 return result;
17979}
17980
17991void QCPAxisRect::update(UpdatePhase phase)
17992{
17993 QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
17994
17995 switch (phase)
17996 {
17997 case upPreparation:
17998 {
17999 foreach (QCPAxis *axis, axes())
18000 axis->setupTickVectors();
18001 break;
18002 }
18003 case upLayout:
18004 {
18005 mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
18006 break;
18007 }
18008 default: break;
18009 }
18010
18011 // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPAxisRect doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
18012 mInsetLayout->update(phase);
18013}
18014
18015/* inherits documentation from base class */
18016QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPAxisRect::elements(bool recursive) const
18017{
18018 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
18019 if (mInsetLayout)
18020 {
18021 result << mInsetLayout;
18022 if (recursive)
18023 result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
18024 }
18025 return result;
18026}
18027
18028/* inherits documentation from base class */
18029void QCPAxisRect::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
18030{
18031 painter->setAntialiasing(false);
18032}
18033
18034/* inherits documentation from base class */
18035void QCPAxisRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18036{
18037 drawBackground(painter);
18038}
18039
18055void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
18056{
18057 mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
18058 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
18059}
18060
18074void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QBrush &brush)
18075{
18076 mBackgroundBrush = brush;
18077}
18078
18086void QCPAxisRect::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
18087{
18088 mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
18089 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
18090 mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
18091 mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
18092}
18093
18104void QCPAxisRect::setBackgroundScaled(bool scaled)
18105{
18106 mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
18107}
18108
18114void QCPAxisRect::setBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
18115{
18116 mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
18117}
18118
18125QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18126{
18127 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18128 return mRangeDragHorzAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeDragHorzAxis.first().data();
18129 else
18130 return mRangeDragVertAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeDragVertAxis.first().data();
18131}
18132
18139QCPAxis *QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18140{
18141 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18142 return mRangeZoomHorzAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeZoomHorzAxis.first().data();
18143 else
18144 return mRangeZoomVertAxis.isEmpty() ? nullptr : mRangeZoomVertAxis.first().data();
18145}
18146
18152QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::rangeDragAxes(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18153{
18154 QList<QCPAxis*> result;
18155 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18156 {
18157 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragHorzAxis)
18158 {
18159 if (!axis.isNull())
18160 result.append(axis.data());
18161 }
18162 } else
18163 {
18164 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragVertAxis)
18165 {
18166 if (!axis.isNull())
18167 result.append(axis.data());
18168 }
18169 }
18170 return result;
18171}
18172
18178QList<QCPAxis*> QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomAxes(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18179{
18180 QList<QCPAxis*> result;
18181 if (orientation == Qt::Horizontal)
18182 {
18183 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomHorzAxis)
18184 {
18185 if (!axis.isNull())
18186 result.append(axis.data());
18187 }
18188 } else
18189 {
18190 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomVertAxis)
18191 {
18192 if (!axis.isNull())
18193 result.append(axis.data());
18194 }
18195 }
18196 return result;
18197}
18198
18204double QCPAxisRect::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation)
18205{
18206 return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
18207}
18208

18226{
18227 mRangeDrag = orientations;
18228}

18245void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoom(Qt::Orientations orientations)
18246{
18247 mRangeZoom = orientations;
18248}
18249
18261void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
18262{
18263 QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18264 if (horizontal)
18265 horz.append(horizontal);
18266 if (vertical)
18267 vert.append(vertical);
18268 setRangeDragAxes(horz, vert);
18269}
18270
18280void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> axes)
18281{
18282 QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18283 foreach (QCPAxis *ax, axes)
18284 {
18285 if (ax->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
18286 horz.append(ax);
18287 else
18288 vert.append(ax);
18289 }
18290 setRangeDragAxes(horz, vert);
18291}
18292
18299void QCPAxisRect::setRangeDragAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> horizontal, QList<QCPAxis*> vertical)
18300{
18301 mRangeDragHorzAxis.clear();
18302 foreach (QCPAxis *ax, horizontal)
18303 {
18304 QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18305 if (!axPointer.isNull())
18306 mRangeDragHorzAxis.append(axPointer);
18307 else
18308 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in horizontal list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18309 }
18310 mRangeDragVertAxis.clear();
18311 foreach (QCPAxis *ax, vertical)
18312 {
18313 QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18314 if (!axPointer.isNull())
18315 mRangeDragVertAxis.append(axPointer);
18316 else
18317 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in vertical list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18318 }
18319}
18320
18333void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QCPAxis *horizontal, QCPAxis *vertical)
18334{
18335 QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18336 if (horizontal)
18337 horz.append(horizontal);
18338 if (vertical)
18339 vert.append(vertical);
18340 setRangeZoomAxes(horz, vert);
18341}
18342
18352void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> axes)
18353{
18354 QList<QCPAxis*> horz, vert;
18355 foreach (QCPAxis *ax, axes)
18356 {
18357 if (ax->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
18358 horz.append(ax);
18359 else
18360 vert.append(ax);
18361 }
18362 setRangeZoomAxes(horz, vert);
18363}
18364
18371void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomAxes(QList<QCPAxis*> horizontal, QList<QCPAxis*> vertical)
18372{
18373 mRangeZoomHorzAxis.clear();
18374 foreach (QCPAxis *ax, horizontal)
18375 {
18376 QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18377 if (!axPointer.isNull())
18378 mRangeZoomHorzAxis.append(axPointer);
18379 else
18380 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in horizontal list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18381 }
18382 mRangeZoomVertAxis.clear();
18383 foreach (QCPAxis *ax, vertical)
18384 {
18385 QPointer<QCPAxis> axPointer(ax);
18386 if (!axPointer.isNull())
18387 mRangeZoomVertAxis.append(axPointer);
18388 else
18389 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid axis passed in vertical list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(ax);
18390 }
18391}
18392
18403void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double horizontalFactor, double verticalFactor)
18404{
18405 mRangeZoomFactorHorz = horizontalFactor;
18406 mRangeZoomFactorVert = verticalFactor;
18407}
18408
18413void QCPAxisRect::setRangeZoomFactor(double factor)
18414{
18415 mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
18416 mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
18417}
18418
18437void QCPAxisRect::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
18438{
18439 // draw background fill:
18440 if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
18441 painter->fillRect(mRect, mBackgroundBrush);
18442
18443 // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
18444 if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
18445 {
18446 if (mBackgroundScaled)
18447 {
18448 // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
18449 QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
18450 scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
18451 if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
18452 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
18453 painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft()+QPoint(0, -1), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
18454 } else
18455 {
18456 painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft()+QPoint(0, -1), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
18457 }
18458 }
18459}
18460
18471void QCPAxisRect::updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
18472{
18473 const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(type);
18474 if (axesList.isEmpty())
18475 return;
18476
18477 bool isFirstVisible = !axesList.first()->visible(); // if the first axis is visible, the second axis (which is where the loop starts) isn't the first visible axis, so initialize with false
18478 for (int i=1; i<axesList.size(); ++i)
18479 {
18480 int offset = axesList.at(i-1)->offset() + axesList.at(i-1)->calculateMargin();
18481 if (axesList.at(i)->visible()) // only add inner tick length to offset if this axis is visible and it's not the first visible one (might happen if true first axis is invisible)
18482 {
18483 if (!isFirstVisible)
18484 offset += axesList.at(i)->tickLengthIn();
18485 isFirstVisible = false;
18486 }
18487 axesList.at(i)->setOffset(offset);
18488 }
18489}
18490
18491/* inherits documentation from base class */
18492int QCPAxisRect::calculateAutoMargin(QCP::MarginSide side)
18493{
18494 if (!mAutoMargins.testFlag(side))
18495 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Called with side that isn't specified as auto margin";
18496
18497 updateAxesOffset(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
18498
18499 // note: only need to look at the last (outer most) axis to determine the total margin, due to updateAxisOffset call
18500 const QList<QCPAxis*> axesList = mAxes.value(QCPAxis::marginSideToAxisType(side));
18501 if (!axesList.isEmpty())
18502 return axesList.last()->offset() + axesList.last()->calculateMargin();
18503 else
18504 return 0;
18505}
18506
18517void QCPAxisRect::layoutChanged()
18518{
18519 if (mParentPlot && mParentPlot->axisRectCount() > 0 && mParentPlot->axisRect(0) == this)
18520 {
18521 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atBottom) > 0 && !mParentPlot->xAxis)
18522 mParentPlot->xAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atBottom);
18523 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atLeft) > 0 && !mParentPlot->yAxis)
18524 mParentPlot->yAxis = axis(QCPAxis::atLeft);
18525 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atTop) > 0 && !mParentPlot->xAxis2)
18526 mParentPlot->xAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atTop);
18527 if (axisCount(QCPAxis::atRight) > 0 && !mParentPlot->yAxis2)
18528 mParentPlot->yAxis2 = axis(QCPAxis::atRight);
18529 }
18530}
18531
18543void QCPAxisRect::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
18544{
18545 Q_UNUSED(details)
18546 if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
18547 {
18548 mDragging = true;
18549 // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
18550 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
18551 {
18552 mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
18553 mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
18554 }
18555 // Mouse range dragging interaction:
18556 if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
18557 {
18558 mDragStartHorzRange.clear();
18559 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragHorzAxis)
18560 mDragStartHorzRange.append(axis.isNull() ? QCPRange() : axis->range());
18561 mDragStartVertRange.clear();
18562 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeDragVertAxis)
18563 mDragStartVertRange.append(axis.isNull() ? QCPRange() : axis->range());
18564 }
18565 }
18566}
18567
18575void QCPAxisRect::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
18576{
18577 Q_UNUSED(startPos)
18578 // Mouse range dragging interaction:
18579 if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
18580 {
18581
18582 if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
18583 {
18584 for (int i=0; i<mRangeDragHorzAxis.size(); ++i)
18585 {
18586 QCPAxis *ax = mRangeDragHorzAxis.at(i).data();
18587 if (!ax)
18588 continue;
18589 if (i >= mDragStartHorzRange.size())
18590 break;
18591 if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
18592 {
18593 double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.x()) - ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
18594 ax->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).upper+diff);
18595 } else if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
18596 {
18597 double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.x()) / ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
18598 ax->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.at(i).upper*diff);
18599 }
18600 }
18601 }
18602
18603 if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
18604 {
18605 for (int i=0; i<mRangeDragVertAxis.size(); ++i)
18606 {
18607 QCPAxis *ax = mRangeDragVertAxis.at(i).data();
18608 if (!ax)
18609 continue;
18610 if (i >= mDragStartVertRange.size())
18611 break;
18612 if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
18613 {
18614 double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.y()) - ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
18615 ax->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.at(i).lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.at(i).upper+diff);
18616 } else if (ax->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
18617 {
18618 double diff = ax->pixelToCoord(startPos.y()) / ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
18619 ax->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.at(i).lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.at(i).upper*diff);
18620 }
18621 }
18622 }
18623
18624 if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
18625 {
18626 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
18627 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
18628 mParentPlot->replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot);
18629 }
18630
18631 }
18632}
18633
18634/* inherits documentation from base class */
18635void QCPAxisRect::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
18636{
18637 Q_UNUSED(event)
18638 Q_UNUSED(startPos)
18639 mDragging = false;
18640 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
18641 {
18642 mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
18643 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
18644 }
18645}
18646
18661void QCPAxisRect::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
18662{
18663#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0)
18664 const double delta = event->delta();
18665#else
18666 const double delta = event->angleDelta().y();
18667#endif
18668
18669#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
18670 const QPointF pos = event->pos();
18671#else
18672 const QPointF pos = event->position();
18673#endif
18674
18675 // Mouse range zooming interaction:
18676 if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
18677 {
18678 if (mRangeZoom != 0)
18679 {
18680 double factor;
18681 double wheelSteps = delta/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
18682 if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
18683 {
18684 factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
18685 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomHorzAxis)
18686 {
18687 if (!axis.isNull())
18688 axis->scaleRange(factor, axis->pixelToCoord(pos.x()));
18689 }
18690 }
18691 if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
18692 {
18693 factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
18694 foreach (QPointer<QCPAxis> axis, mRangeZoomVertAxis)
18695 {
18696 if (!axis.isNull())
18697 axis->scaleRange(factor, axis->pixelToCoord(pos.y()));
18698 }
18699 }
18700 mParentPlot->replot();
18701 }
18702 }
18703}
18704/* end of 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-axisrect.cpp' */
18705
18706
18707/* including file 'src/layoutelements/layoutelement-legend.cpp' */
18708/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:56, size 31762 */
18709
18713
18738/* start of documentation of signals */
18739
18746/* end of documentation of signals */
18747
18752QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) :
18753 QCPLayoutElement(parent->parentPlot()),
18754 mParentLegend(parent),
18755 mFont(parent->font()),
18756 mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
18757 mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
18758 mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
18759 mSelectable(true),
18760 mSelected(false)
18761{
18762 setLayer(QLatin1String("legend"));
18763 setMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
18764}
18765
18771void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setFont(const QFont &font)
18772{
18773 mFont = font;
18774}
18775
18781void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
18782{
18783 mTextColor = color;
18784}
18785
18792void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
18793{
18794 mSelectedFont = font;
18795}
18796
18803void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
18804{
18805 mSelectedTextColor = color;
18806}
18807
18813void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
18814{
18815 if (mSelectable != selectable)
18816 {
18817 mSelectable = selectable;
18818 emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
18819 }
18820}
18821
18830void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected)
18831{
18832 if (mSelected != selected)
18833 {
18834 mSelected = selected;
18835 emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
18836 }
18837}
18838
18839/* inherits documentation from base class */
18840double QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
18841{
18842 Q_UNUSED(details)
18843 if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
18844 if (onlySelectable && (!mSelectable || !mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems)))
18845 return -1;
18846
18847 if (mRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
18848 return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
18849 else
18850 return -1;
18851}
18852
18853/* inherits documentation from base class */
18854void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
18855{
18856 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegendItems);
18857}
18858
18859/* inherits documentation from base class */
18860QRect QCPAbstractLegendItem::clipRect() const
18861{
18862 return mOuterRect;
18863}
18864
18865/* inherits documentation from base class */
18866void QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
18867{
18868 Q_UNUSED(event)
18869 Q_UNUSED(details)
18870 if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
18871 {
18872 bool selBefore = mSelected;
18873 setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
18874 if (selectionStateChanged)
18875 *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18876 }
18877}
18878
18879/* inherits documentation from base class */
18880void QCPAbstractLegendItem::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
18881{
18882 if (mSelectable && mParentLegend->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems))
18883 {
18884 bool selBefore = mSelected;
18885 setSelected(false);
18886 if (selectionStateChanged)
18887 *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
18888 }
18889}
18890
18894
18926QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :
18927 QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
18928 mPlottable(plottable)
18929{
18930 setAntialiased(false);
18931}
18932
18938QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
18939{
18940 return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
18941}
18942
18948QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
18949{
18950 return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
18951}
18952
18958QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
18959{
18960 return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
18961}
18962
18969void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
18970{
18971 if (!mPlottable) return;
18972 painter->setFont(getFont());
18973 painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
18974 QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
18975 QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
18976 QRect iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
18977 int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
18978 painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
18979 // draw icon:
18980 painter->save();
18981 painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
18982 mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
18983 painter->restore();
18984 // draw icon border:
18985 if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
18986 {
18987 painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
18988 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
18989 int halfPen = qCeil(painter->pen().widthF()*0.5)+1;
18990 painter->setClipRect(mOuterRect.adjusted(-halfPen, -halfPen, halfPen, halfPen)); // extend default clip rect so thicker pens (especially during selection) are not clipped
18991 painter->drawRect(iconRect);
18992 }
18993}
18994
19002QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::minimumOuterSizeHint() const
19003{
19004 if (!mPlottable) return {};
19005 QSize result(0, 0);
19006 QRect textRect;
19007 QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
19008 QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
19009 textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
19010 result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width());
19011 result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()));
19012 result.rwidth() += mMargins.left()+mMargins.right();
19013 result.rheight() += mMargins.top()+mMargins.bottom();
19014 return result;
19015}
19016
19017
19021
19056/* start of documentation of signals */
19057
19065/* end of documentation of signals */
19066
19073QCPLegend::QCPLegend() :
19074 mIconTextPadding{}
19075{
19076 setFillOrder(QCPLayoutGrid::foRowsFirst);
19077 setWrap(0);
19078
19079 setRowSpacing(3);
19080 setColumnSpacing(8);
19081 setMargins(QMargins(7, 5, 7, 4));
19082 setAntialiased(false);
19083 setIconSize(32, 18);
19084
19085 setIconTextPadding(7);
19086
19087 setSelectableParts(spLegendBox | spItems);
19088 setSelectedParts(spNone);
19089
19090 setBorderPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0));
19091 setSelectedBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
19092 setIconBorderPen(Qt::NoPen);
19093 setSelectedIconBorderPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
19094 setBrush(Qt::white);
19095 setSelectedBrush(Qt::white);
19096 setTextColor(Qt::black);
19097 setSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue);
19098}
19099
19100QCPLegend::~QCPLegend()
19101{
19102 clearItems();
19103 if (qobject_cast<QCustomPlot*>(mParentPlot)) // make sure this isn't called from QObject dtor when QCustomPlot is already destructed (happens when the legend is not in any layout and thus QObject-child of QCustomPlot)
19104 mParentPlot->legendRemoved(this);
19105}
19106
19107/* no doc for getter, see setSelectedParts */
19108QCPLegend::SelectableParts QCPLegend::selectedParts() const
19109{
19110 // check whether any legend elements selected, if yes, add spItems to return value
19111 bool hasSelectedItems = false;
19112 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19113 {
19114 if (item(i) && item(i)->selected())
19115 {
19116 hasSelectedItems = true;
19117 break;
19118 }
19119 }
19120 if (hasSelectedItems)
19121 return mSelectedParts | spItems;
19122 else
19123 return mSelectedParts & ~spItems;
19124}
19125
19129void QCPLegend::setBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
19130{
19131 mBorderPen = pen;
19132}
19133
19137void QCPLegend::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
19138{
19139 mBrush = brush;
19140}
19141
19151void QCPLegend::setFont(const QFont &font)
19152{
19153 mFont = font;
19154 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19155 {
19156 if (item(i))
19157 item(i)->setFont(mFont);
19158 }
19159}
19160
19170void QCPLegend::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
19171{
19172 mTextColor = color;
19173 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19174 {
19175 if (item(i))
19176 item(i)->setTextColor(color);
19177 }
19178}
19179

19185{
19186 mIconSize = size;
19187}

19192{

19194 mIconSize.setHeight(height);
19195}

19203{
19204 mIconTextPadding = padding;
19205}

19213void QCPLegend::setIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)

19215 mIconBorderPen = pen;
19216}
19217
19228void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
19229{
19230 if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
19231 {
19232 mSelectableParts = selectable;
19233 emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
19234 }
19235}
19236
19258void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
19259{
19260 SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
19261 mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
19262
19263 if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
19264 {
19265 if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
19266 {
19267 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
19268 newSelected &= ~spItems;
19269 }
19270 if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
19271 {
19272 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19273 {
19274 if (item(i))
19275 item(i)->setSelected(false);
19276 }
19277 }
19278 mSelectedParts = newSelected;
19279 emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
19280 }
19281}
19282
19289void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
19290{
19291 mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
19292}
19293
19299void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
19300{
19301 mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
19302}
19303
19310void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
19311{
19312 mSelectedBrush = brush;
19313}
19314
19322void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
19323{
19324 mSelectedFont = font;
19325 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19326 {
19327 if (item(i))
19328 item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
19329 }
19330}
19331
19339void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
19340{
19341 mSelectedTextColor = color;
19342 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19343 {
19344 if (item(i))
19345 item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
19346 }
19347}
19348
19357QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
19358{
19359 return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(elementAt(index));
19360}
19361
19368QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
19369{
19370 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19371 {
19372 if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
19373 {
19374 if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
19375 return pli;
19376 }
19377 }
19378 return nullptr;
19379}
19380
19391int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
19392{
19393 return elementCount();
19394}
19395
19401bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
19402{
19403 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19404 {
19405 if (item == this->item(i))
19406 return true;
19407 }
19408 return false;
19409}
19410
19417bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
19418{
19419 return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
19420}
19421
19432bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
19433{
19434 return addElement(item);
19435}
19436
19450bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
19451{
19452 if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
19453 {
19454 bool success = remove(ali);
19455 if (success)
19456 setFillOrder(fillOrder(), true); // gets rid of empty cell by reordering
19457 return success;
19458 } else
19459 return false;
19460}
19461
19474bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
19475{
19476 bool success = remove(item);
19477 if (success)
19478 setFillOrder(fillOrder(), true); // gets rid of empty cell by reordering
19479 return success;
19480}
19481
19485void QCPLegend::clearItems()
19486{
19487 for (int i=elementCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
19488 {
19489 if (item(i))
19490 removeAt(i); // don't use removeItem() because it would unnecessarily reorder the whole legend for each item
19491 }
19492 setFillOrder(fillOrder(), true); // get rid of empty cells by reordering once after all items are removed
19493}
19494
19501QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
19502{
19503 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
19504 for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
19505 {
19506 if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
19507 {
19508 if (ali->selected())
19509 result.append(ali);
19510 }
19511 }
19512 return result;
19513}
19514
19530void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
19531{
19532 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
19533}
19534
19540QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
19541{
19542 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
19543}
19544
19550QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
19551{
19552 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
19553}
19554
19560void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19561{
19562 // draw background rect:
19563 painter->setBrush(getBrush());
19564 painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
19565 painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
19566}
19567
19568/* inherits documentation from base class */
19569double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19570{
19571 if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
19572 if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
19573 return -1;
19574
19575 if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
19576 {
19577 if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
19578 return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
19579 }
19580 return -1;
19581}
19582
19583/* inherits documentation from base class */
19584void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
19585{
19586 Q_UNUSED(event)
19587 mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
19588 if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
19589 {
19590 SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
19591 setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
19592 if (selectionStateChanged)
19593 *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
19594 }
19595}
19596
19597/* inherits documentation from base class */
19598void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
19599{
19600 mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
19601 if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
19602 {
19603 SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
19604 setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
19605 if (selectionStateChanged)
19606 *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
19607 }
19608}
19609
19610/* inherits documentation from base class */
19611QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
19612{
19613 return QCP::iSelectLegend;
19614}
19615
19616/* inherits documentation from base class */
19617QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
19618{
19619 return QCP::iSelectLegend;
19620}
19621
19622/* inherits documentation from base class */
19623void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
19624{
19625 if (parentPlot && !parentPlot->legend)
19626 parentPlot->legend = this;
19627}

19679QCPTextElement::QCPTextElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
19680 QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
19681 mText(),
19682 mTextFlags(Qt::AlignCenter),
19683 mFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 12)), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19684 mTextColor(Qt::black),
19685 mSelectedFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 12)), // will be taken from parentPlot if available, see below
19686 mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
19687 mSelectable(false),
19688 mSelected(false)
19689{
19690 if (parentPlot)
19691 {
19692 mFont = parentPlot->font();
19693 mSelectedFont = parentPlot->font();
19694 }
19695 setMargins(QMargins(2, 2, 2, 2));
19696}

19704QCPTextElement::QCPTextElement(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
