31545
31546void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setTickLabelMode(LabelMode mode)
31547{
31548 switch (mode)
31549 {
31550 case lmUpright: mLabelPainter.setAnchorMode(QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedUpright); break;
31551 case lmRotated: mLabelPainter.setAnchorMode(QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedRotated); break;
31552 }
31553}
31554
31585void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
31586{
31587 if (formatCode.isEmpty())
31588 {
31589 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
31590 return;
31591 }
31592 //mCachedMarginValid = false;
31593
31594 // interpret first char as number format char:
31595 QString allowedFormatChars(QLatin1String("eEfgG"));
31596 if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
31597 {
31598 mNumberFormatChar = QLatin1Char(formatCode.at(0).toLatin1());
31599 } else
31600 {
31601 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
31602 return;
31603 }
31604
31605 if (formatCode.length() < 2)
31606 {
31607 mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
31608 mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
31609 } else
31610 {
31611 // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
31612 if (formatCode.at(1) == QLatin1Char('b') && (mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('e') || mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('g')))
31613 mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
31614 else
31615 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
31616
31617 if (formatCode.length() < 3)
31618 {
31619 mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
31620 } else
31621 {
31622 // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
31623 if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('c'))
31624 mNumberMultiplyCross = true;
31625 else if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('d'))
31626 mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
31627 else
31628 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
31629 }
31630 }
31631 mLabelPainter.setSubstituteExponent(mNumberBeautifulPowers);
31632 mLabelPainter.setMultiplicationSymbol(mNumberMultiplyCross ? QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolCross : QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolDot);
31633}
31634
31640void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
31641{
31642 if (mNumberPrecision != precision)
31643 {
31644 mNumberPrecision = precision;
31645 //mCachedMarginValid = false;
31646 }
31647}
31648

31911
31919void QCPPolarAxisRadial::moveRange(double diff)
31920{
31921 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
31922 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
31923 {
31924 mRange.lower += diff;
31925 mRange.upper += diff;
31926 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
31927 {
31928 mRange.lower *= diff;
31929 mRange.upper *= diff;
31930 }
31931 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
31932 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
31933}
31934
31944void QCPPolarAxisRadial::scaleRange(double factor)
31945{
31946 scaleRange(factor, range().center());
31947}
31948
31958void QCPPolarAxisRadial::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
31959{
31960 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
31961 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
31962 {
31963 QCPRange newRange;
31964 newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
31965 newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
31966 if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
31967 mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
31968 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
31969 {
31970 if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
31971 {
31972 QCPRange newRange;
31973 newRange.lower = qPow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
31974 newRange.upper = qPow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
31975 if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
31976 mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
31977 } else
31978 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
31979 }
31980 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
31981 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
31982}
31983
31990void QCPPolarAxisRadial::rescale(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
31991{
31992 Q_UNUSED(onlyVisiblePlottables)
31993 /* TODO
31994 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> p = plottables();
31995 QCPRange newRange;
31996 bool haveRange = false;
31997 for (int i=0; i<p.size(); ++i)
31998 {
31999 if (!p.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisiblePlottables)
32000 continue;
32001 QCPRange plottableRange;
32002 bool currentFoundRange;
32003 QCP::SignDomain signDomain = QCP::sdBoth;
32004 if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
32005 signDomain = (mRange.upper < 0 ? QCP::sdNegative : QCP::sdPositive);
32006 if (p.at(i)->keyAxis() == this)
32007 plottableRange = p.at(i)->getKeyRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
32008 else
32009 plottableRange = p.at(i)->getValueRange(currentFoundRange, signDomain);
32010 if (currentFoundRange)
32011 {
32012 if (!haveRange)
32013 newRange = plottableRange;
32014 else
32015 newRange.expand(plottableRange);
32016 haveRange = true;
32017 }
32018 }
32019 if (haveRange)
32020 {
32021 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
32022 {
32023 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
32024 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
32025 {
32026 newRange.lower = center-mRange.size()/2.0;
32027 newRange.upper = center+mRange.size()/2.0;
32028 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
32029 {
32030 newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
32031 newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mRange.upper/mRange.lower);
32032 }
32033 }
32034 setRange(newRange);
32035 }
32036 */
32037}
32038
32042void QCPPolarAxisRadial::pixelToCoord(QPointF pixelPos, double &angleCoord, double &radiusCoord) const
32043{
32044 QCPVector2D posVector(pixelPos-mCenter);
32045 radiusCoord = radiusToCoord(posVector.length());
32046 angleCoord = mAngularAxis->angleRadToCoord(posVector.angle());
32047}
32048
32052QPointF QCPPolarAxisRadial::coordToPixel(double angleCoord, double radiusCoord) const
32053{
32054 const double radiusPixel = coordToRadius(radiusCoord);
32055 const double angleRad = mAngularAxis->coordToAngleRad(angleCoord);
32056 return QPointF(mCenter.x()+qCos(angleRad)*radiusPixel, mCenter.y()+qSin(angleRad)*radiusPixel);
32057}
32058
32059double QCPPolarAxisRadial::coordToRadius(double coord) const
32060{
32061 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
32062 {
32063 if (!mRangeReversed)
32064 return (coord-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mRadius;
32065 else
32066 return (mRange.upper-coord)/mRange.size()*mRadius;
32067 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
32068 {
32069 if (coord >= 0.0 && mRange.upper < 0.0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just return outside visible range
32070 return !mRangeReversed ? mRadius+200 : mRadius-200;
32071 else if (coord <= 0.0 && mRange.upper >= 0.0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just return outside visible range
32072 return !mRangeReversed ? mRadius-200 :mRadius+200;
32073 else
32074 {
32075 if (!mRangeReversed)
32076 return qLn(coord/mRange.lower)/qLn(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mRadius;
32077 else
32078 return qLn(mRange.upper/coord)/qLn(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mRadius;
32079 }
32080 }
32081}
32082
32083double QCPPolarAxisRadial::radiusToCoord(double radius) const
32084{
32085 if (mScaleType == stLinear)
32086 {
32087 if (!mRangeReversed)
32088 return (radius)/mRadius*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
32089 else
32090 return -(radius)/mRadius*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
32091 } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
32092 {
32093 if (!mRangeReversed)
32094 return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (radius)/mRadius)*mRange.lower;
32095 else
32096 return qPow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (-radius)/mRadius)*mRange.upper;
32097 }
32098}
32099
32100
32110QCPPolarAxisRadial::SelectablePart QCPPolarAxisRadial::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
32111{
32112 Q_UNUSED(pos) // TODO remove later
32113 if (!mVisible)
32114 return spNone;
32115
32116 /*
32117 TODO:
32118 if (mAxisPainter->axisSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
32119 return spAxis;
32120 else if (mAxisPainter->tickLabelsSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
32121 return spTickLabels;
32122 else if (mAxisPainter->labelSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
32123 return spAxisLabel;
32124 else */
32125 return spNone;
32126}
32127
32128/* inherits documentation from base class */
32129double QCPPolarAxisRadial::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
32130{
32131 if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
32132 SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
32133 if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
32134 return -1;
32135
32136 if (details)
32137 details->setValue(part);
32138 return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
32139}
32140
32141/* inherits documentation from base class */
32142void QCPPolarAxisRadial::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
32143{
32144 Q_UNUSED(event)
32145 SelectablePart part = details.value<SelectablePart>();
32146 if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(part))
32147 {
32148 SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
32149 setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^part : part);
32150 if (selectionStateChanged)
32151 *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
32152 }
32153}
32154
32155/* inherits documentation from base class */
32156void QCPPolarAxisRadial::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
32157{
32158 SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
32159 setSelectedParts(mSelectedParts & ~mSelectableParts);
32160 if (selectionStateChanged)
32161 *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
32162}
32163
32179void QCPPolarAxisRadial::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
32180{
32181 Q_UNUSED(details)
32182 if (!mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
32183 {
32184 event->ignore();
32185 return;
32186 }
32187
32188 if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
32189 {
32190 mDragging = true;
32191 // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
32192 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
32193 {
32194 mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
32195 mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
32196 }
32197 // Mouse range dragging interaction:
32198 if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
32199 mDragStartRange = mRange;
32200 }
32201}
32202
32215void QCPPolarAxisRadial::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
32216{
32217 Q_UNUSED(event) // TODO remove later
32218 Q_UNUSED(startPos) // TODO remove later
32219 if (mDragging)
32220 {
32221 /* TODO
32222 const double startPixel = orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? startPos.x() : startPos.y();
32223 const double currentPixel = orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? event->pos().x() : event->pos().y();
32224 if (mScaleType == QCPPolarAxisRadial::stLinear)
32225 {
32226 const double diff = pixelToCoord(startPixel) - pixelToCoord(currentPixel);
32227 setRange(mDragStartRange.lower+diff, mDragStartRange.upper+diff);
32228 } else if (mScaleType == QCPPolarAxisRadial::stLogarithmic)
32229 {
32230 const double diff = pixelToCoord(startPixel) / pixelToCoord(currentPixel);
32231 setRange(mDragStartRange.lower*diff, mDragStartRange.upper*diff);
32232 }
32233 */
32234
32235 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
32236 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
32237 mParentPlot->replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot);
32238 }
32239}
32240
32253void QCPPolarAxisRadial::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
32254{
32255 Q_UNUSED(event)
32256 Q_UNUSED(startPos)
32257 mDragging = false;
32258 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
32259 {
32260 mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
32261 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
32262 }
32263}
32264
32280void QCPPolarAxisRadial::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
32281{
32282 // Mouse range zooming interaction:
32283 if (!mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
32284 {
32285 event->ignore();
32286 return;
32287 }
32288
32289 // TODO:
32290 //const double wheelSteps = event->delta()/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
32291 //const double factor = qPow(mRangeZoomFactor, wheelSteps);
32292 //scaleRange(factor, pixelToCoord(orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? event->pos().x() : event->pos().y()));
32293 mParentPlot->replot();
32294}
32295
32296void QCPPolarAxisRadial::updateGeometry(const QPointF &center, double radius)
32297{
32298 mCenter = center;
32299 mRadius = radius;
32300 if (mRadius < 1) mRadius = 1;
32301}
32302
32318void QCPPolarAxisRadial::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
32319{
32320 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
32321}
32322
32329void QCPPolarAxisRadial::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
32330{
32331 const double axisAngleRad = (mAngle+(mAngleReference==arAngularAxis ? mAngularAxis->angle() : 0))/180.0*M_PI;
32332 const QPointF axisVector(qCos(axisAngleRad), qSin(axisAngleRad)); // semantically should be QCPVector2D, but we save time in loops when we keep it as QPointF
32333 const QPointF tickNormal = QCPVector2D(axisVector).perpendicular().toPointF(); // semantically should be QCPVector2D, but we save time in loops when we keep it as QPointF
32334
32335 // draw baseline:
32336 painter->setPen(getBasePen());
32337 painter->drawLine(QLineF(mCenter, mCenter+axisVector*(mRadius-0.5)));
32338
32339 // draw subticks:
32340 if (!mSubTickVector.isEmpty())
32341 {
32342 painter->setPen(getSubTickPen());
32343 for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
32344 {
32345 const QPointF tickPosition = mCenter+axisVector*coordToRadius(mSubTickVector.at(i));
32346 painter->drawLine(QLineF(tickPosition-tickNormal*mSubTickLengthIn, tickPosition+tickNormal*mSubTickLengthOut));
32347 }
32348 }
32349
32350 // draw ticks and labels:
32351 if (!mTickVector.isEmpty())
32352 {
32353 mLabelPainter.setAnchorReference(mCenter-axisVector); // subtract (normalized) axisVector, just to prevent degenerate tangents for tick label at exact lower axis range
32354 mLabelPainter.setFont(getTickLabelFont());
32355 mLabelPainter.setColor(getTickLabelColor());
32356 const QPen ticksPen = getTickPen();
32357 painter->setPen(ticksPen);
32358 for (int i=0; i<mTickVector.size(); ++i)
32359 {
32360 const double r = coordToRadius(mTickVector.at(i));
32361 const QPointF tickPosition = mCenter+axisVector*r;
32362 painter->drawLine(QLineF(tickPosition-tickNormal*mTickLengthIn, tickPosition+tickNormal*mTickLengthOut));
32363 // possibly draw tick labels:
32364 if (!mTickVectorLabels.isEmpty())
32365 {
32366 if ((!mRangeReversed && (i < mTickVectorLabels.count()-1 || mRadius-r > 10)) ||
32367 (mRangeReversed && (i > 0 || mRadius-r > 10))) // skip last label if it's closer than 10 pixels to angular axis
32368 mLabelPainter.drawTickLabel(painter, tickPosition+tickNormal*mSubTickLengthOut, mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
32369 }
32370 }
32371 }
32372}
32373
32382void QCPPolarAxisRadial::setupTickVectors()
32383{
32384 if (!mParentPlot) return;
32385 if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
32386
32387 mTicker->generate(mRange, mParentPlot->locale(), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision, mTickVector, mSubTicks ? &mSubTickVector : 0, mTickLabels ? &mTickVectorLabels : 0);
32388}
32389
32395QPen QCPPolarAxisRadial::getBasePen() const
32396{
32397 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
32398}
32399
32405QPen QCPPolarAxisRadial::getTickPen() const
32406{
32407 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
32408}
32409
32415QPen QCPPolarAxisRadial::getSubTickPen() const
32416{
32417 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
32418}
32419
32425QFont QCPPolarAxisRadial::getTickLabelFont() const
32426{
32427 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
32428}
32429
32435QFont QCPPolarAxisRadial::getLabelFont() const
32436{
32437 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
32438}
32439
32445QColor QCPPolarAxisRadial::getTickLabelColor() const
32446{
32447 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
32448}
32449
32455QColor QCPPolarAxisRadial::getLabelColor() const
32456{
32457 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
32458}
32459
32460
32461/* inherits documentation from base class */
32462QCP::Interaction QCPPolarAxisRadial::selectionCategory() const
32463{
32464 return QCP::iSelectAxes;
32465}

32567
32572QCPPolarAxisAngular::QCPPolarAxisAngular(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
32573 QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
32574 mBackgroundBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
32575 mBackgroundScaled(true),
32576 mBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding),
32577 mInsetLayout(new QCPLayoutInset),
32578 mRangeDrag(false),
32579 mRangeZoom(false),
32580 mRangeZoomFactor(0.85),
32581 // axis base:
32582 mAngle(-90),
32583 mAngleRad(mAngle/180.0*M_PI),
32584 mSelectableParts(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel),
32585 mSelectedParts(spNone),
32586 mBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
32587 mSelectedBasePen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
32588 // axis label:
32589 mLabelPadding(0),
32590 mLabel(),
32591 mLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
32592 mSelectedLabelFont(QFont(mLabelFont.family(), mLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
32593 mLabelColor(Qt::black),
32594 mSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue),
32595 // tick labels:
32596 //mTickLabelPadding(0), in label painter
32597 mTickLabels(true),
32598 //mTickLabelRotation(0), in label painter
32599 mTickLabelFont(mParentPlot->font()),
32600 mSelectedTickLabelFont(QFont(mTickLabelFont.family(), mTickLabelFont.pointSize(), QFont::Bold)),
32601 mTickLabelColor(Qt::black),
32602 mSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue),
32603 mNumberPrecision(6),
32604 mNumberFormatChar('g'),
32605 mNumberBeautifulPowers(true),
32606 mNumberMultiplyCross(false),
32607 // ticks and subticks:
32608 mTicks(true),
32609 mSubTicks(true),
32610 mTickLengthIn(5),
32611 mTickLengthOut(0),
32612 mSubTickLengthIn(2),
32613 mSubTickLengthOut(0),
32614 mTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
32615 mSelectedTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
32616 mSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap)),
32617 mSelectedSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2)),
32618 // scale and range:
32619 mRange(0, 360),
32620 mRangeReversed(false),
32621 // internal members:
32622 mRadius(1), // non-zero initial value, will be overwritten in ::update() according to inner rect
32623 mGrid(new QCPPolarGrid(this)),
32624 mTicker(new QCPAxisTickerFixed),
32625 mDragging(false),
32626 mLabelPainter(parentPlot)
32627{
32628 // TODO:
32629 //mInsetLayout->initializeParentPlot(mParentPlot);
32630 //mInsetLayout->setParentLayerable(this);
32631 //mInsetLayout->setParent(this);
32632
32633 if (QCPAxisTickerFixed *fixedTicker = mTicker.dynamicCast<QCPAxisTickerFixed>().data())
32634 {
32635 fixedTicker->setTickStep(30);
32636 }
32637 setAntialiased(true);
32638 setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer()); // it's actually on that layer already, but we want it in front of the grid, so we place it on there again
32639
32640 setTickLabelPadding(5);
32641 setTickLabelRotation(0);
32642 setTickLabelMode(lmUpright);
32643 mLabelPainter.setAnchorReferenceType(QCPLabelPainterPrivate::artNormal);
32644 mLabelPainter.setAbbreviateDecimalPowers(false);
32645 mLabelPainter.setCacheSize(24); // so we can cache up to 15-degree intervals, polar angular axis uses a bit larger cache than normal axes
32646
32647 setMinimumSize(50, 50);
32648 setMinimumMargins(QMargins(30, 30, 30, 30));
32649
32650 addRadialAxis();
32651 mGrid->setRadialAxis(radialAxis());
32652}
32653
32654QCPPolarAxisAngular::~QCPPolarAxisAngular()
32655{
32656 delete mGrid; // delete grid here instead of via parent ~QObject for better defined deletion order
32657 mGrid = 0;
32658
32659 delete mInsetLayout;
32660 mInsetLayout = 0;
32661
32662 QList<QCPPolarAxisRadial*> radialAxesList = radialAxes();
32663 for (int i=0; i<radialAxesList.size(); ++i)
32664 removeRadialAxis(radialAxesList.at(i));
32665}
32666
32667QCPPolarAxisAngular::LabelMode QCPPolarAxisAngular::tickLabelMode() const
32668{
32669 switch (mLabelPainter.anchorMode())
32670 {
32671 case QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedUpright: return lmUpright;
32672 case QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedRotated: return lmRotated;
32673 default: qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid mode for polar axis"; break;
32674 }
32675 return lmUpright;
32676}
32677
32678/* No documentation as it is a property getter */
32679QString QCPPolarAxisAngular::numberFormat() const
32680{
32681 QString result;
32682 result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
32683 if (mNumberBeautifulPowers)
32684 {
32685 result.append(QLatin1Char('b'));
32686 if (mLabelPainter.multiplicationSymbol() == QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolCross)
32687 result.append(QLatin1Char('c'));
32688 }
32689 return result;
32690}
32691
32697int QCPPolarAxisAngular::radialAxisCount() const
32698{
32699 return mRadialAxes.size();
32700}
32701
32707QCPPolarAxisRadial *QCPPolarAxisAngular::radialAxis(int index) const
32708{
32709 if (index >= 0 && index < mRadialAxes.size())
32710 {
32711 return mRadialAxes.at(index);
32712 } else
32713 {
32714 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Axis index out of bounds:" << index;
32715 return 0;
32716 }
32717}
32718
32727QList<QCPPolarAxisRadial*> QCPPolarAxisAngular::radialAxes() const
32728{
32729 return mRadialAxes;
32730}
32731
32732
32753QCPPolarAxisRadial *QCPPolarAxisAngular::addRadialAxis(QCPPolarAxisRadial *axis)
32754{
32755 QCPPolarAxisRadial *newAxis = axis;
32756 if (!newAxis)
32757 {
32758 newAxis = new QCPPolarAxisRadial(this);
32759 } else // user provided existing axis instance, do some sanity checks
32760 {
32761 if (newAxis->angularAxis() != this)
32762 {
32763 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed radial axis doesn't have this angular axis as parent angular axis";
32764 return 0;
32765 }
32766 if (radialAxes().contains(newAxis))
32767 {
32768 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed axis is already owned by this angular axis";
32769 return 0;
32770 }
32771 }
32772 mRadialAxes.append(newAxis);
32773 return newAxis;
32774}
32775
32783bool QCPPolarAxisAngular::removeRadialAxis(QCPPolarAxisRadial *radialAxis)
32784{
32785 if (mRadialAxes.contains(radialAxis))
32786 {
32787 mRadialAxes.removeOne(radialAxis);
32788 delete radialAxis;
32789 return true;
32790 } else
32791 {
32792 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Radial axis isn't associated with this angular axis:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(radialAxis);
32793 return false;
32794 }
32795}
32796
32797QRegion QCPPolarAxisAngular::exactClipRegion() const
32798{
32799 return QRegion(mCenter.x()-mRadius, mCenter.y()-mRadius, qRound(2*mRadius), qRound(2*mRadius), QRegion::Ellipse);
32800}
32801
32809void QCPPolarAxisAngular::moveRange(double diff)
32810{
32811 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
32812 mRange.lower += diff;
32813 mRange.upper += diff;
32814 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
32815 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
32816}
32817
32827void QCPPolarAxisAngular::scaleRange(double factor)
32828{
32829 scaleRange(factor, range().center());
32830}
32831
32841void QCPPolarAxisAngular::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
32842{
32843 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
32844 QCPRange newRange;
32845 newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
32846 newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
32847 if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
32848 mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
32849 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
32850 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
32851}
32852
32859void QCPPolarAxisAngular::rescale(bool onlyVisiblePlottables)
32860{
32861 QCPRange newRange;
32862 bool haveRange = false;
32863 for (int i=0; i<mGraphs.size(); ++i)
32864 {
32865 if (!mGraphs.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisiblePlottables)
32866 continue;
32867 QCPRange range;
32868 bool currentFoundRange;
32869 if (mGraphs.at(i)->keyAxis() == this)
32870 range = mGraphs.at(i)->getKeyRange(currentFoundRange, QCP::sdBoth);
32871 else
32872 range = mGraphs.at(i)->getValueRange(currentFoundRange, QCP::sdBoth);
32873 if (currentFoundRange)
32874 {
32875 if (!haveRange)
32876 newRange = range;
32877 else
32878 newRange.expand(range);
32879 haveRange = true;
32880 }
32881 }
32882 if (haveRange)
32883 {
32884 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
32885 {
32886 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
32887 newRange.lower = center-mRange.size()/2.0;
32888 newRange.upper = center+mRange.size()/2.0;
32889 }
32890 setRange(newRange);
32891 }
32892}
32893
32897void QCPPolarAxisAngular::pixelToCoord(QPointF pixelPos, double &angleCoord, double &radiusCoord) const
32898{
32899 if (!mRadialAxes.isEmpty())
32900 mRadialAxes.first()->pixelToCoord(pixelPos, angleCoord, radiusCoord);
32901 else
32902 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no radial axis configured";
32903}
32904
32908QPointF QCPPolarAxisAngular::coordToPixel(double angleCoord, double radiusCoord) const
32909{
32910 if (!mRadialAxes.isEmpty())
32911 {
32912 return mRadialAxes.first()->coordToPixel(angleCoord, radiusCoord);
32913 } else
32914 {
32915 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "no radial axis configured";
32916 return QPointF();
32917 }
32918}
32919
32929QCPPolarAxisAngular::SelectablePart QCPPolarAxisAngular::getPartAt(const QPointF &pos) const
32930{
32931 Q_UNUSED(pos) // TODO remove later
32932
32933 if (!mVisible)
32934 return spNone;
32935
32936 /*
32937 TODO:
32938 if (mAxisPainter->axisSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
32939 return spAxis;
32940 else if (mAxisPainter->tickLabelsSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
32941 return spTickLabels;
32942 else if (mAxisPainter->labelSelectionBox().contains(pos.toPoint()))
32943 return spAxisLabel;
32944 else */
32945 return spNone;
32946}
32947
32948/* inherits documentation from base class */
32949double QCPPolarAxisAngular::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
32950{
32951 /*
32952 if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
32953 SelectablePart part = getPartAt(pos);
32954 if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(part)) || part == spNone)
32955 return -1;
32956
32957 if (details)
32958 details->setValue(part);
32959 return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
32960 */
32961
32962 Q_UNUSED(details)
32963
32964 if (onlySelectable)
32965 return -1;
32966
32967 if (QRectF(mOuterRect).contains(pos))
32968 {
32969 if (mParentPlot)
32970 return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
32971 else
32972 {
32973 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "parent plot not defined";
32974 return -1;
32975 }
32976 } else
32977 return -1;
32978}
32979
32990void QCPPolarAxisAngular::update(UpdatePhase phase)
32991{
32992 QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
32993
32994 switch (phase)
32995 {
32996 case upPreparation:
32997 {
32998 setupTickVectors();
32999 for (int i=0; i<mRadialAxes.size(); ++i)
33000 mRadialAxes.at(i)->setupTickVectors();
33001 break;
33002 }
33003 case upLayout:
33004 {
33005 mCenter = mRect.center();
33006 mRadius = 0.5*qMin(qAbs(mRect.width()), qAbs(mRect.height()));
33007 if (mRadius < 1) mRadius = 1; // prevent cases where radius might become 0 which causes trouble
33008 for (int i=0; i<mRadialAxes.size(); ++i)
33009 mRadialAxes.at(i)->updateGeometry(mCenter, mRadius);
33010
33011 mInsetLayout->setOuterRect(rect());
33012 break;
33013 }
33014 default: break;
33015 }
33016
33017 // pass update call on to inset layout (doesn't happen automatically, because QCPPolarAxis doesn't derive from QCPLayout):
33018 mInsetLayout->update(phase);
33019}
33020
33021/* inherits documentation from base class */
33022QList<QCPLayoutElement*> QCPPolarAxisAngular::elements(bool recursive) const
33023{
33024 QList<QCPLayoutElement*> result;
33025 if (mInsetLayout)
33026 {
33027 result << mInsetLayout;
33028 if (recursive)
33029 result << mInsetLayout->elements(recursive);
33030 }
33031 return result;
33032}
33033
33034bool QCPPolarAxisAngular::removeGraph(QCPPolarGraph *graph)
33035{
33036 if (!mGraphs.contains(graph))
33037 {
33038 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(graph);
33039 return false;
33040 }
33041
33042 // remove plottable from legend:
33043 graph->removeFromLegend();
33044 // remove plottable:
33045 delete graph;
33046 mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
33047 return true;
33048}
33049
33050/* inherits documentation from base class */
33051void QCPPolarAxisAngular::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
33052{
33053 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
33054}
33055
33056/* inherits documentation from base class */
33057void QCPPolarAxisAngular::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
33058{
33059 drawBackground(painter, mCenter, mRadius);
33060
33061 // draw baseline circle:
33062 painter->setPen(getBasePen());
33063 painter->drawEllipse(mCenter, mRadius, mRadius);
33064
33065 // draw subticks:
33066 if (!mSubTickVector.isEmpty())
33067 {
33068 painter->setPen(getSubTickPen());
33069 for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
33070 {
33071 painter->drawLine(mCenter+mSubTickVectorCosSin.at(i)*(mRadius-mSubTickLengthIn),
33072 mCenter+mSubTickVectorCosSin.at(i)*(mRadius+mSubTickLengthOut));
33073 }
33074 }
33075
33076 // draw ticks and labels:
33077 if (!mTickVector.isEmpty())
33078 {
33079 mLabelPainter.setAnchorReference(mCenter);
33080 mLabelPainter.setFont(getTickLabelFont());
33081 mLabelPainter.setColor(getTickLabelColor());
33082 const QPen ticksPen = getTickPen();
33083 painter->setPen(ticksPen);
33084 for (int i=0; i<mTickVector.size(); ++i)
33085 {
33086 const QPointF outerTick = mCenter+mTickVectorCosSin.at(i)*(mRadius+mTickLengthOut);
33087 painter->drawLine(mCenter+mTickVectorCosSin.at(i)*(mRadius-mTickLengthIn), outerTick);
33088 // draw tick labels:
33089 if (!mTickVectorLabels.isEmpty())
33090 {
33091 if (i < mTickVectorLabels.count()-1 || (mTickVectorCosSin.at(i)-mTickVectorCosSin.first()).manhattanLength() > 5/180.0*M_PI) // skip last label if it's closer than approx 5 degrees to first
33092 mLabelPainter.drawTickLabel(painter, outerTick, mTickVectorLabels.at(i));
33093 }
33094 }
33095 }
33096}
33097
33098/* inherits documentation from base class */
33099QCP::Interaction QCPPolarAxisAngular::selectionCategory() const
33100{
33101 return QCP::iSelectAxes;
33102}
33103

33121{
33122 mBackgroundPixmap = pm;
33123 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
33124}

33140{
33141 mBackgroundBrush = brush;
33142}

33151void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)

33154 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = QPixmap();
33155 mBackgroundScaled = scaled;
33156 mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
33157}

33171 mBackgroundScaled = scaled;

33180{
33181 mBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
33182}

33186 mRangeDrag = enabled;

33195{
33196 mRangeZoomFactor = factor;
33197}

33200
33201
33202
33203
33204
33213void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setRange(const QCPRange &range)
33214{
33215 if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
33216 return;
33217
33218 if (!QCPRange::validRange(range)) return;
33219 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
33220 mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
33221 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
33222 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
33223}
33224
33235void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
33236{
33237 if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
33238 {
33239 mSelectableParts = selectable;
33240 emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
33241 }
33242}
33243
33259void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
33260{
33261 if (mSelectedParts != selected)
33262 {
33263 mSelectedParts = selected;
33264 emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
33265 }
33266}
33267
33277void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setRange(double lower, double upper)
33278{
33279 if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
33280 return;
33281
33282 if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper)) return;
33283 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
33284 mRange.lower = lower;
33285 mRange.upper = upper;
33286 mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
33287 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
33288 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
33289}
33290
33302void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setRange(double position, double size, Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment)
33303{
33304 if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
33305 setRange(position, position+size);
33306 else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
33307 setRange(position-size, position);
33308 else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
33309 setRange(position-size/2.0, position+size/2.0);
33310}
33311
33316void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setRangeLower(double lower)
33317{
33318 if (mRange.lower == lower)
33319 return;
33320
33321 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
33322 mRange.lower = lower;
33323 mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
33324 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
33325 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
33326}
33327
33332void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setRangeUpper(double upper)
33333{
33334 if (mRange.upper == upper)
33335 return;
33336
33337 QCPRange oldRange = mRange;
33338 mRange.upper = upper;
33339 mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
33340 emit rangeChanged(mRange);
33341 emit rangeChanged(mRange, oldRange);
33342}
33343
33353void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setRangeReversed(bool reversed)
33354{
33355 mRangeReversed = reversed;
33356}
33357
33358void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setAngle(double degrees)
33359{
33360 mAngle = degrees;
33361 mAngleRad = mAngle/180.0*M_PI;
33362}
33363
33377void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setTicker(QSharedPointer<QCPAxisTicker> ticker)
33378{
33379 if (ticker)
33380 mTicker = ticker;
33381 else
33382 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can not set 0 as axis ticker";
33383 // no need to invalidate margin cache here because produced tick labels are checked for changes in setupTickVector
33384}
33385

33398 mTicks = show;
33399 //mCachedMarginValid = false;
33400 }
33401}

33410 mTickLabels = show;
33411 //mCachedMarginValid = false;
33412 if (!mTickLabels)
33413 mTickVectorLabels.clear();
33414 }
33415}

33459
33460void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setTickLabelMode(LabelMode mode)
33461{
33462 switch (mode)
33463 {
33464 case lmUpright: mLabelPainter.setAnchorMode(QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedUpright); break;
33465 case lmRotated: mLabelPainter.setAnchorMode(QCPLabelPainterPrivate::amSkewedRotated); break;
33466 }
33467}
33468
33499void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
33500{
33501 if (formatCode.isEmpty())
33502 {
33503 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Passed formatCode is empty";
33504 return;
33505 }
33506 //mCachedMarginValid = false;
33507
33508 // interpret first char as number format char:
33509 QString allowedFormatChars(QLatin1String("eEfgG"));
33510 if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
33511 {
33512 mNumberFormatChar = QLatin1Char(formatCode.at(0).toLatin1());
33513 } else
33514 {
33515 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
33516 return;
33517 }
33518
33519 if (formatCode.length() < 2)
33520 {
33521 mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
33522 mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
33523 } else
33524 {
33525 // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
33526 if (formatCode.at(1) == QLatin1Char('b') && (mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('e') || mNumberFormatChar == QLatin1Char('g')))
33527 mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
33528 else
33529 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
33530
33531 if (formatCode.length() < 3)
33532 {
33533 mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
33534 } else
33535 {
33536 // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
33537 if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('c'))
33538 mNumberMultiplyCross = true;
33539 else if (formatCode.at(2) == QLatin1Char('d'))
33540 mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
33541 else
33542 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
33543 }
33544 }
33545 mLabelPainter.setSubstituteExponent(mNumberBeautifulPowers);
33546 mLabelPainter.setMultiplicationSymbol(mNumberMultiplyCross ? QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolCross : QCPLabelPainterPrivate::SymbolDot);
33547}
33548
33554void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
33555{
33556 if (mNumberPrecision != precision)
33557 {
33558 mNumberPrecision = precision;
33559 //mCachedMarginValid = false;
33560 }
33561}

33825
33844void QCPPolarAxisAngular::drawBackground(QCPPainter *painter, const QPointF &center, double radius)
33845{
33846 // draw background fill (don't use circular clip, looks bad):
33847 if (mBackgroundBrush != Qt::NoBrush)
33848 {
33849 QPainterPath ellipsePath;
33850 ellipsePath.addEllipse(center, radius, radius);
33851 painter->fillPath(ellipsePath, mBackgroundBrush);
33852 }
33853
33854 // draw background pixmap (on top of fill, if brush specified):
33855 if (!mBackgroundPixmap.isNull())
33856 {
33857 QRegion clipCircle(center.x()-radius, center.y()-radius, qRound(2*radius), qRound(2*radius), QRegion::Ellipse);
33858 QRegion originalClip = painter->clipRegion();
33859 painter->setClipRegion(clipCircle);
33860 if (mBackgroundScaled)
33861 {
33862 // check whether mScaledBackground needs to be updated:
33863 QSize scaledSize(mBackgroundPixmap.size());
33864 scaledSize.scale(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode);
33865 if (mScaledBackgroundPixmap.size() != scaledSize)
33866 mScaledBackgroundPixmap = mBackgroundPixmap.scaled(mRect.size(), mBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
33867 painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft()+QPoint(0, -1), mScaledBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()) & mScaledBackgroundPixmap.rect());
33868 } else
33869 {
33870 painter->drawPixmap(mRect.topLeft()+QPoint(0, -1), mBackgroundPixmap, QRect(0, 0, mRect.width(), mRect.height()));
33871 }
33872 painter->setClipRegion(originalClip);
33873 }
33874}
33875
33884void QCPPolarAxisAngular::setupTickVectors()
33885{
33886 if (!mParentPlot) return;
33887 if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
33888
33889 mSubTickVector.clear(); // since we might not pass it to mTicker->generate(), and we don't want old data in there
33890 mTicker->generate(mRange, mParentPlot->locale(), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision, mTickVector, mSubTicks ? &mSubTickVector : 0, mTickLabels ? &mTickVectorLabels : 0);
33891
33892 // fill cos/sin buffers which will be used by draw() and QCPPolarGrid::draw(), so we don't have to calculate it twice:
33893 mTickVectorCosSin.resize(mTickVector.size());
33894 for (int i=0; i<mTickVector.size(); ++i)
33895 {
33896 const double theta = coordToAngleRad(mTickVector.at(i));
33897 mTickVectorCosSin[i] = QPointF(qCos(theta), qSin(theta));
33898 }
33899 mSubTickVectorCosSin.resize(mSubTickVector.size());
33900 for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
33901 {
33902 const double theta = coordToAngleRad(mSubTickVector.at(i));
33903 mSubTickVectorCosSin[i] = QPointF(qCos(theta), qSin(theta));
33904 }
33905}
33906
33912QPen QCPPolarAxisAngular::getBasePen() const
33913{
33914 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
33915}
33916
33922QPen QCPPolarAxisAngular::getTickPen() const
33923{
33924 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
33925}
33926
33932QPen QCPPolarAxisAngular::getSubTickPen() const
33933{
33934 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
33935}
33936
33942QFont QCPPolarAxisAngular::getTickLabelFont() const
33943{
33944 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
33945}
33946
33952QFont QCPPolarAxisAngular::getLabelFont() const
33953{
33954 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
33955}
33956
33962QColor QCPPolarAxisAngular::getTickLabelColor() const
33963{
33964 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
33965}
33966
33972QColor QCPPolarAxisAngular::getLabelColor() const
33973{
33974 return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
33975}
33976
33988void QCPPolarAxisAngular::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QVariant &details)
33989{
33990 Q_UNUSED(details)
33991 if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
33992 {
33993 mDragging = true;
33994 // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
33995 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
33996 {
33997 mAADragBackup = mParentPlot->antialiasedElements();
33998 mNotAADragBackup = mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements();
33999 }
34000 // Mouse range dragging interaction:
34001 if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
34002 {
34003 mDragAngularStart = range();
34004 mDragRadialStart.clear();
34005 for (int i=0; i<mRadialAxes.size(); ++i)
34006 mDragRadialStart.append(mRadialAxes.at(i)->range());
34007 }
34008 }
34009}
34010
34018void QCPPolarAxisAngular::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
34019{
34020 Q_UNUSED(startPos)
34021 bool doReplot = false;
34022 // Mouse range dragging interaction:
34023 if (mDragging && mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeDrag))
34024 {
34025 if (mRangeDrag)
34026 {
34027 doReplot = true;
34028 double angleCoordStart, radiusCoordStart;
34029 double angleCoord, radiusCoord;
34030 pixelToCoord(startPos, angleCoordStart, radiusCoordStart);
34031 pixelToCoord(event->pos(), angleCoord, radiusCoord);
34032 double diff = angleCoordStart - angleCoord;
34033 setRange(mDragAngularStart.lower+diff, mDragAngularStart.upper+diff);
34034 }
34035
34036 for (int i=0; i<mRadialAxes.size(); ++i)
34037 {
34038 QCPPolarAxisRadial *ax = mRadialAxes.at(i);
34039 if (!ax->rangeDrag())
34040 continue;
34041 doReplot = true;
34042 double angleCoordStart, radiusCoordStart;
34043 double angleCoord, radiusCoord;
34044 ax->pixelToCoord(startPos, angleCoordStart, radiusCoordStart);
34045 ax->pixelToCoord(event->pos(), angleCoord, radiusCoord);
34046 if (ax->scaleType() == QCPPolarAxisRadial::stLinear)
34047 {
34048 double diff = radiusCoordStart - radiusCoord;
34049 ax->setRange(mDragRadialStart.at(i).lower+diff, mDragRadialStart.at(i).upper+diff);
34050 } else if (ax->scaleType() == QCPPolarAxisRadial::stLogarithmic)
34051 {
34052 if (radiusCoord != 0)
34053 {
34054 double diff = radiusCoordStart/radiusCoord;
34055 ax->setRange(mDragRadialStart.at(i).lower*diff, mDragRadialStart.at(i).upper*diff);
34056 }
34057 }
34058 }
34059
34060 if (doReplot) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
34061 {
34062 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
34063 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
34064 mParentPlot->replot(QCustomPlot::rpQueuedReplot);
34065 }
34066 }
34067}
34068
34069/* inherits documentation from base class */
34070void QCPPolarAxisAngular::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event, const QPointF &startPos)
34071{
34072 Q_UNUSED(event)
34073 Q_UNUSED(startPos)
34074 mDragging = false;
34075 if (mParentPlot->noAntialiasingOnDrag())
34076 {
34077 mParentPlot->setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
34078 mParentPlot->setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
34079 }
34080}
34081
34096void QCPPolarAxisAngular::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
34097{
34098 bool doReplot = false;
34099 // Mouse range zooming interaction:
34100 if (mParentPlot->interactions().testFlag(QCP::iRangeZoom))
34101 {
34102#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 0, 0)
34103 const double delta = event->delta();
34104#else
34105 const double delta = event->angleDelta().y();
34106#endif
34107
34108#if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(5, 14, 0)
34109 const QPointF pos = event->pos();
34110#else
34111 const QPointF pos = event->position();
34112#endif
34113 const double wheelSteps = delta/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
34114 if (mRangeZoom)
34115 {
34116 double angleCoord, radiusCoord;
34117 pixelToCoord(pos, angleCoord, radiusCoord);
34118 scaleRange(qPow(mRangeZoomFactor, wheelSteps), angleCoord);
34119 }
34120
34121 for (int i=0; i<mRadialAxes.size(); ++i)
34122 {
34123 QCPPolarAxisRadial *ax = mRadialAxes.at(i);
34124 if (!ax->rangeZoom())
34125 continue;
34126 doReplot = true;
34127 double angleCoord, radiusCoord;
34128 ax->pixelToCoord(pos, angleCoord, radiusCoord);
34129 ax->scaleRange(qPow(ax->rangeZoomFactor(), wheelSteps), radiusCoord);
34130 }
34131 }
34132 if (doReplot)
34133 mParentPlot->replot();
34134}
34135
34136bool QCPPolarAxisAngular::registerPolarGraph(QCPPolarGraph *graph)
34137{
34138 if (mGraphs.contains(graph))
34139 {
34140 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(graph);
34141 return false;
34142 }
34143 if (graph->keyAxis() != this)
34144 {
34145 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this as axis:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(graph);
34146 return false;
34147 }
34148
34149 mGraphs.append(graph);
34150 // possibly add plottable to legend:
34151 if (mParentPlot->autoAddPlottableToLegend())
34152 graph->addToLegend();
34153 if (!graph->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
34154 graph->setLayer(mParentPlot->currentLayer());
34155 return true;
34156}
34157/* end of 'src/polar/layoutelement-angularaxis.cpp' */
34158
34159
34160/* including file 'src/polar/polargrid.cpp' */
34161/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:57, size 7493 */
34162
34163
34167
34180QCPPolarGrid::QCPPolarGrid(QCPPolarAxisAngular *parentAxis) :
34181 QCPLayerable(parentAxis->parentPlot(), QString(), parentAxis),
34182 mType(gtNone),
34183 mSubGridType(gtNone),
34184 mAntialiasedSubGrid(true),
34185 mAntialiasedZeroLine(true),
34186 mParentAxis(parentAxis)
34187{
34188 // warning: this is called in QCPPolarAxisAngular constructor, so parentAxis members should not be accessed/called
34189 setParent(parentAxis);
34190 setType(gtAll);
34191 setSubGridType(gtNone);
34192
34193 setAngularPen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::DotLine));
34194 setAngularSubGridPen(QPen(QColor(220,220,220), 0, Qt::DotLine));
34195
34196 setRadialPen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::DotLine));
34197 setRadialSubGridPen(QPen(QColor(220,220,220), 0, Qt::DotLine));
34198 setRadialZeroLinePen(QPen(QColor(200,200,200), 0, Qt::SolidLine));
34199
34200 setAntialiased(true);
34201}
34202
34203void QCPPolarGrid::setRadialAxis(QCPPolarAxisRadial *axis)
34204{
34205 mRadialAxis = axis;
34206}

34232}

34264
34278void QCPPolarGrid::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
34279{
34280 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeGrid);
34281}
34282
34288void QCPPolarGrid::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
34289{
34290 if (!mParentAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid parent axis"; return; }
34291
34292 const QPointF center = mParentAxis->mCenter;
34293 const double radius = mParentAxis->mRadius;
34294
34295 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
34296 // draw main angular grid:
34297 if (mType.testFlag(gtAngular))
34298 drawAngularGrid(painter, center, radius, mParentAxis->mTickVectorCosSin, mAngularPen);
34299 // draw main radial grid:
34300 if (mType.testFlag(gtRadial) && mRadialAxis)
34301 drawRadialGrid(painter, center, mRadialAxis->tickVector(), mRadialPen, mRadialZeroLinePen);
34302
34303 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedSubGrid, QCP::aeGrid);
34304 // draw sub angular grid:
34305 if (mSubGridType.testFlag(gtAngular))
34306 drawAngularGrid(painter, center, radius, mParentAxis->mSubTickVectorCosSin, mAngularSubGridPen);
34307 // draw sub radial grid:
34308 if (mSubGridType.testFlag(gtRadial) && mRadialAxis)
34309 drawRadialGrid(painter, center, mRadialAxis->subTickVector(), mRadialSubGridPen);
34310}
34311
34312void QCPPolarGrid::drawRadialGrid(QCPPainter *painter, const QPointF &center, const QVector<double> &coords, const QPen &pen, const QPen &zeroPen)
34313{
34314 if (!mRadialAxis) return;
34315 if (coords.isEmpty()) return;
34316 const bool drawZeroLine = zeroPen != Qt::NoPen;
34317 const double zeroLineEpsilon = qAbs(coords.last()-coords.first())*1e-6;
34318
34319 painter->setPen(pen);
34320 for (int i=0; i<coords.size(); ++i)
34321 {
34322 const double r = mRadialAxis->coordToRadius(coords.at(i));
34323 if (drawZeroLine && qAbs(coords.at(i)) < zeroLineEpsilon)
34324 {
34325 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedZeroLine, QCP::aeZeroLine);
34326 painter->setPen(zeroPen);
34327 painter->drawEllipse(center, r, r);
34328 painter->setPen(pen);
34329 applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
34330 } else
34331 {
34332 painter->drawEllipse(center, r, r);
34333 }
34334 }
34335}
34336
34337void QCPPolarGrid::drawAngularGrid(QCPPainter *painter, const QPointF &center, double radius, const QVector<QPointF> &ticksCosSin, const QPen &pen)
34338{
34339 if (ticksCosSin.isEmpty()) return;
34340
34341 painter->setPen(pen);
34342 for (int i=0; i<ticksCosSin.size(); ++i)
34343 painter->drawLine(center, center+ticksCosSin.at(i)*radius);
34344}
34345/* end of 'src/polar/polargrid.cpp' */
34346
34347
34348/* including file 'src/polar/polargraph.cpp' */
34349/* modified 2022-11-06T12:45:57, size 44035 */
34350
34351
34355
34362QCPPolarLegendItem::QCPPolarLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPPolarGraph *graph) :
34363 QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
34364 mPolarGraph(graph)
34365{
34366 setAntialiased(false);
34367}
34368
34369void QCPPolarLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
34370{
34371 if (!mPolarGraph) return;
34372 painter->setFont(getFont());
34373 painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
34374 QSizeF iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
34375 QRectF textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPolarGraph->name());
34376 QRectF iconRect(mRect.topLeft(), iconSize);
34377 int textHeight = qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()); // if text has smaller height than icon, center text vertically in icon height, else align tops
34378 painter->drawText(mRect.x()+iconSize.width()+mParentLegend->iconTextPadding(), mRect.y(), textRect.width(), textHeight, Qt::TextDontClip, mPolarGraph->name());
34379 // draw icon:
34380 painter->save();
34381 painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
34382 mPolarGraph->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
34383 painter->restore();
34384 // draw icon border:
34385 if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
34386 {
34387 painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
34388 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
34389 int halfPen = qCeil(painter->pen().widthF()*0.5)+1;
34390 painter->setClipRect(mOuterRect.adjusted(-halfPen, -halfPen, halfPen, halfPen)); // extend default clip rect so thicker pens (especially during selection) are not clipped
34391 painter->drawRect(iconRect);
34392 }
34393}
34394
34395QSize QCPPolarLegendItem::minimumOuterSizeHint() const
34396{
34397 if (!mPolarGraph) return QSize();
34398 QSize result(0, 0);
34399 QRect textRect;
34400 QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
34401 QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
34402 textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPolarGraph->name());
34403 result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width());
34404 result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()));
34405 result.rwidth() += mMargins.left()+mMargins.right();
34406 result.rheight() += mMargins.top()+mMargins.bottom();
34407 return result;
34408}
34409
34410QPen QCPPolarLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
34411{
34412 return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
34413}
34414
34415QColor QCPPolarLegendItem::getTextColor() const
34416{
34417 return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
34418}
34419
34420QFont QCPPolarLegendItem::getFont() const
34421{
34422 return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
34423}

34442
34456QCPPolarGraph::QCPPolarGraph(QCPPolarAxisAngular *keyAxis, QCPPolarAxisRadial *valueAxis) :
34457 QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot(), QString(), keyAxis),
34458 mDataContainer(new QCPGraphDataContainer),
34459 mName(),
34460 mAntialiasedFill(true),
34461 mAntialiasedScatters(true),
34462 mPen(Qt::black),
34463 mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
34464 mPeriodic(true),
34465 mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
34466 mValueAxis(valueAxis),
34467 mSelectable(QCP::stWhole)
34468 //mSelectionDecorator(0) // TODO
34469{
34470 if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
34471 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
34472
34473 mKeyAxis->registerPolarGraph(this);
34474
34475 //setSelectionDecorator(new QCPSelectionDecorator); // TODO
34476
34477 setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 0));
34478 setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
34479 setLineStyle(lsLine);
34480}

34489 }
34490 */
34491}

34598void QCPPolarGraph::setSelectable(QCP::SelectionType selectable)
34599{
34600 if (mSelectable != selectable)
34601 {
34602 mSelectable = selectable;
34603 QCPDataSelection oldSelection = mSelection;
34604 mSelection.enforceType(mSelectable);
34605 emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
34606 if (mSelection != oldSelection)
34607 {
34608 emit selectionChanged(selected());
34609 emit selectionChanged(mSelection);
34610 }
34611 }
34612}
34613
34632void QCPPolarGraph::setSelection(QCPDataSelection selection)
34633{
34634 selection.enforceType(mSelectable);
34635 if (mSelection != selection)
34636 {
34637 mSelection = selection;
34638 emit selectionChanged(selected());
34639 emit selectionChanged(mSelection);
34640 }
34641}

34662
34674void QCPPolarGraph::setData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values, bool alreadySorted)
34675{
34676 mDataContainer->clear();
34677 addData(keys, values, alreadySorted);
34678}

34687{
34688 mLineStyle = ls;
34689}

34698{
34699 mScatterStyle = style;
34700}
34701
34702void QCPPolarGraph::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values, bool alreadySorted)
34703{
34704 if (keys.size() != values.size())
34705 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keys and values have different sizes:" << keys.size() << values.size();
34706 const int n = qMin(keys.size(), values.size());
34707 QVector<QCPGraphData> tempData(n);
34708 QVector<QCPGraphData>::iterator it = tempData.begin();
34709 const QVector<QCPGraphData>::iterator itEnd = tempData.end();
34710 int i = 0;
34711 while (it != itEnd)
34712 {
34713 it->key = keys[i];
34714 it->value = values[i];
34715 ++it;
34716 ++i;
34717 }
34718 mDataContainer->add(tempData, alreadySorted); // don't modify tempData beyond this to prevent copy on write
34719}
34720
34721void QCPPolarGraph::addData(double key, double value)
34722{
34723 mDataContainer->add(QCPGraphData(key, value));
34724}
34725
34735/*
