34737{
34738 if (decorator)
34739 {
34740 if (decorator->registerWithPlottable(this))
34741 {
34742 if (mSelectionDecorator) // delete old decorator if necessary
34743 delete mSelectionDecorator;
34744 mSelectionDecorator = decorator;
34745 }
34746 } else if (mSelectionDecorator) // just clear decorator
34747 {
34748 delete mSelectionDecorator;
34749 mSelectionDecorator = 0;
34750 }
34751}
34752*/
34753
34754void QCPPolarGraph::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
34755{
34756 if (mValueAxis)
34757 {
34758 const QPointF point = mValueAxis->coordToPixel(key, value);
34759 x = point.x();
34760 y = point.y();
34761 } else
34762 {
34763 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
34764 }
34765}
34766
34767const QPointF QCPPolarGraph::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
34768{
34769 if (mValueAxis)
34770 {
34771 return mValueAxis->coordToPixel(key, value);
34772 } else
34773 {
34774 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
34775 return QPointF();
34776 }
34777}
34778
34779void QCPPolarGraph::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
34780{
34781 if (mValueAxis)
34782 {
34783 mValueAxis->pixelToCoord(QPointF(x, y), key, value);
34784 } else
34785 {
34786 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
34787 }
34788}
34789
34790void QCPPolarGraph::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
34791{
34792 if (mValueAxis)
34793 {
34794 mValueAxis->pixelToCoord(pixelPos, key, value);
34795 } else
34796 {
34797 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis";
34798 }
34799}
34800
34801void QCPPolarGraph::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
34802{
34803 rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
34804 rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
34805}
34806
34807void QCPPolarGraph::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
34808{
34809 QCPPolarAxisAngular *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
34810 if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
34811
34812 bool foundRange;
34813 QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, QCP::sdBoth);
34814 if (foundRange)
34815 {
34816 if (onlyEnlarge)
34817 newRange.expand(keyAxis->range());
34818 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
34819 {
34820 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
34821 newRange.lower = center-keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
34822 newRange.upper = center+keyAxis->range().size()/2.0;
34823 }
34824 keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
34825 }
34826}
34827
34828void QCPPolarGraph::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool inKeyRange) const
34829{
34830 QCPPolarAxisAngular *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
34831 QCPPolarAxisRadial *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
34832 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
34833
34834 QCP::SignDomain signDomain = QCP::sdBoth;
34835 if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPPolarAxisRadial::stLogarithmic)
34836 signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? QCP::sdNegative : QCP::sdPositive);
34837
34838 bool foundRange;
34839 QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain, inKeyRange ? keyAxis->range() : QCPRange());
34840 if (foundRange)
34841 {
34842 if (onlyEnlarge)
34843 newRange.expand(valueAxis->range());
34844 if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this axis dimension), shift current range to at least center the plottable
34845 {
34846 double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
34847 if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPPolarAxisRadial::stLinear)
34848 {
34849 newRange.lower = center-valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
34850 newRange.upper = center+valueAxis->range().size()/2.0;
34851 } else // scaleType() == stLogarithmic
34852 {
34853 newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
34854 newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(valueAxis->range().upper/valueAxis->range().lower);
34855 }
34856 }
34857 valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
34858 }
34859}
34860
34861bool QCPPolarGraph::addToLegend(QCPLegend *legend)
34862{
34863 if (!legend)
34864 {
34865 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed legend is null";
34866 return false;
34867 }
34868 if (legend->parentPlot() != mParentPlot)
34869 {
34870 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed legend isn't in the same QCustomPlot as this plottable";
34871 return false;
34872 }
34873
34874 //if (!legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this)) // TODO
34875 //{
34876 legend->addItem(new QCPPolarLegendItem(legend, this));
34877 return true;
34878 //} else
34879 // return false;
34880}
34881
34882bool QCPPolarGraph::addToLegend()
34883{
34884 if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
34885 return false;
34886 else
34887 return addToLegend(mParentPlot->legend);
34888}
34889
34890bool QCPPolarGraph::removeFromLegend(QCPLegend *legend) const
34891{
34892 if (!legend)
34893 {
34894 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed legend is null";
34895 return false;
34896 }
34897
34898
34899 QCPPolarLegendItem *removableItem = 0;
34900 for (int i=0; i<legend->itemCount(); ++i) // TODO: reduce this to code in QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend once unified
34901 {
34902 if (QCPPolarLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPolarLegendItem*>(legend->item(i)))
34903 {
34904 if (pli->polarGraph() == this)
34905 {
34906 removableItem = pli;
34907 break;
34908 }
34909 }
34910 }
34911
34912 if (removableItem)
34913 return legend->removeItem(removableItem);
34914 else
34915 return false;
34916}
34917
34918bool QCPPolarGraph::removeFromLegend() const
34919{
34920 if (!mParentPlot || !mParentPlot->legend)
34921 return false;
34922 else
34923 return removeFromLegend(mParentPlot->legend);
34924}
34925
34926double QCPPolarGraph::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
34927{
34928 if ((onlySelectable && mSelectable == QCP::stNone) || mDataContainer->isEmpty())
34929 return -1;
34930 if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis)
34931 return -1;
34932
34933 if (mKeyAxis->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
34934 {
34935 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator closestDataPoint = mDataContainer->constEnd();
34936 double result = pointDistance(pos, closestDataPoint);
34937 if (details)
34938 {
34939 int pointIndex = closestDataPoint-mDataContainer->constBegin();
34940 details->setValue(QCPDataSelection(QCPDataRange(pointIndex, pointIndex+1)));
34941 }
34942 return result;
34943 } else
34944 return -1;
34945}
34946
34947/* inherits documentation from base class */
34948QCPRange QCPPolarGraph::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
34949{
34950 return mDataContainer->keyRange(foundRange, inSignDomain);
34951}
34952
34953/* inherits documentation from base class */
34954QCPRange QCPPolarGraph::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCP::SignDomain inSignDomain, const QCPRange &inKeyRange) const
34955{
34956 return mDataContainer->valueRange(foundRange, inSignDomain, inKeyRange);
34957}
34958
34959/* inherits documentation from base class */
34960QRect QCPPolarGraph::clipRect() const
34961{
34962 if (mKeyAxis)
34963 return mKeyAxis.data()->rect();
34964 else
34965 return QRect();
34966}
34967
34968void QCPPolarGraph::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
34969{
34970 if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
34971 if (mKeyAxis.data()->range().size() <= 0 || mDataContainer->isEmpty()) return;
34972 if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone()) return;
34973
34974 painter->setClipRegion(mKeyAxis->exactClipRegion());
34975
34976 QVector<QPointF> lines, scatters; // line and (if necessary) scatter pixel coordinates will be stored here while iterating over segments
34977
34978 // loop over and draw segments of unselected/selected data:
34979 QList<QCPDataRange> selectedSegments, unselectedSegments, allSegments;
34980 getDataSegments(selectedSegments, unselectedSegments);
34981 allSegments << unselectedSegments << selectedSegments;
34982 for (int i=0; i<allSegments.size(); ++i)
34983 {
34984 bool isSelectedSegment = i >= unselectedSegments.size();
34985 // get line pixel points appropriate to line style:
34986 QCPDataRange lineDataRange = isSelectedSegment ? allSegments.at(i) : allSegments.at(i).adjusted(-1, 1); // unselected segments extend lines to bordering selected data point (safe to exceed total data bounds in first/last segment, getLines takes care)
34987 getLines(&lines, lineDataRange);
34988
34989 // check data validity if flag set:
34990#ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
34991 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator it;
34992 for (it = mDataContainer->constBegin(); it != mDataContainer->constEnd(); ++it)
34993 {
34994 if (QCP::isInvalidData(it->key, it->value))
34995 qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it->key << "invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
34996 }
34997#endif
34998
34999 // draw fill of graph:
35000 //if (isSelectedSegment && mSelectionDecorator)
35001 // mSelectionDecorator->applyBrush(painter);
35002 //else
35003 painter->setBrush(mBrush);
35004 painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
35005 drawFill(painter, &lines);
35006
35007
35008 // draw line:
35009 if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
35010 {
35011 //if (isSelectedSegment && mSelectionDecorator)
35012 // mSelectionDecorator->applyPen(painter);
35013 //else
35014 painter->setPen(mPen);
35015 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
35016 drawLinePlot(painter, lines);
35017 }
35018
35019 // draw scatters:
35020
35021 QCPScatterStyle finalScatterStyle = mScatterStyle;
35022 //if (isSelectedSegment && mSelectionDecorator)
35023 // finalScatterStyle = mSelectionDecorator->getFinalScatterStyle(mScatterStyle);
35024 if (!finalScatterStyle.isNone())
35025 {
35026 getScatters(&scatters, allSegments.at(i));
35027 drawScatterPlot(painter, scatters, finalScatterStyle);
35028 }
35029 }
35030
35031 // draw other selection decoration that isn't just line/scatter pens and brushes:
35032 //if (mSelectionDecorator)
35033 // mSelectionDecorator->drawDecoration(painter, selection());
35034}
35035
35036QCP::Interaction QCPPolarGraph::selectionCategory() const
35037{
35038 return QCP::iSelectPlottables;
35039}
35040
35041void QCPPolarGraph::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
35042{
35043 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
35044}
35045
35046/* inherits documentation from base class */
35047void QCPPolarGraph::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
35048{
35049 Q_UNUSED(event)
35050
35051 if (mSelectable != QCP::stNone)
35052 {
35053 QCPDataSelection newSelection = details.value<QCPDataSelection>();
35054 QCPDataSelection selectionBefore = mSelection;
35055 if (additive)
35056 {
35057 if (mSelectable == QCP::stWhole) // in whole selection mode, we toggle to no selection even if currently unselected point was hit
35058 {
35059 if (selected())
35060 setSelection(QCPDataSelection());
35061 else
35062 setSelection(newSelection);
35063 } else // in all other selection modes we toggle selections of homogeneously selected/unselected segments
35064 {
35065 if (mSelection.contains(newSelection)) // if entire newSelection is already selected, toggle selection
35066 setSelection(mSelection-newSelection);
35067 else
35068 setSelection(mSelection+newSelection);
35069 }
35070 } else
35071 setSelection(newSelection);
35072 if (selectionStateChanged)
35073 *selectionStateChanged = mSelection != selectionBefore;
35074 }
35075}
35076
35077/* inherits documentation from base class */
35078void QCPPolarGraph::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
35079{
35080 if (mSelectable != QCP::stNone)
35081 {
35082 QCPDataSelection selectionBefore = mSelection;
35083 setSelection(QCPDataSelection());
35084 if (selectionStateChanged)
35085 *selectionStateChanged = mSelection != selectionBefore;
35086 }
35087}
35088
35095void QCPPolarGraph::drawLinePlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector<QPointF> &lines) const
35096{
35097 if (painter->pen().style() != Qt::NoPen && painter->pen().color().alpha() != 0)
35098 {
35099 applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
35100 drawPolyline(painter, lines);
35101 }
35102}
35103
35121void QCPPolarGraph::drawFill(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lines) const
35122{
35123 applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
35124 if (painter->brush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && painter->brush().color().alpha() != 0)
35125 painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lines));
35126}
35127
35135void QCPPolarGraph::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector<QPointF> &scatters, const QCPScatterStyle &style) const
35136{
35137 applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
35138 style.applyTo(painter, mPen);
35139 for (int i=0; i<scatters.size(); ++i)
35140 style.drawShape(painter, scatters.at(i).x(), scatters.at(i).y());
35141}
35142
35143void QCPPolarGraph::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
35144{
35145 // draw fill:
35146 if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
35147 {
35148 applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
35149 painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.width(), rect.height()/3.0), mBrush);
35150 }
35151 // draw line vertically centered:
35152 if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
35153 {
35154 applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
35155 painter->setPen(mPen);
35156 painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.right()+5, rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment is missing from dashed/dotted pens
35157 }
35158 // draw scatter symbol:
35159 if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
35160 {
35161 applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
35162 // scale scatter pixmap if it's too large to fit in legend icon rect:
35163 if (mScatterStyle.shape() == QCPScatterStyle::ssPixmap && (mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().width() > rect.width() || mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().height() > rect.height()))
35164 {
35165 QCPScatterStyle scaledStyle(mScatterStyle);
35166 scaledStyle.setPixmap(scaledStyle.pixmap().scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation));
35167 scaledStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
35168 scaledStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
35169 } else
35170 {
35171 mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
35172 mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
35173 }
35174 }
35175}
35176
35177void QCPPolarGraph::applyFillAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
35178{
35179 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedFill, QCP::aeFills);
35180}
35181
35182void QCPPolarGraph::applyScattersAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
35183{
35184 applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedScatters, QCP::aeScatters);
35185}
35186
35187double QCPPolarGraph::pointDistance(const QPointF &pixelPoint, QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator &closestData) const
35188{
35189 closestData = mDataContainer->constEnd();
35190 if (mDataContainer->isEmpty())
35191 return -1.0;
35192 if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone())
35193 return -1.0;
35194
35195 // calculate minimum distances to graph data points and find closestData iterator:
35196 double minDistSqr = (std::numeric_limits<double>::max)();
35197 // determine which key range comes into question, taking selection tolerance around pos into account:
35198 double posKeyMin, posKeyMax, dummy;
35199 pixelsToCoords(pixelPoint-QPointF(mParentPlot->selectionTolerance(), mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()), posKeyMin, dummy);
35200 pixelsToCoords(pixelPoint+QPointF(mParentPlot->selectionTolerance(), mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()), posKeyMax, dummy);
35201 if (posKeyMin > posKeyMax)
35202 qSwap(posKeyMin, posKeyMax);
35203 // iterate over found data points and then choose the one with the shortest distance to pos:
35204 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator begin = mDataContainer->findBegin(posKeyMin, true);
35205 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator end = mDataContainer->findEnd(posKeyMax, true);
35206 for (QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
35207 {
35208 const double currentDistSqr = QCPVector2D(coordsToPixels(it->key, it->value)-pixelPoint).lengthSquared();
35209 if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
35210 {
35211 minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
35212 closestData = it;
35213 }
35214 }
35215
35216 // calculate distance to graph line if there is one (if so, will probably be smaller than distance to closest data point):
35217 if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
35218 {
35219 // line displayed, calculate distance to line segments:
35220 QVector<QPointF> lineData;
35221 getLines(&lineData, QCPDataRange(0, dataCount()));
35222 QCPVector2D p(pixelPoint);
35223 for (int i=0; i<lineData.size()-1; ++i)
35224 {
35225 const double currentDistSqr = p.distanceSquaredToLine(lineData.at(i), lineData.at(i+1));
35226 if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
35227 minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
35228 }
35229 }
35230
35231 return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
35232}
35233
35234int QCPPolarGraph::dataCount() const
35235{
35236 return mDataContainer->size();
35237}
35238
35239void QCPPolarGraph::getDataSegments(QList<QCPDataRange> &selectedSegments, QList<QCPDataRange> &unselectedSegments) const
35240{
35241 selectedSegments.clear();
35242 unselectedSegments.clear();
35243 if (mSelectable == QCP::stWhole) // stWhole selection type draws the entire plottable with selected style if mSelection isn't empty
35244 {
35245 if (selected())
35246 selectedSegments << QCPDataRange(0, dataCount());
35247 else
35248 unselectedSegments << QCPDataRange(0, dataCount());
35249 } else
35250 {
35251 QCPDataSelection sel(selection());
35252 sel.simplify();
35253 selectedSegments = sel.dataRanges();
35254 unselectedSegments = sel.inverse(QCPDataRange(0, dataCount())).dataRanges();
35255 }
35256}
35257
35258void QCPPolarGraph::drawPolyline(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector<QPointF> &lineData) const
35259{
35260 // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing instead of polyline:
35261 if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
35262 painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
35263 !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized) &&
35264 !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching))
35265 {
35266 int i = 0;
35267 bool lastIsNan = false;
35268 const int lineDataSize = lineData.size();
35269 while (i < lineDataSize && (qIsNaN(lineData.at(i).y()) || qIsNaN(lineData.at(i).x()))) // make sure first point is not NaN
35270 ++i;
35271 ++i; // because drawing works in 1 point retrospect
35272 while (i < lineDataSize)
35273 {
35274 if (!qIsNaN(lineData.at(i).y()) && !qIsNaN(lineData.at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
35275 {
35276 if (!lastIsNan)
35277 painter->drawLine(lineData.at(i-1), lineData.at(i));
35278 else
35279 lastIsNan = false;
35280 } else
35281 lastIsNan = true;
35282 ++i;
35283 }
35284 } else
35285 {
35286 int segmentStart = 0;
35287 int i = 0;
35288 const int lineDataSize = lineData.size();
35289 while (i < lineDataSize)
35290 {
35291 if (qIsNaN(lineData.at(i).y()) || qIsNaN(lineData.at(i).x()) || qIsInf(lineData.at(i).y())) // NaNs create a gap in the line. Also filter Infs which make drawPolyline block
35292 {
35293 painter->drawPolyline(lineData.constData()+segmentStart, i-segmentStart); // i, because we don't want to include the current NaN point
35294 segmentStart = i+1;
35295 }
35296 ++i;
35297 }
35298 // draw last segment:
35299 painter->drawPolyline(lineData.constData()+segmentStart, lineDataSize-segmentStart);
35300 }
35301}
35302
35303void QCPPolarGraph::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator &end, const QCPDataRange &rangeRestriction) const
35304{
35305 if (rangeRestriction.isEmpty())
35306 {
35307 end = mDataContainer->constEnd();
35308 begin = end;
35309 } else
35310 {
35311 QCPPolarAxisAngular *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
35312 QCPPolarAxisRadial *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
35313 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
35314 // get visible data range:
35315 if (mPeriodic)
35316 {
35317 begin = mDataContainer->constBegin();
35318 end = mDataContainer->constEnd();
35319 } else
35320 {
35321 begin = mDataContainer->findBegin(keyAxis->range().lower);
35322 end = mDataContainer->findEnd(keyAxis->range().upper);
35323 }
35324 // limit lower/upperEnd to rangeRestriction:
35325 mDataContainer->limitIteratorsToDataRange(begin, end, rangeRestriction); // this also ensures rangeRestriction outside data bounds doesn't break anything
35326 }
35327}
35328
35349void QCPPolarGraph::getLines(QVector<QPointF> *lines, const QCPDataRange &dataRange) const
35350{
35351 if (!lines) return;
35352 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator begin, end;
35353 getVisibleDataBounds(begin, end, dataRange);
35354 if (begin == end)
35355 {
35356 lines->clear();
35357 return;
35358 }
35359
35360 QVector<QCPGraphData> lineData;
35361 if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
35362 getOptimizedLineData(&lineData, begin, end);
35363
35364 switch (mLineStyle)
35365 {
35366 case lsNone: lines->clear(); break;
35367 case lsLine: *lines = dataToLines(lineData); break;
35368 }
35369}
35370
35371void QCPPolarGraph::getScatters(QVector<QPointF> *scatters, const QCPDataRange &dataRange) const
35372{
35373 QCPPolarAxisAngular *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
35374 QCPPolarAxisRadial *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
35375 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
35376
35377 if (!scatters) return;
35378 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator begin, end;
35379 getVisibleDataBounds(begin, end, dataRange);
35380 if (begin == end)
35381 {
35382 scatters->clear();
35383 return;
35384 }
35385
35386 QVector<QCPGraphData> data;
35387 getOptimizedScatterData(&data, begin, end);
35388
35389 scatters->resize(data.size());
35390 for (int i=0; i<data.size(); ++i)
35391 {
35392 if (!qIsNaN(data.at(i).value))
35393 (*scatters)[i] = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.at(i).key, data.at(i).value);
35394 }
35395}
35396
35397void QCPPolarGraph::getOptimizedLineData(QVector<QCPGraphData> *lineData, const QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator &begin, const QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator &end) const
35398{
35399 lineData->clear();
35400
35401 // TODO: fix for log axes and thick line style
35402
35403 const QCPRange range = mValueAxis->range();
35404 bool reversed = mValueAxis->rangeReversed();
35405 const double clipMargin = range.size()*0.05; // extra distance from visible circle, so optimized outside lines can cover more angle before having to place a dummy point to prevent tangents
35406 const double upperClipValue = range.upper + (reversed ? 0 : range.size()*0.05+clipMargin); // clip slightly outside of actual range to avoid line thicknesses to peek into visible circle
35407 const double lowerClipValue = range.lower - (reversed ? range.size()*0.05+clipMargin : 0); // clip slightly outside of actual range to avoid line thicknesses to peek into visible circle
35408 const double maxKeySkip = qAsin(qSqrt(clipMargin*(clipMargin+2*range.size()))/(range.size()+clipMargin))/M_PI*mKeyAxis->range().size(); // the maximum angle between two points on outer circle (r=clipValue+clipMargin) before connecting line becomes tangent to inner circle (r=clipValue)
35409 double skipBegin = 0;
35410 bool belowRange = false;
35411 bool aboveRange = false;
35412 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator it = begin;
35413 while (it != end)
35414 {
35415 if (it->value < lowerClipValue)
35416 {
35417 if (aboveRange) // jumped directly from above to below visible range, draw previous point so entry angle is correct
35418 {
35419 aboveRange = false;
35420 if (!reversed) // TODO: with inner radius, we'll need else case here with projected border point
35421 lineData->append(*(it-1));
35422 }
35423 if (!belowRange)
35424 {
35425 skipBegin = it->key;
35426 lineData->append(QCPGraphData(it->key, lowerClipValue));
35427 belowRange = true;
35428 }
35429 if (it->key-skipBegin > maxKeySkip) // add dummy point if we're exceeding the maximum skippable angle (to prevent unintentional intersections with visible circle)
35430 {
35431 skipBegin += maxKeySkip;
35432 lineData->append(QCPGraphData(skipBegin, lowerClipValue));
35433 }
35434 } else if (it->value > upperClipValue)
35435 {
35436 if (belowRange) // jumped directly from below to above visible range, draw previous point so entry angle is correct (if lower means outer, so if reversed axis)
35437 {
35438 belowRange = false;
35439 if (reversed)
35440 lineData->append(*(it-1));
35441 }
35442 if (!aboveRange)
35443 {
35444 skipBegin = it->key;
35445 lineData->append(QCPGraphData(it->key, upperClipValue));
35446 aboveRange = true;
35447 }
35448 if (it->key-skipBegin > maxKeySkip) // add dummy point if we're exceeding the maximum skippable angle (to prevent unintentional intersections with visible circle)
35449 {
35450 skipBegin += maxKeySkip;
35451 lineData->append(QCPGraphData(skipBegin, upperClipValue));
35452 }
35453 } else // value within bounds where we don't optimize away points
35454 {
35455 if (aboveRange)
35456 {
35457 aboveRange = false;
35458 if (!reversed)
35459 lineData->append(*(it-1)); // just entered from above, draw previous point so entry angle is correct (if above means outer, so if not reversed axis)
35460 }
35461 if (belowRange)
35462 {
35463 belowRange = false;
35464 if (reversed)
35465 lineData->append(*(it-1)); // just entered from below, draw previous point so entry angle is correct (if below means outer, so if reversed axis)
35466 }
35467 lineData->append(*it); // inside visible circle, add point normally
35468 }
35469 ++it;
35470 }
35471 // to make fill not erratic, add last point normally if it was outside visible circle:
35472 if (aboveRange)
35473 {
35474 aboveRange = false;
35475 if (!reversed)
35476 lineData->append(*(it-1)); // just entered from above, draw previous point so entry angle is correct (if above means outer, so if not reversed axis)
35477 }
35478 if (belowRange)
35479 {
35480 belowRange = false;
35481 if (reversed)
35482 lineData->append(*(it-1)); // just entered from below, draw previous point so entry angle is correct (if below means outer, so if reversed axis)
35483 }
35484}
35485
35486void QCPPolarGraph::getOptimizedScatterData(QVector<QCPGraphData> *scatterData, QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator begin, QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator end) const
35487{
35488 scatterData->clear();
35489
35490 const QCPRange range = mValueAxis->range();
35491 bool reversed = mValueAxis->rangeReversed();
35492 const double clipMargin = range.size()*0.05;
35493 const double upperClipValue = range.upper + (reversed ? 0 : clipMargin); // clip slightly outside of actual range to avoid scatter size to peek into visible circle
35494 const double lowerClipValue = range.lower - (reversed ? clipMargin : 0); // clip slightly outside of actual range to avoid scatter size to peek into visible circle
35495 QCPGraphDataContainer::const_iterator it = begin;
35496 while (it != end)
35497 {
35498 if (it->value > lowerClipValue && it->value < upperClipValue)
35499 scatterData->append(*it);
35500 ++it;
35501 }
35502}
35503
35514QVector<QPointF> QCPPolarGraph::dataToLines(const QVector<QCPGraphData> &data) const
35515{
35516 QVector<QPointF> result;
35517 QCPPolarAxisAngular *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
35518 QCPPolarAxisRadial *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
35519 if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return result; }
35520
35521 // transform data points to pixels:
35522 result.resize(data.size());
35523 for (int i=0; i<data.size(); ++i)
35524 result[i] = mValueAxis->coordToPixel(data.at(i).key, data.at(i).value);
35525 return result;
35526}
35527/* end of 'src/polar/polargraph.cpp' */
